menus
Iozzo’s offers a wide range of new and old world dishes, an extensive wine list, and craft cocktails. Family favorites include a new take on the classic lasagna, chicken marsala, hearty Italian beef, and tiramisu cheesecake.

Serving the finest in Italian Cuisine and Wine to the families of Indianapolis since 2009.
946 South Meridian Street, Indianapolis, Indiana 46225 | 317.974.1100

LUNCH:  MONDAY – FRIDAY 11 AM – 3:30 PM
DINNER: MONDAY – THURSDAY 3:30 PM – 9 PM | FRIDAY – SATURDAY 4 PM – 10 PM | SUNDAY 4 PM – 8 PM

name: Shapiro's Delicatessen
raw_text:
Mobile Menu - Shapiro's Delicatessen
Shapiro's Delicatessen
Hours
Monday - Friday: 10:00AM - 7:30PM
Saturday - Sunday: 9:00AM-7:30PM
Weekend Breakfast 9:00AM-Noon
808 South Meridian Street, Indianapolis, IN 46225
317-631-4041 x1  deli@shapiros.com
Daily Soup Special
Bean Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
Made from Indianapolisâ NK Hurst Beans, our bean soup starts with our brisket stock. Thatâs why there is so much flavor.
Available every Monday at the Downtown restaurant.
Daily Soup Special
Lentil Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
NK Hurst Beans are the foundation of our soup. Our beef stock, made from our brisket, adds richness to this delicious specialty. We also add large slices of our all beef Kosher-style hot dogs to this dish. Available every Tuesday at the Downtown restaurant.
Daily Soup Special
Bean & Barley Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
Available on Wednesdays at the Downtown restaurant.
We use the stock from when we make our brisket as the base to this soup. (again, everything is from scratch here!)
Daily Soup/Stew Specials
Split Pea Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
Horror movies may give this soup a bad rap. However, when you taste ours, youâll see why we make it every week! (Fun Fact: pea soup is hard to photograph...it ends up looking like pea soup!)
Available every Thursday!
Chicken Stew
Cup $6.85 Bowl $10.95 Quart $18.75
Redbook magazine named our chicken stew among the Top 10 chicken dishes in the country. Wide egg noodles, red bell peppers, celery and green peas add great color to this dish loaded with never frozen, local chicken. Available every Thursday at the Downtown location.
Daily Soup Special
Clam Chowder Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
This is the white style of clam chowder. With plenty of clams, you wonât have to fish hard to find them!
Available every Friday at the Downtown Indianapolis location.
Daily Soup Special
Broccoli Cheese Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
Rich and creamy, our cream of broccoli soup uses hand trimmed, fresh broccoli and creamy cheese, blended together for a warm way to start your weekend.
Available every Saturday at the Downtown Indianapolis location.
DESSERTS
BECAUSE LIFE'S TOO SHORT TO WAIT FOR DESSERT!
CAKES
Carrot/Cheesecake
$9.85
Two layers of carrot cake with a layer of our famous cheesecake in the middle, it's perfect when you can't decide which one you want for dessert!
Ann’s Strawberry Cheesecake
$9.85
Our famous strawberry cheesecake is one of our best sellers because we use the best ingredients!
Cherry Cheesecake
$9.85
Our famous Philadelphia Cream Cheese Cheesecake, but this time we put cherries on top!
Oreo Cheesecake
$9.85
Philadelphia Cream Cheese plus Oreos â what could be bad?
Plain Cheesecake
$9.85
Chocolate, Chocolate, Chocolate Cake
$8.00
Gluten-free death by chocolate!
Arlene’s Carrot Cake
$7.20
A rich cake, full of raisins, carrots and nuts with the best icing that is the perfect level of sweetness.
Poppy Seed Cake
$6.75
A wonderful bundt cake that is hard to find. Moist, sweet, delicious, with poppy seeds.
Marble Cake
$6.75
Lemon Cake
$6.75
One of our unsung heros! A classic Jewish deli favorite.
Chocolate Layer Cake
$6.00
Rich and decadent, it's just simply delish!
German Chocolate Cake
$7.20
Coconut abounds! A traditional chocolate cake with milk chocolate icing with a TON of coconut flakes!
PIES
Apple Pie
$5.75
Cherry Pie
$5.75
Coconut Cream Pie
$5.75
Lemon Meringue Pie
$5.75
Boston Cream Pie
$6.25
Rhubard Pie
$5.75
Struggling to keep this on the shelves, rhubard is hard to find these days...
Pecan Pie
$7.25
Key Lime Pie
$8.25
Amazing dessert, we even make the pie crust inhouse!
COOKIES & SPECIAL TREATS
Cinnamon Rugelach Cookie
$1.20
This Russian Tea Cookie is hand rolled in our bakery to become a flaky, delicious treat that comes in four flavors. Cinnamon sugar, raspberry, chocolate and apricot. You won't find anything as good as ours!
Chocolate Rugelach Cookie
$1.20
This Russian Tea Cookie is hand rolled in our bakery to become a flaky, delicious treat that comes in four flavors. Cinnamon sugar, raspberry, chocolate and apricot. You won't find anything as good as ours!
Raspberry Rugalach Cookie
$1.85
This Russian Tea Cookie is hand rolled in our bakery to become a flaky, delicious treat that comes in four flavors. Cinnamon sugar, raspberry, chocolate and apricot. You won't find anything as good as ours!
Apricot Rugelach Cookie
$1.85
This Russian Tea Cookie is hand rolled in our bakery to become a flaky, delicious treat that comes in four flavors. Cinnamon sugar, raspberry, chocolate and apricot. You won't find anything as good as ours!
Eclairs
$4.95
Taste the difference, hand made in our bakery!
Coconut Macaroons
$1.95
Slightly crisp outer part gives way to moist, chewy goodness with SO much coconut!
Cannoli
$4.10
An Italian treat of a hard shell pastry filled with mascarpone and crushed pistachios! A sweet traditional dessert.
Mexican Wedding Cakes
4/$1.95
Palmiers
$2.55
Real butter makes these taste better. Other bakeries use imitation butter. The difference is obvious!
Black and White Cookies
$1.95
A staple to any Jewish deli, we make ours! Most others don't...'nough said!
Snicker Doodle Cookie
$3.15
Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
$3.15
Reece’s Peanut Butter Cup Cookie
$3.15
Chaos Cookie
$3.15
White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookie
$3.15
Triple Chocolate Cookie
$3.15
Sugar Cookie
$3.15
Cake Pops
$1.95
BROWNIES & BARS
Lemon Bar
$3.55
Espresso Bar
$4.65
Berry Cheesecake Bar
$3.55
Butter Brickle Bar
$3.55
Creme Brulee Bar
$4.65
Strawberry Bar
$4.65
Pecan Bar
$4.65
Caramel Brownie Bar
$4.65
Shapiro’s Brownie
$4.65
This one is frosted with chocolate!
Raspberry Almond Bar
$4.65
Apricot Bar
$4.65
Mocha Crunch Bar
$4.65
Huge Brownie
$4.65
SANDWICHES
Whole and half available on most items
Corned Beef Sandwich
$20.45
We start with a brisket of beef, "corn" it with our secret spices and rub, and slice it hot when you order your sandwich. About 6 ounces of meat on every sandwich with our famous rye bread, or whatever you choose, creates a huge, two handed meal. No Cryovac, no processed pieces parts, just fresh meat!
85% beef, 15% rye bread, 100% Shapiros!
Pastrami Sandwich
$20.85
No Cryovac, No processed pieces parts! We start with a navel of beef, smoke it with our secret spices and rub, and slice it hot when you order your sandwich. About 6 ounces of meat on every sandwich with our famous rye bread, or whatever you choose, creates a huge, two handed meal.
85% beef, 15% rye bread, 100% Shapiros!
Corn-ami  Sandwich
$21.75
Corned Beef+Pastrami. We create this sandwich with half Shapiro's corned beef and half Shapiro's pastrami! You choose the bread and extra stuff.
Reuben (Sauerkraut)
$21.50
Our delicious, house made corned beef piled high with two slices of German Swiss cheese, a thick splat of Russian dressing, and sauerkraut in the middle of the meat, grilled to a golden brown, served with our pickle for the perfect blending of flavors in one sandwich! Our best seller.
New York Reuben (Cole Slaw)
$21.50
Pictured above. Our delicious, house made corned beef piled high with two slices of German Swiss cheese, a thick splat of Russian dressing, and Shapiro's Cole Slaw in the middle of the meat, grilled to a golden brown, served with our pickle for the perfect blending of flavors in one sandwich!
Pastrami Reuben (Sauerkraut)
$22.45
Our famous Reuben made with our delicious pastrami!
New York Pastrami Reuben (Cole Slaw)
$22.45
Made with our famous pastrami, we use our house made cole slaw and grill the reuben to perfection.
Turkey Reuben (Sauerkraut)
$18.00
We make our famous Reuben but this time with turkey!
Beef Brisket Sandwich
$20.45
No Cryovac here, No processed pieces parts! We start with a brisket of beef, we cook it with our secret spices and rub, and slice it hot when you order your sandwich. About 6 ounces of meat on every sandwich with our famous rye bread, or whatever you choose, creates a huge, two handed meal.
85% beef, 15% rye bread, 100% Shapiros!
Corned Beef + Brisket Sandwich
$20.75
Half Shapiro's corned beef and half Shapiro's brisket make up this sandwich.
P.L.T.
$10.75
Pastrami, Lettuce, Tomato sandwich.
We take our fantastic pastrami and cook it into "bacon". We add fresh lettuce and a thick slice of tomato; you pick the bread and you have a bargin sandwich in your hands.
Pastrami + Turkey Sandwich
$20.85
Half Shapiro's famous pastrami and half our turkey, you pick smoke or roasted.
Food for thought...the pastrami is hot and the turkey is cold.
Peppered Beef Sandwich
$17.55
Marc Summers from the Food Network did a show where his "Best thing I Ever Ate" was Shapiro's Delicatessen's peppered beef. Again, NO Cryovac! It's a cut of beef, but this one is served cold. It's a different taste profile than our corned beef and pastrami. Some like it better, some prefer our hot sandwiches. Who's to say?
Rare Roast Beef Sandwich
$20.45
Another fabulous sandwich that's the best of the best beef category. Our rare roast beef is cooked to a beautiful pink tenderness for a moist treat on any bread. *Please note that this is served cold*. If it were hot, it would no longer be RARE roast beef. For hot roast beef, try our Brisket.
Salami Sandwich
$8.85
We were out of this during the early days of Covid...we were close to a mutiny by our regular customers who LOVE this salami! It is created especially for us by our corned beef supplier Vienna Beef in Chicago. It's our recipe that they make for us. Give it a try.
Roasted/Smoked Turkey Sandwich
$11.40
Smoked or oven roasted, this is a very big seller for Shapiroâs! The Shapiro turkey sandwich has its own cult following. Hormone free and antibiotic free, you can taste why itâs a favorite.
Chopped Liver Sandwich
$9.00
Two words, chicken schmaltz. We make our own from all of the whole, fresh chickens that we get from Central Indiana and it is the key ingredient in Chopped Liver. You can get a sandwich or a "schmear" of chopped liver on top of another sandwich. My favorite is our rye bread heels, crusty and crunchy with a scoop of our creamy and rich chopped liver.
Kosher Style Beef Frank
$6.00
All beef frank without the dyes and strange pieces of cow that the cheap companies include in their hot dogs. Kosher style means that they "answer to a higher authority".
Pure Beef Burger
$6.65
This Russian recipe is one of our hidden secrets of the menu. Not for Celiacs, we add bread crumb blends in this amazing value of our menu!
Chicken Salad Sandwich
$10.15
Our chickens are so fresh that they come to us on ice without any plastic or Cryovac processing. Our fresh Indiana chickens are never frozen!!! We cook whole chickens, de-bone them by hand, use the highest level of mayonnaise, grapes, celery and herbs for an amazing scoop of deliciousness! Comes with your choice of bread.
Albacore Tuna Salad Sandwich
$10.15
Our all-white-meat Albacore tuna salad is made with quality fish, with just enough hard-boiled egg whites and seasoning to make a statement of its own. Try it on a flaky croissant with lettuce and tomato.
Grilled Cheese
$7.35
EXTRA STUFF FOR SANDWICHES
BREAD
Choose your bread: Shapiro's famous, hand cut Rye, Sourdough, Wheat, White, Marble Rye, Pumpernickel, Onion Bun, Egg Bun, Poppy Seed Hot Dog Bun, Bagel +$.90, Croissant +$1.45, Shapiro's Gluten-free bread with NO upcharge!
TOPPINGS
Free
Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Mustards - Spicy Brown or Yellow, Ketchup, Mayonnaise (if you must!)
CHEESE
$ .80
Swiss, Muenster, Provolone, Colby-Jack, American
CHOPPED LIVER SCHMEAR
$2.65
Two words, chicken schmaltz. We make our own from all of the whole, fresh chickens that we get from Central Indiana and it is a key ingredient in Chopped Liver. You can add a âschmearâ of chopped liver on top of another sandwich.
SALADS & PLATTERS
Tossed Salad
$4.70
A classic combination of crisp romaine and iceberg lettuces, red cabbage, carrots, sliced beefsteak tomatoes, cherry tomatoes and your choice of dressing. This smaller size makes a perfect side salad.
Chicken Caesar Salad
$9.05
Romaine lettuce sits below a generous portion of house-roasted, herb chicken breast, Parmesan and shredded Swiss cheeses, creamy Caesar dressing and croutons, of course! Croutons are not added until purchased so this can be gluten-free.
Greek Salad
$7.25
Romaine, thinly sliced red onion, pitted Kalamata olives, thick slices of cucumber, chopped tomato and crumbled feta. Served with our house-made red wine and olive oil vinaigrette.
Chef Salad
$9.05
This large salad is made from romaine and iceberg lettuces, carrots, red cabbage, generous amounts of chopped salami, turkey, Swiss and Colby Jack cheeses, sliced hard-boiled egg, wedges or diced beefsteak tomatoes and your choice of dressing.
California Chopped Salad
$9.05
Diced romaine and iceberg lettuces set the foundation for diced turkey, salami, and tomatoes, all dusted with sweet basil and Parmesan cheese. Served with our house-made olive oil, red wine basil vinaigrette dressing.
Nova Lox Platter
$13.00
A generous serving of Nova Lox (of course, itâs generous, itâs Shapiroâs!). Includes slices of tomatoes, onion, capers, Greek olives, lemon wedge and your choice of toasted bagel* with Philadelphia cream cheese. Served on a decorative bed of lettuce. *Or gluten free bread
Albacore Tuna Salad Platter
$12.50
A heaping scoop of our delicious, house-made Albacore tuna salad and a second scoop of your choice of our own coleslaw, potato salad, cottage cheese or fresh cut fruit. Includes slices of tomato and onion served on a bed of lettuce.
Chicken Salad Platter
$12.50
A heaping scoop of our famous chicken salad and a second scoop of your choice of our own coleslaw, potato salad, cottage cheese or fresh cut fruit. Includes slices of tomato and onion served on a bed of lettuce. This comes with our famous rye bread.
Deluxe Deli Platter for 2
$45.00
Pictured above. Only at Shapiroâs would anyone say that this much food feeds 2 people! Itâs loaded with so much delicious food that it will likely serve 3 or 4! A sampling of the best of our best: Corned Beef, Pastrami, Peppered Beef, Salami, Turkey, Bologna, Chicken Salad, Tuna Salad, Swiss and American cheeses, tomato, pickles, olives, pepperoncinis, coleslaw, potato salad and centered with our very own chopped liver. Choose your bread and youâve got the makings of an incredible mealâ¦or three!
SOUPS & STEWS
Daily Soups are available seven days a week.
1/2 Sandwich & Cup of Soup
$12.00
Choose from soup specials or daily soups. MOST sandwiches are available for this option.
(We can't grill half a Reuben, no croissants, no hot dogs...I mean, these make sense, right?) Some choices have an upcharge for more $$ meats. Oh yeah - it says soups, so NOT stews or chili!
Vegetable Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
A unique base made from beef broth is why this tastes so good! It's loaded with peeled and chopped fresh veggies and a variety of beans, potatoes, cabbage and tomatoes. So fresh! Available every day.
Chicken Noodle Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
Our great homemade chicken broth is the base. Then we add carrots, peas and thin egg noodles. Our family recipe doesnât have chicken in this soup, just the chicken broth. Try our chicken stew if you want big chunks of chicken. Add a matzo ball for $1.55
Chicken Broth Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
Homemade, delicious chicken bone broth. Guaranteed to get rid of that cold! Well, not really guaranteed but there are plenty of Shapiroâs customers who swear by our soup as their remedy. Available daily with or without a matzo ball.
Matzo Ball Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75/Quart $10.85
At Shapiroâs, we hand-roll our matzo balls and cook them to perfection in our chicken broth. The result is a matzo ball that is light and fluffy. So good you wonât want to make your own ever again!
A cup of chicken broth has one matzo ball and a bowl has two matzo balls.
You can add a Matzo ball to any of our soups or stews ~ just ask! $1.55
Cabbage Borscht Soup
Cup $3.75 Bowl $5.75
A perfect blend of sweet and savory with a kick! Ours is a beef base with tomato and cabbage, of course! A Russian staple, just like the old country.
Available daily at our downtown restaurant.
Chili (Seasonal)
Cup $4.80 Bowl $8.15 Quart $14.95
Made only seasonally, we use grade A Indiana beef because we care about the quality of our food. Served with spaghetti mixed in and Shapiroâs famous rye on the side. Donât forget to grab an ice cold DareDevil beer to wash it all down and cool yourself off.
Beef Stew
Cup $6.85 Bowl $10.95 Quart $18.75
Large chunks of tender prime steak with fresh potatoes, bell peppers, celery and local tomatoes in flavorful broth go well with our crusty rye bread.
Available daily Monday through Thursday.
Chicken Stew
Cup $6.85 Bowl $10.95 Quart $18.75
Redbook magazine named our chicken stew among the Top 10 chicken dishes in the country. Wide egg noodles, red bell peppers, celery and green peas add great color to this dish loaded with never frozen, local chicken. Available every Thursday at the Downtown location.
ENTREES
Some items are available after 4pm. Check for daily specials.
Corned Beef Dinner
$25.25
This entree comes with your choice of two sides, our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Brisket Dinner
$25.25
This entree comes with your choice of two sides, our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Meatloaf Dinner
$15.25
This entree comes with your choice of two sides, our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Chopped Steak Dinner
1 = $10.85/ 2 = $12.55
This entree comes with grilled onions and our famous rye bread and pickle. If you order two patties, you get the choice of two sides as well.
Stuffed Cabbage Dinner
$15.90
This entree comes with your choice of two sides, our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Stuffed Pepper Dinner
$15.90
Served on Thursday, Friday and Saturday, this entree comes with your choice of two sides, our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Baked Chicken Dinner
$14.05
This entree comes with your choice of two sides, our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Beef Manhattan Dinner
$25.25
Served starting at 4pm, (after we make our mashed potatoes) This entree comes with a mound of creamy mashed potatoes plus our famous rye bread and a pickle.
AVAILABLE AFTER 4PM and all day on weekends.
Fried Chicken Dinner
$13.30
This entree comes with two pieces of chicken, your choice of two sides, our famous rye bread and a pickle. Available on Saturdays & Sundays.
Vegetarian Spaghetti
$8.00
This entree comes with our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Small Spaghetti & Meatball
1 Meatball $9.00
This entree comes with one meatball, our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Large Spaghetti & Meatballs
2 Meatballs $10.25
This entree comes with our famous rye bread and a pickle.
Vegetable Platter (choose 3 sides)
$10.55
Choose three sides for a price break on our huge list of veggies and sides.
SIDES
The items listed here are available all day.
Shapiro’s Mac & Cheese
$4.55
Do you like the crunchy top or the creamy middle? Ask for the part you like the best!
Potato Latke
$3.55
Great Uncle Max started making our potato latkes much larger than normal! But we still give you two anyway. The crunchy outer part is the best for dipping in apple sauce or sour cream. You pick which you want to go with your order.
German Potato Salad
$3.55
Hot, seasoned and (look closely) our corned beef is added for extra flavor.
Shapiro’s Potato Salad
$3.55
Again with the hand peeling! It is extra labor, but it tasted SO much better because it's fresh. Others buy bags of cubed potatoes that are sprayed with chemicals and we wouldn't do that!
Shapiro’s Cole Slaw
$3.55
We buy whole cabbages, chop them ourselves and make our own Shapiroâs family recipe coleslaw from scratch.
Green Beans
$3.55
Spinach
$3.55
Cabbage
$3.55
Broccoli Salad
$4.35
This is a Shapiroâs specialty: broccoli florets, beef bacon, sunflower seeds and onion combined with a creamy house-made dressing and a little squirt of lemon.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Expand or collapse answer
We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it:
https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition
Do you have a Gluten Free menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes. Please visit our website at
www.carrabbas.com
and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF.
Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards?
Expand or collapse answer
Please visit
https://www.dine-rewards.com/
and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it.
Do you have outdoor seating?
Expand or collapse answer
Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available.
Do you have a Kids menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under.
Click here to view the Kids menu
Give The Gift Of Carrabba's
BUY NOW
About Carrabba's Italian Grill
Southport, IN
Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring a wood-burning grill inspired by the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Pollo Rosa Maria, Wood-Fire Grilled Steak and chops and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere.
Managing Partner: Meredith Trauthwein
Location: Located at the end of Southport Crossing Drive

Famous 3 Course Meals
Menu items and prices can vary by location.  Please contact The Old Spaghetti Factory near you for specific information.
Every entree at The Old Spaghetti Factory is served with hot fresh baked bread, soup or crisp green salad, and a scoop of our signature spumoni or vanilla ice cream. Our menu is full of flavorful value that feels just like home.
View Your Location’s Menu
Appetizers
Sicilian Garlic Cheese Bread
A generous portion of fresh bread topped with a tasty blend of garlic and three melted cheeses served toasted with a side of our homemade Marinara Sauce. (1220 cal)

and mushrooms. (1360 cal)

Our from scratch recipe of fresh onions, carrots, tomatoes, and garlic sautéed in olive oil and Italian seasonings.  (560 cal)

White Clam Sauce
Our from scratch recipe for clam lovers – with hints of wine, fresh garlic, green peppers, onions and parsley.  (810 cal)
Mushroom Sauce
Our from scratch Marinara sauce topped with freshly sautéed seasoned mushrooms.  (670 cal)
Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter

About us
Taste the difference
Upscale Neapolitan Pizzeria, Italian Cucina and Wine Bar. Brick oven fired pizzas, in-house made fresh pastas, both imported and locally sourced quality ingredients daily, gluten and dairy free options as well. We’re family friendly and always welcoming. Try something at Diavola tonight!
our menu
Sazerac, Mojito and Negroni cocktails
Assorted food on the table
Pizza oven
Exterior, patio seating area
Three glasses of wine

Caprese salad, with tomato, fresh mozzarella, pesto, basil, and...

Seafood plate, with shrimp, mussels and bread
A bowl of mussels
Mais Burrata pizza, with roasted sweet corn, tomato, basil and...

Reviews
Review by - Yelp
Sean A:
The pizza was hot and fresh. They had some interesting selections that peaked my interest. I tried one with shrimp and another with sausage, pepperoni, and peppadew peppers, and mushroom. I topped it with arugula! Delicious! Next time I will try there best seller with corn
Review by - Yelp
Mark G:
Love this place / great pizza's / 1/2 price bottles of wine n Wednesdays/ great atmosphere/ always a great option
Review by - Yelp
MacKenzie M:
The fried calamari pear pizza was simply amazing! Definitely get a reservation ahead of your visit.
Review by - Yelp
Christina G:
Was excellent! Sat at the bar and the staff was equally as amazing. Wine perfect!  Coming back soon!
Review by - Yelp
Alexius W:
So freaking good and the ambience is versatile. Could be family friendly or perfect for a date. loved it

Plan a Party
LOCATED IN THE CENTER OF INDY
In the heart of Indianapolis, our 20,250-square-foot complex offers a game-changing experience that pairs bowling, karaoke and more games with amazing scratch food and craft cocktails. Our venue is designed to make every visit unforgettable, whether you’re gearing up for skeeball, or just enjoying a night out.
We’re perfectly situated just minutes from Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, and the Indy 500, making us the ideal spot for pre-game festivities or a fun evening out. Our dynamic space invites you to wander in and dive into a world of entertainment.

PARKING:
There is nearby paid on-street metered parking and garages. Given the popularity of the downtown area, it's a good idea to allow extra time for finding parking, especially during peak times. Alternatively, consider using rideshare services or public transportation to avoid parking hassles altogether.
AGE POLICY:
Bring your kids, bring your friends! Fridays & Saturdays are open to all ages until 10pm, but after that, you'll need to be 21 to join the fun.

All day Happy Hour! Shake off the Sunday scaries with Monday Funday! Keep the good vibes rolling with 50% off games, plus food & drinks specials starting at just $5. It’s the cure for a case of the Mondays, and the perfect way to keep the weekend spirit alive!

Weekly Y2K Saturdays
Get ready to rewind the vibes! DJs spinning all your favorite 90s and 2000s bangers, raffles, $7 wells, $5 shots and throwback board games.
Free RSVP Now
Weekly Brunch Club - Saturday & Sunday
What's better than Brunch? Join us every weekend to try selections from our Brunch menu. Don't miss our special $5 mimosa and 50% off of games from opening until 3:00PM.
Book a Table
Weekly Music Bingo Thursdays
Thursdays from 7-9pm - Turn up the volume, test your knowledge and sing along at our Weekly Music Bingo!
FREE RSVP NOW

Daily Menus
Bluebeard is built on the belief that food isn’t a commodity, but a catalyst for community. We have personal relationships with the local and regional farmers and purveyors who provide our meat and produce. These relationships are as essential to the quality of our food as the craft and care that goes into preparing it. Because we focus on what our farmers are the proudest of at the moment, our menu changes a little every day.

APPETIZERS

WINE
BEER
HAPPY HOUR
ICONIC COCKTAILS
Join us for Happy Hour Sun – Thurs; 4pm – 6pm for $5 off select cocktails.
THE SIGNATURE "ELMO COLA"
— 16
Mix a glass-bottled Coke or Diet Coke with our very own St. Elmo cherry vanilla whiskey and drunken cherries.
RARE SAINT MANHATTAN
— 16
Rare Saint 5yr bourbon, sweet vermouth, orange bitters.
POP'S OLD FASHIONED
— 16
Rare Saint Rye, Jerry Thomas bitters, orange peel.
LIQUID LOVE AFFAIR
— 15
A tantalizing mix of Barkeep vodka, vanilla, passionfruit, pineapple and sparkling wine that ignites the senses with every sip.
LEMONDROP
— 15
Pure sunshine – Barkeep vodka, Il Tramonto Limoncello and fresh lemon juice.
ESPRESSO MARTINI
— 16
A fresh-brewed shot of Lavazza espresso shaken with Barkeep vodka, vanilla, Nocello, Kahlua and Bittermens chocolate bitters.
LOUNGE-WORTHY LIBATIONS
ROSA DEL SOL
— 15
A vibrant and radiant blend of El Tesoro Reposado tequila, Cocchi Rosa aperitivo, lemon and orange.
FLIRTING WITH FIRE
— 16
Smoky, sultry, and just a little dangerous – Woodford Reserve, Bozal Ensamble, hot honey, lemon, pineapple.
OLD CUBAN
— 15
Where vintage charm meets sparkling sophistication – Planteray Dark rum, lime, mint, and a touch of Jerry Thomas bitters topped with sparkling wine.
BLUSHING SQUIRREL
— 16
A playful throwback to the supper clubs of the '50s – Tempus Fugit crème de noyaux, Brizzard white cacao, cream, nutmeg.
SIGNATURE COCKTAILS
THE GATSBY
— 15
A refreshingly crisp and perfectly balanced gimlet, Hendrick's gin, fresh cucumber and lime.
FRENCH 75
— 15
Mr. Pickles gin, sparkling wine, lemon, and a touch of elderflower for a timeless cocktail experience.
MILLENIUM SIDEKICK
— 15
A tequila sidecar made with Siempre Plata, Ferrand Dry Curacao and lemon.
EL DORADO
— 16
Our signature margarita made with Hiatus blanco, Grand Marnier and lime.
VOODOO CHILD
— 16
Summoned from the smoky heart of New Orleans, a bewitching blend of Sazerac Rye, Pierre Ferrand cognac, Dolin's Rouge, Benedictine, bitters.
MILE HIGH CLUB
— 15
Fasten your seatbelt – this high-flying riff on the Paper Plane trades bourbon with Chairman's Reserve Spiced rum, Amaro Nonino, and Cocchi Rosa.
HUCKLEBERRY MULE
— 13
A refreshing twist on a mule made with Blue Ice Huckleberry vodka.
ZERO PROOF
SPARKLING SAPPHIRE
— 10
Fresh basil, blueberry, lemon, soda.
NEW AGED SPRITZ
— 15
Lyre's Italian Orange, Mionetto alcohol-removed Prosecco, soda.
SKINNY & SOBER
— 15
Almave alcohol-removed agave spirit, soda, lime.

About Brozinni Pizzeria

Brozinni Pizzeria is a family-friendly pizza place. Get a taste of New York right here in Indianapolis, featuring the Big Apple's signature crust, our famous buttery garlic knuckles and a great menu of Italian eats.

Brined chicken wings are tossed in our house dry rub, lightly smoked, and finished in the fryer. Tossed in your choice of Buffalo (mild), Nashville (hot), or Garlic Parmesan, and served with carrots, celery, and your choice of ranch or bleu cheese.

raw_text:
Dinner | The Italian House
top of page
Our Menu
Dinner
Appetizer
Italian Stuffed Artichokes
Three roasted artichoke bottoms, stuffed with a blend of zesty Italian sausage, fresh stewed vegetables and melted mozzarella. Served on a bed of baby arugula
$15
Mushroom & Truffle Flatbread
Oven baked, thin and crispy flatbread with a creamy ricotta truffle spread and roasted cremini and wild mushrooms. Topped with fresh baby arugula and drizzled with house made balsamic glaze.
$14
Fried Ravioli
Parmesan-breaded handmade pasta with a blend of ricotta, parmesan, mozzarella cheese and chives. Served with vodka sauce.
$14
Bruschetta
French bread toasted crostinis topped with a blend of chopped roma tomatoes, red onions, garlic and basil. Topped with shaved parmesan cheese and drizzled with house-made balsamic glaze.
$13
Calamari
Hand-cut rings and tentacles tossed and fried in seasoned flour. Topped with feta cheese and drizzled with house-made balsamic glaze.
$17
Roasted Tomato Ricotta Dip
Creamy whipped ricotta topped with oven-roasted cherry tomatoes, diced pancetta, fresh basil and chili infused honey. Served with garlic flatbread crisps.
$15
Salad
Caesar Salad
Two romaine wedges topped with Caesar dressing, red onion, and shaved parmesan.
$9
Horsey Blue Salad
Two baby lettuce wedges topped with Nyla’s creamy blue cheese dressing, crispy pancetta, croutons, red onions, and tomatoes.
$11
Beet Salad
Mixed greens tossed with a honey lemon vinaigrette. Topped with pickled red beets, goat cheese and candied walnuts.
$13
Italian Chopped Salad
Fresh chopped blend of iceberg and romaine lettuce. Combined with creamy parmesan dressing, diced cucumber, tomato and red onion. Finished with crispy prosciutto strips.
$12
House Salad
Mixed greens topped with roma tomatoes, red onions, pepperoncini, and shaved parmesan. Served with our house-made Italian dressing on the side.
$8
Caprese Burrata Salad
Fresh burrata mozzarella ball, served atop five thick cut tomato slices, layered with fresh basil. Drizzled with house-made balsamic glaze and basil olive oil.
$14
Meat & Seafood
Italian Stuffed Peppers
Red & green bell peppers stuffed with a savory blend of Italian sausage, tomato stewed couscous, and melty mozzarella cheese. Served atop hearty marinara sauce and pan-roasted asparagus.
$24
Mediterranean Branzino
7oz Branzino pan-seared, skin on. Served with house-made, stewed ratatouille vegetables.
$38
Seafood Mac & Cheese
A rich and creamy lobster cheese sauce, tossed with bay scallops, shrimp and langostino. Topped with toasted breadcrumbs and fresh basil.
$38
Chianti Braised Short Rib*
10 oz. short rib, slow braised with chianti wine. Served atop gnocchi with our house-made marinara sauce and mushrooms. Finished off with chianti au jus and whipped ricotta.
$42
Parmesan Crusted Grouper*
7 oz. parmesan crusted grouper filet. Served with linguine pasta in a tarragon cream sauce with sun-dried tomatoes and sautéed onion.
$44
Romesco Sea Scallops*
Three, pan-seared U-10 scallops. Served atop savory romesco sauce, baby smashed potatoes and sautéed mushrooms.
$46
Chicken & Prosciutto Tortellini
Fresh tortellini stuffed with chicken and prosciutto. Tossed in a creamy roasted pepper sauce with red bell peppers, chicken, prosciutto, and basil. Topped with fresh
shaved parmesan.
$26
Creamy Lemon & Leek Halibut*
7oz. Alaskan halibut, pan-seared, topped with a creamy lemon and leek puree and capers. Served with roasted artichokes & potatoes.
$44
Pasta
Gluten free pasta available for an additional $3

Substitute gluten free crostinis for $5
Frutti de Mare
A combination of shelled clams, mussels, scallop, jumbo shrimp and sautéed calamari tossed with a spicy marinara sauce and linguine pasta.
$30
Bucatini Amatriciana
A savory combination of thick cut pancetta, chopped tomatoes, roasted red bell peppers tossed with bucatini pasta. Topped with fresh basil and grated parmesan romano.
$25
Carbonara
Rustic, creamy carbonara sauce combined with pancetta, fresh cracked egg, peas, parmesan and spaghetti.
$24
Shrimp Scampi
Five jumbo shrimp tossed with linguine pasta in a white wine lemon garlic sauce. Topped with shaved parmesan.
$24
Sausage Orecchiette
Orecchiette pasta tossed with spicy Italian sausage, pancetta, red cabbage and fresh spinach, in a spicy white wine garlic sauce.
$21
Alfredo & Chicken Ricotta Meatballs
Creamy, garlic alfredo tossed with fresh spinach and fettuccine pasta. Topped with three homemade chicken ricotta meatballs and shaved parmesan cheese.
$22
Spaghetti and Meatballs
Spaghetti pasta tossed with our hearty tomato bolognese sauce. Topped with three house-made meatballs and shaved parmesan cheese.
$18
Alla Vodka
Fiery tomato cream sauce tossed with penne pasta. Topped with shaved parmesan.
$17
Eggplant Rollatini
Three roasted eggplant slices filled with velvety herbed ricotta atop marinara sauce. Served with spaghetti pasta and fresh basil.
$17
Lasagna
A blend of ground beef and pork layered with parmesan, mozzarella, and lasagna pasta. Topped with your choice of any two sauces.
Sauces: Red | Alfredo | Vodka | Bolgonese (+5)
$20

Food & Drink
Food

Cocktails & Wine
About Us
Twenty Below Brewing
Contact
Jobs
Craft. Beer. Bar.
Scroll
Welcome to Twenty Tap!
We're all about good vibes, great pub food, and awesome drinks. With 38 craft beers on tap—including our own brews from 20 Below—and a lineup of tasty cocktails, there's something for everyone. Come hang out, grab a bite, and enjoy the best in local flavors. Cheers!
Order Food To-Go
Join us for good food and drinks.
Food
Twenty Tap’s pub-inspired menu offers classic comfort foods with a creative edge, featuring options for everyone. Enjoy hearty burgers, unique sandwiches, and plenty of vegan and vegetarian dishes.
View our food menu
Beer
Our beer menu features 38 rotating taps of well-curated craft beers, including several local and regional options. Our basement brewery, 20 Below Brewing, offers several in-house brews as well. We post a new beer menu weekly, so check back for updates!
View our Beer Menu
Cocktails & Wine
Our cocktail and wine menus are thoughtfully curated to complement everyone’s tastes . Our cocktail selection emphasizes fresh ingredients and high-quality craft spirits, and our wine list features carefully chosen varietals that pair perfectly with our menu.
View Our Cocktails & Wine Menu
Yes- we brew our own beer!
Twenty Below Brewing is our in-house brewery, crafting small batch, seasonal beers to match every occasion. To see what we’ve been brewing recently,
check the beer list
!

About Brozinni Pizzeria
✻
Brozinni Pizzeria is a family-friendly pizza place. Get a taste of New York right here in Indianapolis, featuring the Big Apple's signature crust, our famous buttery garlic knuckles and a great menu of Italian eats.
Additional Info
✻
Dine-in and carry-out are available at all locations.
Check our locations for hours of operation and menu options.
Catering and corporate events available.
We can even bring our food truck to you!
Our Speedway location has event space as well.

STARTER
A dinner at St. Elmo Steak House traditionally begins with our famous St. Elmo Shrimp Cocktail – served since 1902.
St. Elmo Shrimp Cocktail®
4 jumbo shrimp served with our spicy, signature cocktail sauce.   19.95
SALADS

The St. Elmo USDA Prime Dry-Aged Beef program sources from corn fed Midwest Black Angus cattle. Traditionally dry-aged then hand cut to our exact specifications; the dry-aging process produces a more robust and intense flavor.

Ten Hands Social Bar and Eatery is the ultimate gathering place in downtown Indy.
Located inside The Westin Indianapolis, join us at Ten Hands for a contemporary American menu including fresh pizza straight from our brick oven, dishes using the freshest ingredients and a full bar with the largest TV screens downtown. Pop in the Ten Hands Market for a morning cup of La Colombe coffee or a quick snack between meetings.

Private Events
Looking for a space to gather in and celebrate? Book our private dining space for ten or more guests, contact our sales team to start planning your next event.
Ten Hands Market
Ten Hands Market is your destination for snacks on the go, breakfast before a long day of meetings, and handcrafted lattes and coffees to get you ready for the day. Savor a fresh, brick oven baked pizza for lunch or dinner with your choice of toppings.

*Gluten Free
Everything on our menu is made in house and from scratch.
We proudly serve products from local and regional farms and businesses such as:
Angelo's Italian Market (Fishers, IN), Capriole Farms (Greenville, IN), Dewig Meats (Haubstadt, IN), Eli Creek (Connersville, IN), Freedom Run Farm (Glendale, KY), Full Hand Farms (Noblesville, IN), Maple Leaf Farms (Leesburg, IN), Miller Poultry (Orland, IN), Tulip Tree (Indianapolis, IN)
Consuming raw or uncooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.

name: Woody's Library Restaurant
raw_text:
Menus - Woodys Library Restaurant
Home
Menus
Events
Loyalty sign up
Contact
Our menu offers a range of options including appetizers, salads, sandwiches, entrees & daily features.
We also offer gluten-free, lactose-free & vegan options throughout the menu.
The wine list has been given the "Indy's Top 10 Wine List Award" & is a great value by the glass, half carafe or bottle.  Woodys has bottled & draft beer selections that showcases local craft beers in addition to the regional favorites.  We offer a full bar for the mixed drink of your choice.
Happy Hour is available everyday from 3-5pm. Follow us on
Facebook
or
Instagram
for specials.
The kitchen closes at 9pm Sunday - Monday and at 10pm on Tuesday - Saturday.

printable PDF
of the current menu.

Catering
Reviews
Review by - Google
Mary Bell:
I ordered takeout. I did the create your own calzone with vegan cheese which was actually really good!! I added lots of veggies too, they have a great selection. This thing was enormous. It has a garlicy slighty crispy outer crust   staff was friendly & the place looked really cute for dine in. I'll definitely be back
Review by - Google
Meg Richmond:
Carry out was super easy to order on the website. The lasagna was delicious and the gluten-free calzone was a big hit with our guest who was excited to see such an extensive gluten free menu. Portions are huge with lots for leftovers and incredibly reasonably priced! We had a little mixup with the order and they were very gracious in making it right. Happy to support local!
Review by - Google
Bill Brown:
If you are a pizza lover or spaghetti fan then you should stop in. Spaghetti with marinara, garlic bread salad. Can't go wrong. There are several kinds of bread sticks too. I recommend the Ryan's Breadsticks. Stuffed with cheese and pepperoni. When it's warm enough they offer outdoor seating as well. Lots of menu items.
Review by - Google
Brittany Crenshaw:
Not only those this restaurant have some of the best gluten free food ever they also have amazing customer service. I got take out and when I got home saw that they gave me the wrong item. I called them and they delivered it to my house and it was fresh and just made. Awesome!
Review by - Google
Jim Brahos:
I dont usually review a restaurant baised on one visit, but this was so good I'll make an exception.  Its a small is joint with that mom and pop feel (I don't know if it really is as I did not see mom or pop) and amazing food. They have all kids of different cheese sticks that are delish along with the usual Italian dishes you would expect...

There may be small bones or shells in some fish and shellfish. Wine and various foods contain sulphites. Consuming raw and undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness, especially if you have any chronic illnesses of the liver, stomach, blood, or any type of immune disorder. Some foods, though rigorously tested, may contain certain microorganisms that can, in rare circumstances, cause reactions in some people. We are not responsible for an individual’s allergic reaction to our food. If you are unsure of your risk, ask your server and/or contact a physician.

Our Menu
September Prix Fixe Menu
A La Carte Menu
Parlor Room Special
This menu is all inclusive.
Complete dinner includes :
3 starters, one entrée, one dessert and  one beverage.
$45.00
Reservations Recommended for our formal dining room.
Starters
Cured Italian meats and cheese wrapped in Puff Pastry
Thinly sliced Italian meats are layered with cheese inside a sheet of puff pastry, creating a perfect balance of salty, creamy, and crispy textures. The pastry is then folded around the filling and baked until golden brown. The result is a crisp outer shell that gives way to a luscious, melty center, with the cured meats providing a subtle depth of flavor.
Focaccia with Marinara
A basket of Italian yeast bread made with imported Italian flour freshly baked  and served with warm marinara sauce and an herb-infused extra virgin olive oil.
Spring Mix Salad
A refreshing house salad featuring a fresh, tender spring mix, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers and fresh shredded carrots. perfectly complemented by Mama Lou’s beloved, house-made vinaigrette.
Choice of Entree
Italian Sausage and peppers in a spicy Rosa Sauce
Tender chunks of sweet Italian sausage and tri-color bell peppers, simmered in a velvety rosa sauce—a vibrant blend of robust marinara and rich heavy cream. Served over our handmade Fettuccini pasta. Order spicy or not it's your choice.
Chicken Cacciatore stuffed shells
A cozy, baked casserole of  Conchiglie shells , brimming with a savory mixture of roasted chicken, ricotta, and melted mozzarella. Smothered in a hearty tomato-basil cacciatore sauce  then baked until the cheese is hot and bubbling. A classic Italian- American  comfort dish.
Chicken Marsala with Fettuccine
Tender chicken breast paired with sautéed baby bella mushrooms, all simmered in a luxurious blend of rich stock and Marsala wine, tossed in our freshly made fettuccine pasta. This dish offers an elegant fusion of flavors that promises to satisfy.
Pesto with Spaghetti and Vegetable Primavera
VEGETERIAN Fresh cut broccoli, cauliflower,zuccini and yellow squash simmered in a light Pesto vegetarian sauce then tossed with fresh handmade spaghetti pasta.
Chicken Piccata with Fettuccine
Succulent chicken breast sautéed to perfection in a luscious sauce made with rich butter, white wine, and zesty capers, then tossed in our freshly made fettuccine pasta. This delightful dish creates a harmonious blend of flavors and textures that elevates the palate.
Spaghetti and Meatballs
This classic Italian American dish is made with Mama Lu's meatballs and fresh spaghetti handmade in our kitchen served with our all day cooked marinara sauce and topped with freshly grated Parmigiana reggiano imported from Italy.
Chicken Alfredo with Fettuccini
Tender, moist brined chicken breast seared then simmered in a creamy flavorful white sauce. Then tossed with handmade fettuccini noodles.
Choice of Dolce
Chef Tony's Cheesecake
This is a cheesecake like no other, with a soft cream mix that’s perfectly formed to create a sinfully delicate texture, it’s the best made-from-scratch cheesecake you will ever have!
Velvety Chocolate Cheese Cake
Indulge in a velvety chocolate cheesecake with an ultra-rich, melt-in-your-mouth texture and deep chocolate flavor, all on a buttery chocolate infused graham cracker crust.
Rich and Tender Chocolate Cake
Imagine a bite of pure chocolate bliss! Our chocolate cake offers a symphony of flavors and textures, from the rich, dark chocolate to the moist, tender crumb and a touch of vanilla. A true dessert experience.
Pizzella Cannoli
Delicate, crispy pizzelle cookies rolled into cannoli shells and filled with a rich, creamy blend of ricotta, powdered sugar, mascarpone, and cinnamon. Infused with vanilla and studded with mini chocolate chips, then lightly dusted with powdered sugar for the perfect sweet finish. A unique twist on a classic Italian dessert!

About us

Receptions, Dinners
The Flatiron at The Old Elbow Room is a "Vintage American Restaurant & Bar" on the Northside of Downtown Indianapolis. The menu features shareable street snacks, sandwiches and entrees that complement a premium casual vibe.  Also, shhhhhhhh don't tell anyone about our other amenities.

Reviews
review by - Google
Bryan Alexander:
Went on a whim...... Glad we did    Fantastic!!   Food is delicious.   Flavor is off the charts.     Very pleasing to the eye on the plate.     Maybe my new favorite place downtown to take a date or for a business dinner.   Far exceeded my expectations.    Don't skip this place .... A gem
review by - Google
Todd Troha:
We had a group in town for the weekend and were fortunate enough to end up at The Flatiron.  We got there late with a group of 10 and they treated us like royalty.  We ordered apps (all good), wine (all great) and the best food we found all weekend.  Chef was back there working hard so I asked that he prepare anything that he really wanted to cook...
review by - Google
Prasad Nair:
We loved this restaurant. It has got a nice vibe to it as you enter. Everything we are was delicious. Started with some fries and a vegetarian flatbread. Both were well made. The fries were perfect by themselves, but the chef also have us complementary brussel sprouts which was perfectly seasoned and crisp...
review by - Google
Pooja Gangras:
We had the perfect date here! We ordered from the Devour Indy summerfest menu- bean fritters, pork BLT on grits, pork filet mignon, shrimp and grits, chocolate torte and sticky toffee pudding. The food here is excellent! The flavour of shrimp is so elevated and the chocolate torte is decadent...
review by - Google
Dan Nolan:
We just stumbled upon this place because it started to rain and we were looking for a dinner place. We luckily got the last table. We had a phenomenal dining experience. Great cocktails, great service and awesome food. My wife got the bone in pork chop and we both agreed it was one of the best things we’ve ever eaten...

Jamaican Breeze Sports Bar & Grill is a family friendly restaurant that specializes in Jamaican cuisine wrapped in a tropical, sports-filled, inviting atmosphere. Jamaican Breeze offers the authentic, "chilled and laid back" environment of the beautiful island people while offering real food with amazing flavors.

The Original Chicago's Pizza
Enjoy Greenwood's best pizzas at some of the top pizza restaurants in the area.

The Original Chicago's Pizza is one of the most popular in Greenwood. Try their pizza, and you'll soon see why.

Try some of Greenwood's best dishes at independent pizzerias in the city. Find new favorites and get a taste of what Greenwood has to offer. You can't say you've been to The Original Chicago's Pizza until you've tried Butter Chicken Pasta. This classic local favorite is what this establishment is known for.

Add soda to your pizza for a more satisfying meal. It's a great addition to any pizza from The Original Chicago's Pizza.

The Original Chicago's Pizza has been a Slice partner since 2020. They've been serving the local community for a while now, so you can rely on them providing great pizza. Call ahead and get curbside pickup at The Original Chicago's Pizza. It's never been easier to get hot, fresh pizza to go. You can also try The Original Chicago's Pizza's other locations. There's sure to be one near you. Make your money stretch further by taking advantage of special offers at The Original Chicago's Pizza. The only thing better than pizza is pizza at an affordable price.

You can pay by credit card at The Original Chicago's Pizza. That makes it easy to get your pizza as quickly as possible.

name: Ralston's Drafthouse
raw_text:
APPETIZERS
Loaded House Fries
‘Merica Cheese Fries
Beer-battered fries topped with choice of Ralston’s bourbon-barrel beer cheese or Ralston’s white cheese sauce, bacon, & chives $11
Reuben Fries
House-made corned beef, sauerkraut, 1,000 island dressing, & Ralston’s white cheese sauce on our beer-battered fries $12
The Yogi
Beer-battered fries topped with Ralston’s white cheese sauce, pico de gallo, sweet corn-jicama mix, guacamole, & sour cream $11
Square Mile Wings
12 chicken wings seasoned in-house with our very own dry rub then oven-roasted to perfection.
Our house-made wing sauces incorporate some our favorite beers from around the world and here in Indiana.
Choose from: Kolsch hot sauce, Stout bourbon barbeque, Hefeweizen peach chipotle, Blood-orange IPA honey lime-mint, or try
our wings with a sampling of all 4 of our house made wing sauces $15
Sweet Potato Fries
Waffle-cut sweet potatoes with a whipped cream cheese, cinnamon, and brown sugar dip $8.50
Soft Pretzels
Served with house-made spicy and honey mustards and bourbon-barrel beer cheese $9.50
Spicy Crab and Spinach Dip
Oven-baked Crab claw meat, spinach, mayo, cream cheese, cheddar, and sriracha served with grilled Italian bread $12
Quesadilla
12 inch flour tortilla with fresh mozzarella cheese
Chicken and bacon with smoky Portuguese sauce $11, Chorizo & Fresh Jalapenos $10, steak, onions, and cilantro $11 or
Mushroom, Onion, & Red Peppers $10
The Book of Danart Nachos
Corn tortilla chips topped with Ralston’s white cheese sauce, fresh pico de gallo, sour cream, sweet corn-jicama mix, and
guacamole $10 Chapter 1: Add chorizo $11.50 Chapter 2: Add chicken $12 Chapter 3: Add pulled pork $13
SALADS
Dressings: Ranch, Bleu Cheese, Pomegranate Balsamic, Champagne Vinaigrette,
Honey Mustard, Mustard Vinaigrette, Red Pepper Vinaigrette
Cucumber and Heirloom Tomato Spinach Salad
Cucumber, heirloom tomatoes, spinach, shallots, fresh mozzarella, thyme, sea salt, peppercorns, & red pepper Vinaigrette $11
Pear and Gorgonzola Salad
A spinach & kale mix topped with fresh pears, gorgonzola, & falafel rounds with Ralston’s mustard vinaigrette $11
Turkey and Ham Cobb Salad
Shredded mixed greens, topped with house-made pulled turkey, ham, eggs, bacon, avocado, cucumbers, tomato, and shallots
with a side of house-made ranch $12
Pomegranate Balsamic Salad
Spring mix topped with grilled chicken, sliced apple, craisins, avocado, and aged cheddar with a side of pomegranate balsamic
vinaigrette $12
AVAILABLE SIDES
House-made Sea-Salt & Vinegar Potato Chips, Lemon-Champagne Cucumber Slaw,
Fried Rosemary Potatoes, Pearl Couscous, Seasonal Fruit Cocktail, Greek Yogurt
Sub Beer-Battered Fries $2.50 Sub Sweet Potato Fries $2.50 Sub Onion Straws $2.50
TRADITIONAL SANDWICHES
Substitute Brioche Bun, Pretzel Bun, Ciabatta, Soft Hoagie Roll, or Rye bread on any sandwich
Ralston’s Recession Burger
Ground beef seared on a flat top grill, topped with house-made bourbon-barrel beer cheese, Nueske’s bacon, arugula, & our house-
made ketchup & spicy mustard on a pretzel bun $13.50
Goat Cheese and Maple Bacon Burger
Half-pound ground beef patty topped with Nueske’s maple bacon, goat cheese, arugula, and Ralston’s ketchup on a pretzel bun
$13.50
Onion Mushroom and Brie Burger
Half-pound ground beef patty with sautéed onions, sautéed cremini mushrooms, and brie on a pretzel bun $13.50
Spicy BBQ Breaded Tenderloin
Breaded and fried tenderloin seasoned with house-made spicy BBQ blend, topped with mustard slaw and served on a pretzel
bun $12.50
Bourbon Glazed Pullem BBQ Sandwich
Choice of Slow-roasted pulled pork or pulled chicken with our house-made Stout Bourbon BBQ on a pretzel bun $12
The Hot Mess
Grilled chicken breast topped with aged cheddar, arugula, avocado, Nueske’s bacon, and sriracha mayo on a pretzel bun $13
Ham, Fig, & Swiss Grilled Cheese
Ham, fig jam, and swiss cheese grilled on ciabatta $11
Pinkies-Out BLT
Nueske’s smoked bacon, goat cheese, house-made tomato jam, arugula, on ciabatta $11
The New Yorker
Thick-cut pastrami piled high on baker’s rye with a side of house-made spicy mustard $11
Doc’s Crabcake Sliders
2 Crabcake patties seared in sesame oil topped with spicy crab sauce, avocado, & micro greens $12.50
Kuzola’s Spicy Spinner
Pepper-encrusted skirt steak, habanero relish, macadamia nuts, arugula, coconut on ciabatta $12
Going Hot Turkey
Grilled turkey breast, cilantro aioli, heirloom tomato, aged cheddar, arugula, Nueske’s bacon on ciabatta $12
Grouper Sandwich
Grouper filet served with Ralston’s tartar sauce and a mustard slaw on a soft hoagie bun. Your choice of grilled, blackened, or
breaded $12.50
*Consuming raw or undercooked meat may increase your chances of food-borne illnesses.

Ratatouille

house-made marinara $11
The Cremini Mushroom

Philly Flatbread

The Peachy Pig
Oven-baked flatbread topped with pulled pork, aged cheddar, ginger, cilantro, and a hefeweizen peach-chipotle reduction $12
Perfect Personal Pepperoni Peppadew Pizza

Black and Bleu Chicken

The Holyoke

House Specialty

chicken $11, steak $11.50, or fish $12 and choice of side

About

Menu
Famous 3 Course Meals
Menu items and prices can vary by location.  Please contact The Old Spaghetti Factory near you for specific information.
Every entree at The Old Spaghetti Factory is served with hot fresh baked bread, soup or crisp green salad, and a scoop of our signature spumoni or vanilla ice cream. Our menu is full of flavorful value that feels just like home.
View Your Location’s Menu
Appetizers
Sicilian Garlic Cheese Bread
A generous portion of fresh bread topped with a tasty blend of garlic and three melted cheeses served toasted with a side of our homemade Marinara Sauce. (1220 cal)
Salad
Chicken Caesar Salad
Lightly breaded chicken breast strips atop romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, shredded Romano cheese, and croutons.  (1120 cal)
Without chicken (820 cal)
Served with soup (100-320 cal) and spumoni ice cream (170 cal)
Founder's Favorites
Our Famous Baked Lasagna
Layers of noodles, Marinara Sauce, ground beef and pork, and four delicious cheeses.  (820 cal)
Gourmet Jumbo Crab Ravioli
Large ravioli stuffed with savory crab meat and ricotta cheese topped with a rich Pesto Alfredo Sauce. (810 cal)
Garlic Mizithra
Spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter tossed with a delicious blend of sautéed garlic, bacon,
and mushrooms. (1360 cal)
Spaghetti Vesuvius
A spicy blend of tender chicken, sausage, and diced meatballs with green peppers and onions. Seasoned with Tabasco® and Sambal Chili Paste. (860 cal)
Savory Chicken
Chicken Parmigiana
A perfectly seasoned breast of tender chicken with melted cheese and Pomodoro Sauce. Served with spaghetti and Marinara Sauce. (750 cal)
Breast of Chicken Fettuccine
Fettuccine topped with tender diced chicken breast, fresh broccoli, sautéed mushrooms, Alfredo Sauce, and shredded Romano cheese. (1260 cal)
Chicken Marsala
A freshly seasoned breast of tender chicken with a Mushroom and Marsala Wine Sauce. Served alongside spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter. (1000 cal)
Pasta Classics
Served over the finest 100% durum semolina spaghetti.
Marinara Sauce
Our from scratch recipe of fresh onions, carrots, tomatoes, and garlic sautéed in olive oil and Italian seasonings.  (560 cal)
Rich Meat Sauce
Mamma Mia!  Our 1969 original from scratch recipe of perfectly ripe tomatoes and ground beef sautéed with freshly chopped onions, celery, and garlic, all simmered slowly to perfection with savory Italian herbs and spices.  Delizioso!  (650 cal)
White Clam Sauce
Our from scratch recipe for clam lovers – with hints of wine, fresh garlic, green peppers, onions and parsley.  (810 cal)
Mushroom Sauce
Our from scratch Marinara sauce topped with freshly sautéed seasoned mushrooms.  (670 cal)
Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter
A toothsome treat for cheese lovers.  (1190 cal)
The Manager’s Favorite
Pair any two of the above Classic Sauces to create our favorite combination.  (600-1000 cal)
Pot Pourri
A sampler of Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter, Meat, Clam and Marinara Sauces.  (880 cal)
Hearty Meal
A larger serving of our Pasta Classics or Factory Favorites entrees. (950-1990 cal)
Factory Favorites
Italian Sausage with Meat Sauce
Zesty sausage served with our from scratch Rich Meat Sauce.  (980 cal)
Sicilian Meatballs
Two large handmade beef meatballs delicately seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices, then topped with our from scratch Marinara Sauce.  (1040 cal)
Meat Lover’s Treat
Sicilian meatballs, Italian sausage and spaghetti with
Rich Meat Sauce. (1460 cal)
Hearty Meal
A larger serving of our Pasta Classics or Factory Favorites entrees. (950-1990 cal)
Signature Pastas
Fettuccine Alfredo
Fettuccine noodles in a butter cream sauce with shredded Romano cheese. (1090 cal)
Spinach & Cheese Ravioli
Ravioli stuffed with spinach and two delicious cheeses, and topped with our savory Marinara Sauce. (470 cal)
Spinach Tortellini with Alfredo Sauce
Hat shaped pasta, stuffed with a blend of roasted chicken and Mortadella meats, and Romano cheese. (940 cal)
Sides
Fresh Broccoli
Broccoli lightly flavored with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter. A great compliment to any entrée!

Canal Bistro
Home
Restaurant

Menu

Canal Creamery
Welcome
ORDER CARRYOUT
DELIVERY
CANAL BISTRO MEDITERRANEAN grille
Family owned and operated, Canal Bistro brings the sights, smells, and flavors of the Mediterranean to Broad Ripple.
Welcome to our kitchen!
You are about to experience the freshest, tastiest, most authentic Mediterranean food you can get without a passport. Dine inside where you can watch your food being prepared, outside by the canal on our beautiful patio, or call ahead for carryout.
Our patio is dog-friendly!
Enjoy a unique blend of delectable cuisine from our seasoned chefs in a one-of-a-kind atmosphere to give you that memorable experience that will keep you coming back. The menu presents an eclectic blend of traditional fare. Add some excitement to your experience by pairing your meal with our select wines or specialty cocktails. We hope you join us soon!
Planning a larger sized gathering?
Take us into consideration as we can cater to your needs, including outstanding server attentiveness and platter menus.
Looking to cater an event, big or small?
We have catering down to a science & can work with you to offer the perfect dishes for your event!
Questions? Feel free to give us a call or shoot us an email so we can best serve you.
Phone
(317) 254-8700
Location
6349 Guilford Ave
Indianapolis, IN
46220
ORDER ONLINE
Hours
M-Th
11a–8:30p
Fri
11a–9:30p
Sat
10a–9:30p
Sun
10a–8:30p
BRUNCH HOURS
Sat
10a - 1p
Sun
10a - 1p
ORDER CARRYOUT
ORDER DELIVERY
OUR STORY
The Canal Bistro is the realization of a dream for Mona and George.
George’s homeland is Egypt; Mona spent her first 23 years in Lebanon. They know Mediterranean cooking. George has been in the restaurant business for 22 years. And over the years, Mona watched her mother and grandmother cook for their big family from their own herb and vegetable gardens, learning the value of freshness in cooking.
When she’s not at work Mona’s home cooking up a storm for family and friends. “Our house is known as the ‘fun house’ – huge amounts of food, big parties,” George says. “It’s been our dream to open our own place, to be creative with cuisine, and to have a family business that our sons can be part of.”
The Canal Bistro is that dream. “It’s like you’ve come to one of our parties – we’ve basically just moved our kitchen from home to here,” they say. “We put the grill in the dining room because we want people to know that we are using top quality ingredients, and that freshness is our goal, so everything is done right in front of you.”
So eat up relax be happy. You’re eating in a dream come true!

Shredded beef, chicken, or ground beef with lettuce, tomato, cheese, corn, black bean salsa, sour cream in flour tortilla shell.

Choice of meat with rice, beans, pico de gallo, corn, shredded cheese, sour cream. Options: Shredded Chicken, Shredded Beef, Ground Beef, Carnitas, Pastor. Steak +$1.75, Shrimp +$3.

Quick Hits
Need fixings for a group now? We got ya covered. These offers are available for pickup within hours of ordering.
Chip & Dip Party
Your choice of three 32oz dips. Served with chips.
Order Now
Taco Bar
Includes your choice of taco shells, two proteins, two sauces, and toppings: lettuce, tomato, cilantro & onions, jicama slaw, red cabbage, corn salsa, and smoked cheddar in 2 containers.
Order Now
Nacho Bar
Everything you need to build your own nachos! This nacho bar comes with housemade tortilla chips, your choice of protein, queso blanco, two sauces, and lots of toppings.
Order Now
Triple Chocolate Brownies
Housemade with cocoa, semi-sweet & milk chocolate chips, a hint of cinnamon, and topped with sea salt
Order Now
FAV
Catering Items
10 Person Nacho Bar
Housemade tortilla chips, your choice of protein, queso blanco, two sauces, and lots of toppings.
Order Now
Loaded Tots
Diced poblanos and queso included, and choose from three signature options: Loaded, Smoked Cheddar Bacon, or Simple.
Order Now
Side Box
Craving the ideal add-on for your meal? Look no further than our Side Box! Your choice of three signature sides: Loaded Cater Tots, Mexican Street Corn, Rice, Black Beans, or Refried Beans.
Order Now
Crave Bowls
Craving a packed bowl? Try any of our five new Crave bowls. From High Protein to Vegan, we have the perfect bowl to fit any lifestyle.

About the Business
At Tlaolli we pride ourselves on having something for everyone. Carnivore? We’ve got you covered with five tacos to choose from or entrees served on rice. Vegan? No problem! We have three phenomenal vegan tacos and two highly popular vegan sandwiches. All of our tamales are made with olive oil for a healthy heart. Try a little of everything with our Mix and Match option!

shrimp
mahi mahi
Slapfish...well...SLAPS!!!
I have yet to eat something here that didn't leave me satisfied, wondering if I need a box, or thinking "is it okay to eat a clobster grill cheese for breakfast"?!?
The burrito is massive and you'll enjoy it more if you'll just be honest with yourself that half is for now and half is for later.
The fried pickles are just that...fried PICKLES...not little bitty chips...big old "I thought you said you liked pickles" spears! These are actually my favorite appetizer even though they're listed as a side.
-- jon
My favorite thing on the menu is the clobster grilled cheese! It's like someone heard that seafood and cheese didn't mixed and took it personal...went into the kitchen...and came up with the most decadent, buttery, cheesy, and luscious sandwich possible!

317-546-3508
About Us
La Cantina Mexican Restaurant serves original Mexican food thanks to our experienced chef.
We offer dine-in, takeout, and catering options. We need a notice of at least three days in advance while catering. Please note that catering items need to be picked up from the restaurant as we don't offer a delivery service.

About the Business
Business owner information
Adrian S.
Business Owner
Samano's is more than just Mexican food, it's an escape to México. We want our patrons to feel as if they're eating at a Taquería in the streets of Mexico City!

We may be considered "fast food" but everything on our menu is made to order with fresh ingredients. Stop in for our specialty, traditional Mexican style tacos. We offer grilled seasoned chicken, steak, chorizo, or pastor served on warm corn tortillas and topped with cilantro and onion! The Pastor (marinated pork) is slow roasted on a vertical spit with pineapple and onion, exactly how it's prepared in Mexico.

Ever heard of a bacon wrapped burrito? Well we've got one! The Adrian's Burrito is uniquely wrapped in crispy bacon and is sure to conquer even the biggest of appetites!

And the best part? Our salsa bar. With a variety of homemade salsas you can spice up and customize your favorite dish exactly how you like it!
…

SHAREABLES
SAUCES: Extra sauce $.99 per
Sahm’s Mustard Sauce • Columbus (Buffalo Mustard) • Honey Mustard • Buffalo (Mild) • Buffayaki • Cheese Sauce • Bleu Cheese • Chipotle Aioli • Teriyaki Sesame • BBQ • Spicy Garlic • Horsey • Ranch • Nashville(Hot) • Garlic Parmesan • House Tomato Sauce • Salsa Roja • Salsa Verde
SAHM’S NACHOS
$10.99
Whole corn tortillas topped with sour cream, cheddar jack, broiled, quartered and served with lettuce and your choice of salsa roja or verde.
Add southwest chicken, chorizo or taco beef +$3.00
SPICY GARLIC CAULIFLOWER
$12.99
Cauliflower is beer-battered, fried, and tossed in spicy garlic with your choice of ranch or bleu cheese.
CHICKEN WINGS (12/6)
$16.99 / $11.99
12 large chicken wings fried and tossed in your choice of wing sauce. Served with celery, carrot sticks, and your choice of dressing.
STUFFED MUSHROOM CAPS
$11.49
Mushroom caps sautéed in cognac butter, stuffed with spinach parmesan mix, topped with mozzarella and broiled.
CHEESE CURDS
$11.99
Wisconsin white cheddar cheese curds fried in Big Lug beer batter and served with your choice of any two sauces.
CHICKEN AVOCADO QUESADILLA
$12.99
Jumbo flour tortilla filled with Southwest chicken, cheddar jack, black bean corn salsa and avocado and grilled. Served with chipotle slaw, sour cream and your choice of salsa roja or verde.
MINI VEGGIE CIGARS (10)
$11.99
Veggies sautéed, mixed with cream cheese and herbs, stuffed in wonton wraps and fried. Served with a side of teriyaki sesame.
BREADSTICKS (5)
$7.99
Homemade breadsticks brushed with roasted garlic butter and served with your choice of any two sauces.
SPINACH ARTICHOKE DIP
$11.99
Homemade spinach artichoke dip baked and served hot with your choice of tortilla chips or focaccia crostini.
CHEESY BREAD
$7.99
Homemade focaccia topped with roasted garlic butter, fresh ricotta, mozzarella, and asiago parmesan blend and baked. Served with house tomato sauce.
CHICKEN TENDERS
$11.99
Chicken tenders lightly battered, fried, and served with your choice of any two sauces.
FRENCH FRIES BASKET
$8.99
Topped with seasoning salt. Served with your choice of any sauce.
LOADED FRIES BASKET
$12.99
Bacon, cheese, scallions. Served with your choice of any sauce.
BREADED CAULIFLOWER BASKET
$11.99
Served with your choice of any sauce.
BREADED MUSHROOMS BASKET
$10.99
Served with your choice of any sauce.

$9.99
Served with your choice of any sauce.
QUESO FUNDIDO
$11.99
House blend chorizo sausage layered with cheeses and broiled. Served with tortilla chips.
SALADS & SOUPS
All salads served with a slice of Sahm’s famous coffee cake.
DRESSING: Extra dressing $.99 per–Parmesan Vinaigrette • Ranch • Balsamic Vinaigrette • Lemon & Red Pepper Vinaigrette • Sesame Soy Vinaigrette • Coconut Green Goddess (Vegan) • Cranberry Poppyseed • Bleu Cheese • Honey Mustard • Caesar
PROTEIN: Shrimp +$6.00 • Steak +$6.00 • Salmon +$7.00 • Chicken +$4.00 • Chorizo +$4.00. Protein substitutions are welcome and will only charge the difference in protein price from the listed menu item.
CAESAR
$9.99 | 1⁄2 $6.99
Romaine lettuce tossed in our Caesar dressing and topped with asiago, parmesan and homemade croutons.
CHICKEN CRANBERRY
$14.99 | 1⁄2 $11.99
Mixed greens tossed in our cranberry poppyseed dressing and topped with grilled chicken breast, dried cranberries, cucumbers, roasted walnuts, and feta.
SHRIMP GODDESS
$17.49 | 1⁄2 $14.49

COBB
$15.99 | 1⁄2 $12.49
Grilled chicken breast, grape tomatoes, smoked Indiana bacon, hard-boiled egg, avocado, scallions, and bleu cheese crumbles served over mixed lettuce with your choice of any dressing.
AVOCADO
$11.99 | 1⁄2 $8.99
Avocados, black bean corn salsa, and feta served over mixed greens with your choice of any dressing.
ROASTED BEET & ARUGULA
$12.99 | 1⁄2 $9.99
Roasted beets, feta, pistachios and peppadew peppers served over arugula and mixed greens with balsamic vinaigrette.
ROMAN CHOP
$15.99 | 1⁄2 $12.99

VEGGIE CHOP
$12.99 | $9.99

WILLIE’S SPECIAL
$14.99 | 1⁄2 $11.99

GREEK
$11.99 | 1⁄2 $8.99
Mixed greens tossed in balsamic vinaigrette, topped with grape tomatoes, black olives, red onions, cucumbers, feta and peppadew peppers.
SOUTHWEST TACO
$14.99 | 1⁄2 $11.99
Your choice of taco beef or Southwest chicken, cheddar jack, pico de gallo, scallions and tortilla straws served over mixed greens with ranch and your choice of salsa roja or verde.
ASIAN CHICKEN
$14.99 | 1⁄2 $11.99

FISH SANDWICH

BUFFALO CHICKEN SANDWICH
