TACOS: LA SOLUCIÓN A TODOS TUS PROBLEMAS.
De Asada a Cabeza, de Camarón a Pastor. El taco que buscas, lo tenemos.
Tacos Regulares $3.99 Cada Uno
Asada, Pastor, Chorizo, Carnitas, Pollo y Campechano.
Tacos de Carnes Especiales $4.99 Cada Uno
Lengua, Tripa, Cueritos de Cerdo, Oreja de Cerdo, Cesina y Cabeza.
Tacos de Mariscos $4.99 Cada Uno
Camarón y Pescado |Servido con repollo y salsa cremosa de chipotle.
Tacos de Tinga de Pollo $4.99 Cada Uno
3 tacos con pollo deshebrado en salsa de chipotle, crema, jitomate, cebolla y cilantro.
4
5
BIRRIA: L
A RECETA QUE PUSO AL MUNDO A DIPPEAR.
La auténtica de Tijuana. Hecha para un buen chapuzón en su consomé.
Tacos de Birria (3 Tacos) $14.99
Tres tacos rellenos de birria de res, acompañados de cebolla, cilantro, queso derretido y servidos con consomé.
QuesaBirria (12”)  $13.99
Quesadilla grande (12”) rellena de birria, cebolla, cilantro, queso derretido y acompañada de consomé.
Ramen Birria  $14.99
Fideos ramen servidos en un rico caldo de birria, con cebolla, cilantro, queso mozzarella y especias tradicionales.
Platillo de Birria  $16.99
Suave birria de res servida con arroz, frijoles, cebolla, cilantro, tortillas calientes, un toque casero y especias tradicionales.
Pizza Birria — 10" | 14" | $15.99 | $24.00
Pizza con queso derretido, cubierta de jugosa birria, cebolla, cilantro, acompañada de consomé y especias caseras.
Birria con Consomé $14.99
Suave birria de res servida con consomé, cebolla, cilantro, tortillas calientes y un toque de sazón casero.
Burrito de Birria $13.99
Tortilla de harina rellena de birria, arroz, frijoles, queso, fajitas, cebolla, cilantro, crema, aguacate y sazón casero especial.
Bowl de Birria $13.99
Tazón de arroz con birria, frijoles, queso, fajitas, cebolla, cilantro, crema, aguacate y toque especial de la casa.
4
5
SOLO PARA HAMBRE DE VERDAD.
Ármate una Cemita Poblana, una Torta de las buenas, un Burrito de los que llenan o nuestra Hamburguesa con sazón. Advertido estás.
Cemita Poblana $14.99
La clásica de Puebla. El balance perfecto entre el picor del chipotle, aguacate y el auténtico queso mexicano. Un clásico que no falla.
Cemita Especial  $16.99
La clásica, pero elevada. Le agregamos jamón para llevarla a otro nivel. El mismo sabor poblano con un toque extra de poder y antojo.
Cemita Cubana  $17.99
La bestia de la casa. Salchicha, huevo y jamón se unen en un monstruo de sabor. Solo apta para conocedores con hambre de verdad.
Tortas  $14.99
El sándwich mexicano en su máxima expresión. Jugosa, adictiva y atascada de sabor con queso y chipotle. Acompañada de papas fritas.
Hamburguesa La Mexicana $14.99
Nuestra burger con alma mexicana. Jalapeños toreados, tocino crujiente y aguacate cremoso. Una explosión de sabor con nuestro sazón.
Hamburguesa Hawaiana $14.99
La combinación perfecta entre lo dulce y salado. Piña asada, salchicha y tocino en una burger jugosa que rompe todas las reglas.
Cheese Burger $12.99
El clásico que nunca miente. Carne jugosa, queso americano derretido, tocino y nuestro toque secreto de chipotle mayo. Irresistible.
Burritos $13.99 | $14.99
Un monstruo de 14 pulgadas hecho para aniquilar el hambre. Atascado de arroz, frijoles y tu carne favorita. Rinde o ríndete.
Burrito Bowl $13.99 | $14.99
Todo el poder y sabor de nuestro burrito, pero en un bowl. La misma carga de ingredientes para un hambre que no perdona. Sin límites.
Quesadilla $13.99 | $14.99
La perfección hecha con tortilla y queso derretido. Simple, clásica y con ese estirón de queso que cura el alma. El antojo ideal.
4
5
EL KIT PARA EL HAMBRE GRUPAL
El arsenal perfecto para tu gente. Parrilladas y Taco Boxes listos para compartir.
Pollo Rostizado $29.99
Un pollo entero, jugoso y dorado a la perfección. Viene con todo lo necesario para armar un festín familiar. El clásico que une a todos.
1/2 Pollo Rostizado $19.99
La misma sazón y jugosidad, pero en la porción perfecta para dos. Ideal para una comida completa sin excusas ni complicaciones.
Parrillada de Carnes $89.99
El festín definitivo. Res, pollo, chorizo, costillas y pastor en una charola. La solución perfecta para alimentar a toda tu banda.
Charola de Tacos de Birria $49.99
Quince tacos de birria con queso y su consomé para dippear. La caja de la felicidad existe y la tenemos nosotros. Lista para atacar.
Charola de Tacos de Tinga  $49.99
Quince tacos de tinga de pollo jugoso y con ese toque de chipotle. Una opción más ligera pero igual de adictiva. El antojito perfecto.
Carne Asada $16.99
Un corte de res asado a la perfección, jugoso y lleno de sabor. Acompañado de todo lo que te gusta. El plato del patrón, sin duda.
Flautas de Pollo $14.99
Tacos dorados y crujientes, rellenos de pollo. Ahógalos en crema y salsa sin miedo. El crunch que necesitas escuchar hoy.
Chilaquiles Rojos y Verdes $14.99
Totopos bañados en la salsa de tu elección, con huevo y tu carne favorita. El desayuno de los campeones, a cualquier hora del día.
Tostadas de Tinga de Pollo $14.99
Tres tostadas crujientes con una montaña de tinga de pollo y todos sus toppings. El balance perfecto entre crujiente y jugoso.
Nachos $13.99 | $14.99
Una montaña de totopos bañados en queso, pico de gallo y guacamole. Hechos para compartir, pero no te juzgamos si no lo haces.
4
5
EL RINCÓN DEL ANTOJO
Donde la dieta no tiene opinión. Elotes, frituras y chamoy para ese gustito que no perdona. Pídelo con todo, sin miedo.
Elote en Vaso $4.50 Regular | 9.00 Grande
El clásico de la calle. Granos de elote calientitos, mayonesa, queso y chile del que pica. La dosis perfecta de sabor en cada cucharada.
Maruchan con Esquites $6.99
La sopa instantánea que amas, pero tuneada a otro nivel con nuestros esquites calientes. Una locura deliciosa, picosa y muy adictiva.
Chicharrón Preparado $7.50
Un lienzo crujiente de chicharrón, cargado de col, crema, cueritos y salsa. Cruje, se deshace y mancha. Como debe ser.
Tostilocos  $7.50
La bolsa verde, pero llevada a otro nivel. La combinación perfecta de lo crujiente y lo picoso, preparados a nuestro estilo. Pura locura de sabor.
Dorilocos $7.50
Tus Doritos Nacho, pero en su versión más salvaje y adictiva. Preparados con el toque de la casa para una explosión de queso, chile y limón.
Rancheritos Preparados $7.50
El sabor picosito de los Rancheritos, llevado al extremo con limón, salsas y todo lo que te gusta. Para paladares valientes y expertos.
Elote Preparado $4.50
Elote entero bañado en mayonesa, espolvoreado con queso y chile. Cómelo a mordidas, sin miedo a ensuciarte. El original nunca falla.
Mangonadas $6.50 Ch $7.50 M $8.50 G $9.99 EG
La explosión perfecta de dulce, salado y picoso. Mango helado con el golpe adictivo del chamoy y chile. Te reinicia la vida al instante.
Coctail de Frutas $9.99
La opción fresca y jugosa. Una mezcla de las frutas de temporada, listas para calmar la sed. Pídelo natural o con el toque de chile y limón.
4
5
LA SED TIENE MUCHAS FORMAS.
Y nosotros tenemos la cura para todas. Explora nuestras Aguas Frescas, Margaritas, Micheladas y bebidas preparadas.
Aguas Frescas | $4.99
Hechas en casa con fruta de verdad. La cura perfecta para el calor y el picante. Pregunta por los sabores que tenemos hoy para ti.
Margaritas | $14.99
El clásico coctel con nuestro toque. Dulce, acidita y con ese piquete que te pone de buenas. Elige tu sabor y empieza la fiesta.
Horchata con Café | $4.99
La cremosidad de nuestra horchata de siempre, pero con un shot de café para despertarte. Tu nueva adicción, garantizada.
Monster Preparado | $7.99
Tu Monster de siempre, pero preparado a nuestro estilo. El golpe de energía con el sabor acidito y picoso que te gusta.
Red Bull Preparado $7.99
La energía del Red Bull, pero tuneada con el toque picosito del chamoy y limón. Te da alas y un poco de fuego también.
Agua Mineral Preparada $4.99
Agua mineral con limón y el borde escarchado de chile. Refrescante, con burbujas y ese toque que lo cambia todo. La sed no tiene chance.
Sangría Preparada $4.99
El sabor del refresco de sangría, pero preparado para conocedores. Con su limón y chilito para un toque ácido y adictivo.
Aguas Preparadas $5.99
Tu agua fresca favorita, pero elevada a otro nivel. Con el borde escarchado de chile y chamoy. La combinación perfecta de dulce y picoso.
Michelada de Camarón $18.99
Nuestra Michelada clásica, pero coronada con camarones frescos. No es una bebida, es un antojito líquido. Un lujo que te mereces.
Michelada Regular $13.99
La clásica que nunca falla. Tu cerveza helada, preparada con la mezcla perfecta de limón y salsas. La reina indiscutible de la sed.
Michelada de Caguama $15.99
La misma Michelada perfecta, pero en tamaño familiar. Ideal para la sed de verdad o para compartir. El nivel experto de la michelada.
4
5
EL GOLPE DE GRACIA.
El dulce final que tu antojo merece. Helados, paletas y crepas que noquean al calor y te dejan con una sonrisa.
Pepino Split $9.99
El clásico, pero en su versión más fresca y atrevida. Pepino, nieve y chamoy en una combinación que no sabías que necesitabas.
Banana Split $9.99
El postre de los campeones. Plátano, tres bolas de helado y todos los toppings. Un clásico que nunca pasa de moda y siempre cumple.
Crepas | Durazno | Fresa  $9.99
Una delicia calientita y suave, rellena de fruta. Un abrazo dulce de durazno o fresa que se deshace en tu boca. Pura elegancia.
Sundae Ice Cream  $4.99
El clásico que se come completo. Helado cremoso y chocolate, servido en un tazón de waffle crujiente. Aquí hasta el plato se disfruta.
Dirt and Worms Ice Cream $5.99
El postre más divertido. Helado de chocolate, galleta Oreo molida y gomitas de gusano. Para el niño que todos llevamos dentro.
Frappucchino $5.99 | $6.99
Tu dosis de café, pero en su versión más fría, dulce y cremosa. El levantón perfecto para después de comer o para el calor.
Fresas con Crema $6.99 | $7.99 | $8.99
El postre que te recuerda a casa. Fresas frescas, bañadas en nuestra crema dulce especial. Simple, clásico y absolutamente adictivo.
Nieves de Agua $2.99
Pura fruta hecha hielo. La opción más ligera y refrescante para limpiar el paladar y calmar la sed. Pregunta por los sabores del día.
Helados $2.99
La felicidad servida en una bola cremosa. Elige tus sabores favoritos y arma tu combinación perfecta. El postre que nunca falla.
Paletas de Agua $2.99
La forma más fácil de refrescarse. Pura fruta congelada en una paleta. El remedio perfecto para el calor, sin culpas.
Paletas de Leche $3.75
El postre cremoso en un palito. Todo el sabor del helado, pero sin complicaciones. Un gusto cremoso que te mereces.
Paletas Premium $4.99
No es una paleta, es una experiencia. Rellenas o con trozos de pura delicia. El nivel experto de las paletas. Pregúntanos por ellas.

raw_text:
Paragon Restaurant Indianapolis, IN | Avon, IN | Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
Paragon Restaurant
Paragon Restaurant
Family Restaurant and Banquet Facility
PANCAKES
WAFFLES
FRENCH TOAST
About Paragon Restaurant
Paragon Restaurant has been a cherished spot on the west side of Indianapolis for decades, serving up classic American comfort food with a welcoming, family-friendly touch. Whether you’re here for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, you’ll find generous portions, reasonable prices, and an extensive menu with something for everyone — from homemade pancakes and fluffy omelets to Greek specialties, burgers, and fresh salads.
Our team prides itself on fast, friendly service and a relaxed, cozy atmosphere where regulars and newcomers alike feel at home. Over the years, we've become a local favorite for family gatherings, casual breakfasts, and group celebrations. Stop by and see why so many call Paragon their go-to spot!
What Our Guests Say

Eats
samosa combo
A samosa is a popular savory snack that originated in the Indian subcontinent but has gained widespread popularity across various cuisines and cultures. It is a deep-fried or baked pastry that typically features a crisp, triangular-shaped outer shell made from a mixture of flour, oil, and water.
The filling of a samosa is what truly sets it apart and makes it a delectable treat. Our filling consists of a mixture of spiced potatoes, peas, onions, and a medley of aromatic herbs and spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and chili powder.
$6
kati roll
Indulge your taste buds in a symphony of flavors with the culinary masterpiece known as Kati Rolls. Picture your choice of marinated meat or vegetables are lovingly enveloped in a soft, warm blanket of freshly made flaky buttery flatbread.
Chicken Kati Roll
$11.49
Paneer Kati Roll
$9.99
Aalo (Potato) Kati Roll
v
$8.99
bun maska
A popular and beloved dish that originated in the bustling streets of Mumbai, India. It is a simple yet delightful combination of a soft bun and a generous slathering of creamy butter.
It pairs wonderfully with a piping hot cup of chai, where the buttery bun can be dunked and savored.
$5

Awesome food, very cool space, and excellent service. Try the Aloo Masala Roll and the Masala Tea. Will be back soon!

five star review by
Kirsten S:
It's a friendly spot with lots of comfy seating options. The chilli paneer kathi roll I got was packed with flavor and had a crunchy texture from the onion and pepper.

G-1 Indian Restaurant
Cuisines: Indian
Address: 4907 N College Ave, Indianapolis, IN 46205, USA
Menu
Appetizers
Onion Bhaji (5 Pcs.)
Thinly sliced onions mixed and coated in chickpea flour.
Vegetable Pakoras (6 Pcs.)
Fritters of assorted fresh vegetables gently seasoned and deep fried.
Vegetable Samosas (2 Pcs.)
Crisp triangular patties stuffed with peas & potatoes cooked with spices & deep fried.
Paneer Pakora (5 Pcs.)
Pieces of homemade cheese, dipped in chickpea batter and deep fried.
Aloo Tikki (2 Pcs.)
Spicy potato stuffing dipped in chickpea batter, then breaded and deep fried.
Veg Spring Roll (3 Pcs.)
Crispy rolls filled with seasoned mixed vegetables, served with a tangy dipping sauce.
Chicken Pakora (5 Pcs.)
Tender pieces of boneless chicken marinated in spices and batter fried.
G-1 Vegetarian Platter
Assorted vegetable appetizers.
G-1 Non-veg Special Platter
Combination of all above appetizers, including chicken tikka.
Gobhi Manchurian
Fried cauliflower coated in a delicious sweet and tangy manchurian sauce.
Soups
Chicken Soup
Lentil Soup
Coconut Soup
Bread
Tandoori Roti (Chapathi)
Whole wheat flour bread cooked in tandoor.
Naan
Plain unleavened bread made in tandoor.
Paratha
Multi-layered whole wheat flour cooked in tandoor.
Aloo Paratha
Whole wheat bread stuffed with mashed potatoes and green peas.
Poori (2 Pcs.) or Butura (2 Pcs.)
Fried whole wheat bread. (puff bread)
Keema Naan
Naan stuffed with ground lamb and cilantro.
Garlic Naan
Naan stuffed with fresh garlic, cilantro, and seasoning.
Onion Kulcha
Spicy and hot bread stuffed with onions.

Naan stuffed with homemade cheese and spices.

Naan stuffed with raisins, nuts, and coconut.
Bullet Naan
Naan stuffed with fresh chili, cilantro, and seasoning.

Naan, Garlic Naan, One kulcha of your choice.
Tandoori Specialties
Tandoori Chicken
Chicken marinated in yogurt with spices and grilled in tandoor oven.
Chicken Tikka (Dry)
Tender boneless pieces of chicken breast marinated in yogurt with spices and grilled in tandoor oven.
Tangdi Kabab (6 Pcs.)
Chicken drumsticks marinated in special sauce and grilled in tandoor oven.
Paneer Tikka Kabab
Marinated roasted cubes of farmers cheese.
Seekh Kababs
Finger rolls of spiced ground lamb cooked on a skewer in tandoor oven.
Tandoori Fish
Swordfish marinated in yogurt with spices and grilled in tandoor oven.
Tandoori Shrimp
Spiced jumbo shrimp cooked on a skewer in tandoor oven.
G-1 Special Mixed Grill
A delicious combination of chicken, lamb, seekh kabab, and shrimp.
Chicken Specialties
Chicken Curry
Chicken cooked with spices in a thick curry sauce.
Chicken Korma
Boneless chicken cooked with cashews and raisins with a touch of cream.
Chicken Tikka Masala
Boneless chicken breast marinated in yogurt and spices. Roasted on the skewer sauteed in tomato and butter sauce.
Chicken Palak
Tender pieces of chicken sauteed with spinach and blended with green herbs.
Chicken Dal Piyaza
Tender pieces of chicken cooked with onion, green peppers, spices, and dal (lentils).
Chicken Vindaloo
Chicken cooked in hot and spicy sauce with potatoes.
Murgh Mughlai
Boneless chicken cooked with mushrooms & a blend of herbs and spices in tomato sauce.
Chicken Chilli
Boneless chicken pieces simmered in tomato sauce with seasoned bell pepper and shredded onions.
Chicken Jalpharezi
Tender pieces of chicken cooked with mixed vegetables.
Mango Chicken
Tendered chicken cooked in a sweet and savory gravy made with mangoes and aromatic spices.
Chicken Achari
Chicken cooked with pickling spices giving it a tangy, spicy, and aromatic flavor.
Chicken Rogan Josh
Tender chicken cooked in a rich, spiced gravy made with ingredients like yogurt, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, and a blend of spices such as cumin, coriander, and garam masala.
Chicken Coconut Curry
Chicken cooked in a rich, creamy coconut milk-based sauce.
Chicken Methi Mushroom
A savory dish made with tender chicken, fenugreek leaves (methi), and mushrooms.

Lamb Curry
Chunks of lamb cooked with herbs and spices in gravy sauce.
Lamb Shahl Korma
Lamb cooked in cream sauce with cashews and raisins.
Lamb Palak
Tender pieces of lamb cooked with spinach and flavored with fresh spices.
Lamb Tikka Masala
Tender cubes of Tandoori Kabab sautéed in tomato and butter sauce.
Lamb Vindaloo
Lamb cooked in hot and spicy sauce with potatoes.
Keema Mattar
Spiced ground lamb cooked with peas, onion, and diced tomato.
Lamb Dal Piyaza
Tender pieces of lamb cooked with onions, bell peppers, and Dal (Lentils).
Lamb Methi Mushrooms
A savory dish made with tender lamb, fenugreek leaves (methi), and mushrooms.
Lamb Jalpharezi
Tender pieces of lamb cooked in specially prepared vegetables.
Lamb Coconut Curry
Lamb cooked in a rich, creamy coconut milk-based sauce.
Lamb Achari
Lamb cooked with pickling spices giving it a tangy, spicy, and aromatic flavor.
Lamb Rogan Josh
Tender lamb cooked in a rich, spiced gravy made with ingredients like yogurt, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, and a blend of spices such as cumin, coriander, and garam masala.

Shrimp marinated in Tandoori masala sautéed in tomato sauce.

Shrimp or Fish cooked in spinach and fresh spices.

Shrimp or Fish cooked in cream sauce with cashews and raisins.

Shrimp cooked in cream sauce with cashews and raisins.
Shrimp Dal Piyaza
Tender pieces of shrimp cooked with onions, bell peppers, and Dal (Lentils).
Shrimp Methi Mushrooms
A savory dish made with tender shrimp, fenugreek leaves (methi), and mushrooms.

Palak Panir
Homemade cottage cheese cooked in creamed spinach and mustard greens.
Paneer Chilli
Homemade cottage cheese cooked in tomato sauce with seasoned bell peppers.

Fresh homemade cottage cheese cooked gently with tender green peas and fresh spices.

Black Lentils flavored with freshly ground spices and sauteed in cream.

Assorted garden fresh vegetables sauteed in fresh herbs with cashews and raisins.

Minced garden fresh vegetable balls cooked in a rich gravy and mildly spiced.

Tender chunks of homemade cheese cooked with tomato and butter sauce.

Vegetable fritters, shredded onions, & bell peppers cooked in tomato & butter sauce.

Deep fried fritters dunked in a yogurt-based curry made with besan and spices.

Mushrooms cooked in creamed spinach and mustard greens. Vegan option available.

Potatoes cooked in creamed spinach and mustard greens. Vegan option available.

Chickpeas cooked in creamed spinach and mustard greens. Vegan option available.

Black lentils slow-cooked with garlic, cumin, and spices, finished with a fragrant tempered oil. Vegan option available.
Chana Masala

Cauliflower and potatoes cooked with herbs and spices. Vegan option available.

A traditional indian meal served in silver platter with vegetable samosa, nav ratan korma, saag paneer, dal, rice, raitha, naan, kheer (dessert).
Non-Vegetarian Thali
A traditional indian meal served in silver platter with tandoori chicken, chicken pakora, lamb curry, chicken curry, dal, rice, raitha, naan, kheer (dessert).

Vegetable Biryani
Classic muglai dish of curried vegetables in rice.
Chicken Biryani
Classic muglai dish of curried chicken in rice.
Chicken Tikka Biryani
Bonless chicken sauteed with fresh onions and bell peppers then steamed with rice and spices.
Lamb Biryani
Classic muglai dish of curried lamb in rice.
Shrimp Biryani
Classic muglai dish of curried shrimp or fish in rice, & simmered in ginger garlic, & fresh coriander.
Fish Biryani
Classic muglai dish of curried shrimp or fish in rice, & simmered in ginger garlic, & fresh coriander.
G-1 Special Biryani
Classic muglai dish of curried chicken, lamb, shrimp, paneer, & vegetables in rice.

Flavored basmati rice cooked with eggs.

Cubes of lamb cooked with fresh-cut tomatoes, bell pepper, and onions.

Homemade cottage cheese and bell peppers cooked in spicy masala.

Tender chicken cooked in a tangy lemon-infused sauce with herbs and mild spices.

Tender Lamb cooked in a tangy lemon-infused sauce with herbs and mild spices.

about restaurant
Chin Brothers
Restaurant
Chin Brothers Restaurant in Indianapolis, IN, is a must-visit for lovers of authentic Burmese and Southeast Asian cuisine.
Indulge in popular items like goat curry and Chin Brother's fried rice, prepared with traditional flavors and spices. Experience a culinary journey that will tantalize your taste buds and leave you craving for more.
ORDER NOW
Contact Details
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our menu, want to provide feedback, or need assistance with an order. Contact us via phone or simply drop by our restaurant. Your dining experience and satisfaction are our top priorities, and we look forward to connecting with you!
Send Message

Good restaurant, delicious food, classy atmosphere
Peaceful and quiet great meal to get when it's cold outside. The food is amazing 👏  hot and delicious.
The staff are friendly and Courteous as well.
The bathrooms are clean and tables and floors are pristine as well. I took my time enjoying my meal and the atmosphere peacefully.

Good restaurant, delicious food, classy atmosphere
Ordered samosas, a sweet drink with house-made rice jelly, Burmese pork curry, and mohinga noodle soup. All delicious and fresh!
The samosas were crispy and piping hot, filled with mildly spiced potatos and served with a sweet chili dipping sauce.
The mont let saung drink is a palm sugar syrup with rice flour jelly, topped with coconut and chopped peanuts. The owner said they make the rice jelly at the restaurant! Sweet, cold and refreshing, with a unique flavor.
Jessica Findley Yang
November 26, 2020.

* Served with steamed rice or fried rice substitute for $6.99
TL01. Khao Pad (Fried Rice)
Thai style fried rice with choice of meat, onion, garlic, green onion, carrot, egg, and tomato
TL02. KHAO PAD PED (Fried Rice Basil)
Spicy Thai style fried rice with sliced meat, onions, garlic, bell pepper, egg, Thai chilies, and basil leaves.
TL03. FRIED RICE MUSHROOM (Khao Pad, Het)
Thai style fried rice with choice of meat, onions, garlic, green onion, bell pepper, egg, white mushroom, and Shiitake mushroom.
TL04. THAI PINEAPPLE FRIED RICE (Khao Pad Sappalod)
Thai style fried rice with choice of meat, onion, pineapple, green peas, egg, carrot, cashew nut, bell pepper, curry powder and garlic.
TL05. THAI NOODLES SOUP (Kuay Tiew Nam)
Rice noodles with choice of meat, bean sprouts, bok choy, green onion, cilantro, and fried garlic in homemade soup.
TL06. STIR FRIED EGG NOODLES (Khau Hswe)
Egg noodles with choice of meat, broccoli, carrot, cabbage, onion, garlic, and egg.
TL07. THAI FRIED VERMICELLI NOODLE (Pad Mee)
Vermicelli rice noodles with choice of meat, bean sprout, onion, celery, broccoli, carrot, garlic, cabbage, and egg.
TL08. THAI FRIED NOODLES (Pad Thai)
Stir-fried rice noodles with meat, tofu, egg, ground peanut, chive, and bean sprout in pad Thai sauce.
TL09. STIR-FRIED BIG FLAT RICE NOODLES (Pad See Ewe)
Stir-fried flat rice noodles with meat, cabbage, broccoli, carrot, and egg in Thai sweet soy sauce.
TL10. SPICY BASIL (Pad Kra Praw) *
Stir-fried meat in homemade sauce with basil leaves, onions, Thai chilies, bell pepper, and green beans.
TL11. MIXED VEGGIES AND MEAT (Pad Pak Ruam Mitt) *
Stir-fried mixed vegetable with sliced meat in homemade Thai sauce.

Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.

FOOD ALLERGIES & RESTRICTIONS:
• Please note, our food is prepared in a kitchen where allergens are present. Some dishes may contain traces of nuts, wheat, gluten, milk, and
other allergenic ingredients. We are unable to list every ingredient on this menu, so please ask our staff for more detailed information about
our food and allergens. We are here to help – please ask for assistance!
• Many of our vegetable & tofu dishes can be made vegan upon request – please speak to our team!
NOTES:
• Contains fish sauce. Our house vegan sauce (not gluten-free) may be substituted only for stir fry selections.
• Substitutions may incur additional charges.
• Some modifications may be politely declined. We have the right to refuse any refunds for any dish that has been significantly modified or
ordered beyond medium spiciness. Thank you for your understanding!
• A 20% gratuity may be added for groups of 5 or more guests on a single check; 22% for separate checks.
Menu prices are subject to change without notice. - Updated - January 4, 2025

About the Business
When it comes to poké and bubble tea, we at Harmony Tea Shoppe believe that every sip and each bite should be enjoyed comfortably. That's why we put as much thought into our space and service as we put into our authentic menu offerings. Made with hand-pulled rice noodles and fresh greens and protein, our signature bowls are the perfect complement to a custom tea or smoothie. Enjoy a popular pineapple or strawberry smoothie, and venture to try one of our fresh fried goods while you're at it. No matter the size of your party or appetite, we know that our tea shoppe will leave you and your guests in harmony with our menu and staff. The next time you're in the mood for a taste of authentic quality and hospitality in a cozy setting, come hang out at Harmony Tea Shoppe to get your fix.

About the Business
Sushi Club is authentic Japanese restaurant, not a buffet. All you can eat sushi! Order by menu until you are happy. Over 81 items to choose from. Save 50% or MORE! Find us on Facebook or Instagram! Every order is made fresh and served at your table. Sushi Club is great for lunch or dinner with a casual and lighthearted atmosphere.

Where We Started
Our Story
Peking Garden Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Noblesville, IN. Peking Garden's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Noblesville community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

View Full Menu
What our customers say
Reviews
Great food that is fresh and not greasy. For most people, this is a takeout. We drive 10 miles to get our Chinese food there. 5 Stars for the food and service. Highly recommend!!
Michael Gould
The egg rolls are some of the best I've had. Never had a bad experience here. If you are trying to be budget-friendly, most meals can feed 2 people. Ordering carry out is fast and easy.
Sabrena Martin
I've eaten here multiple times. We usually get an orange chicken combo and beef and broccoli and everything is delicious. The 5-stars.  Their customer service was above and beyond!
Lia Kirch
This restaurant is the best. You can not find a good enough restaurant like this one. No matter how hard I tried to find a good Chinese restaurant in Florida nothing could top this one.
Nicholas Willing
This is the best Chinese food I've ever had! I've been going here for probably the past 10 years now and it's still just as good as the first time! A family-oriented place. Overall the best!
Jessie Powers
This will definitely be my go-to spot! The woman who answers the phone and is usually present when I pick up my order is very friendly. Orders have always been correct and fast.
Erica T.

Where We Started
Our Story
Wok & Roll Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Indianapolis, IN. Wok & Roll's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Indianapolis community. Our restaurant is known for its variety in taste and high-quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

View Full Menu
What our customers say
Reviews
Friendly staff and food are always hot and ready when we come to pick it up. Only Chinese takeout that doesn't make me feel like a bloated tick after eating it. And the white rice is the best I've had from takeout too.
Leigh A.
I got shrimp egg foo young with white rice, and my boyfriend chicken with broccoli, and we got crab rangoon. When we got home the food was hot and fresh! It was so good! This will definitely be our new Chinese spot.
Shakeena K.
I'm usually pretty skeptical about Chinese takeout, but this place is fantastic. Fast and very polite service and they do not skip out on portion size! Great prices all around.
JS Williams
This is my favorite Chinese place. I've tried several different items on their menu and have never been disappointed. Great food, friendly and fast service.
Laura D.
I was told by a coworker of this place, that it was good, quick, and delicious. They were absolutely correct. Best Gen. Tso's chicken dish I have ever had, fresh and not expensive at all. I immediately came on here to rate it while I am eating it.
Amor E.
I like this restaurant a lot. Especially the sesame chicken and chicken with broccoli!  The service is nice. The environment is quiet and clean. I'm just traveling here and I am so happy that I find this Chinese restaurant. I will be back if I travel to Indiana again!
Shaowei L.

Baan Thai Bistro - Thai, Thai Food, Thai Restaurant, Delivery
— RESERVATIONS RECOMMENDED — CALL 317-759-THAI

Lunch Menu   11-3pm  M-F
Catering

Baan Thai Bistro Menu
Starters and Small Plates
Add a side of fresh local veggies w/ our house-made sriracha sauce for $3.
Sticky Chicken Wings
12
Baan Thai marinade, deep-fried and tossed w/ choice of sauce:
Isan Thai Chili (Nam Jim Jeaw)
Honey Garlic Sriracha
Green Curry
Peanut Sauce
Son-in-Law Eggs (Kai Look Keuy)
6
Crispy soft-boiled eggs topped w/ fried shallots and a sweet tamarind sauce.
Yaai's Spring Rolls
$2.00 each or 4 / $6
Lightly fried rice paper rolls filled w/ cabbage, bean thread noodles, dried mushroom, shredded carrots & water chestnuts. Served w/ sweet chili sauce.
Summer Rolls
10
Shrimp or Vegetarian - fresh rice paper rolls of crisp veggies w/ a trio of dipping sauces.
Lettuce Wraps
14
Protein packed salad w/ fresh herbs and lime dressing served w/ sticky rice & lettuce.
Choose from:
Minced Chicken / Pork (Laab)
Grilled Steak (Nam Tok)
Spicy Green Papaya (Som Thum) - includes peanuts
Seafood Salad (Yum Talay)
Chicken Satay
12
Grilled chicken skewers served w/ peanut sauce, Thai toast & cucumber salad.
Pork Satay (Moo Ping)
12
Grilled Thai BBQ pork skewers w/ sticky rice & a spicy Isan dipping sauce (nam jim jaew).
Glass Noodle Salad (Yum Woon Sen)
12
Clear bean thread noodle salad (made from mung beans - a keto friendly & gluten free dish). Choice of:  Chicken, Shrimp (+$3), Seafood (+$4) or Vegetarian.
Crispy Tofu (Tau Hu Tod)
8
Flash-fried soybean tofu served w/ sweet chili & peanut sauce.
Isan Thai Sausage
14
Handmade pork sausage served w/ sticky rice & a spicy dipping sauce (prik nam pla).
Crispy Rice Salad (Nam Khao Tod)
14
Traditional potluck dish consisting of  fried rice cake crumbles, chopped nam sausage, cilantro, shallots, dried chilis, peanuts & lime dressing.
Shrimp Cakes (Tod Mun)
10
Tiger Prawn Shrimp cakes infused with red curry, green beans and kaffir lime leaves served w/ cucumber salad.
Baan Dumplings
10
Handmade dumplings made with chicken, pork, & shrimp served w/ a dipping sauce. Choice of fried or steamed.
Firecracker Shrimp
10
Shrimp w/ cream cheese hand rolled in rice paper & deep fried.  Served w/ Thai Sweet Chili Sauce.
Crab Rangoon Dip
12
Crab & cream cheese dip topped w/ sweet chili sauce.  Served with wonton chips.
Soups
Baan Thai’s savory, earthy soups are complete with fresh herbs, roots and spices transforming to these delectable bowls of good health.
Boat Noodle Soup
14
Hearty broth soup of rice noodles,  tender beef, beef meatballs, coriander roots, cilantro, bean sprouts, Thai basil, and roasted garlic.  (Vegetarian or Chicken is also available.)
The Hangover Cure (Kao Thom)
12
Rice porridge w/ fresh ginger, roasted garlic, cilantro, green onions and bean sprouts in a hearty broth & a soft-boiled egg. Choice of Minced Chicken or Pork, Shrimp (+$3) or Veg. (Mushroom).
Thom Yum
8 sm / 12 lg
Spicy sour soup w/ lemongrass, cilantro, straw mushrooms and onions. Choice of: Chicken, Shrimp (+$3), Seafood (+$4), or Vegetarian (Tofu).
Thom Ka
8 sm / 12 lg
Coconut milk soup made with tomatoes, galangal root (added for flavor), kaffir lime leaves and mint. Choice of:  Chicken, Shrimp (+$3),  or Vegetarian (Tofu) .
Crispy Pork Belly Ramen
14
Ramen egg noodles, crispy pork belly, baby bok choy, shitake mushrooms & a soft boiled egg in a hearty herb chicken broth.
Baan Thai’s Featured Entrees
Enjoy some of our family’s favorite comfort foods!  Aroy!
Thai Fried Chicken & Rice Bowl (Hat Yai Gai Tod)
18
Southern Thailand Fried Chicken topped w/ a fried egg, crispy shallots & honey sriracha sauce. Served w/ Thai basil fried rice.
Crispy Pork Belly & Char Siu (Moo Krob Moo Dang)
28
Deep-fried pork belly & roasted pork topped w/ a sweet & savory bbq gravy.  Served with jasmine rice, cucumbers & a soft-boiled egg.
Crying Tiger Steak
35
Grilled steak w/ spicy basil fried rice (or Asian greens & jasmine rice). Served w/ a spicy sauce (nam jim jaew).
Chicken Drumsticks w/ Curry Noodles (Kao Soi)
18
Savory curry stew of tender chicken drumsticks & egg noodles topped w/ bean sprouts, shallots, cilantro & crispy noodles.
Ginger & Basil Fish
24
Your choice fish. Served w/ jasmine rice:
Pan-seared fillet (seasonal) w/ Basil & Peppers
Fried whole fish (Tilapia) w/ Basil & Peppers
Steamed whole fish (Tilapia) w/ Ginger-Citrus Sauce
Haw Mok
21
Red curry fish fillet custard w/ cabbage, coconut milk, & kaffir lime leaves. Served w/ jasmine rice.
Popular Thai Dishes
For any of the following entrees (unless otherwise noted), choose one: Beef, Chicken, Pork, Shrimp (+3), Crispy Pork Belly (+4) or Vegetarian (Tofu).
Pad Thai
14
Rice noodle stir-fry mixed with fresh bean sprouts, eggs, dried tofu, green onions topped with peanuts.
Peanut Sauce Noodles (Mee Ka Tee)
16
Noodle stir-fry w/ sweet peanut sauce, coconut milk, crushed peanuts, and bean sprouts.
Pad Seuw
14
Wide noodle stir-fry of Chinese broccoli (Gai Lan), garlic & eggs in a dark, sweet soy sauce.
Drunken Noodles (Pad Kee Mao)
16
Spicy wide noodle stir-fry of Thai basil, Chinese broccoli (Gai Lan), baby bok choy, broccoli, mushrooms, Thai chilis, red bell peppers, onions & banana peppers.
Pad Thai Woon Sen
16
Glass noodle stir-fry mixed with fresh bean sprouts, eggs, dried tofu, green onions topped with peanuts.  (Keto friendly & gluten free - noodles made from mung beans).
Pink Noodles (Pad Mee)
18
Rice vermicelli noodles, yentafo sauce (red fermented bean curd), roast pork, fresh bean sprouts, and eggs served beside our famous crispy pork belly.
Spicy Basil Stir-Fry (Pad Krapow)
16
Stir-Fry of Thai basil, chili peppers, red peppers, banana peppers, green beans & onions topped w/ a crispy fried egg. Served w/ jasmine rice.
Mixed Vegetable Stir-Fry (Pad Pak)
14
Stir-fry of baby bok choy, Chinese broccoli, broccoli, red bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, water chestnuts, carrots, and baby corn. Served w/ jasmine rice.
Lychee Sweet and Sour Stir-Fry (Pad Priew Wan)
18
Stir-fry of lychees, pineapple, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, onions, & water chestnuts in a sweet & sour sauce. Served w/ jasmine rice. (Choose one: Chicken (tempura battered), Fried Tofu or Shrimp (Tempura battered))
Chicken Cashew Nut Stir-Fry
14
Savory chicken stir-fry of cashews, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, carrots, onions, and water chestnuts.  Served w/ jasmine rice.
Orange Chicken
14
Sweet and tangy sticky sauce w/ tempura fried chicken, oranges & jasmine rice.
Beef & Broccoli
18
Tender flank steak stir-fry w/ broccoli. Served w/ jasmine rice.
Spicy Basil Fried Rice (Kao Pad bi Krapow)
14
Spicy fried rice mixed with Thai basil, chili peppers, red bell pepper, banana peppers, eggs, and onions topped with a crispy fried egg.  Served w/ cucumbers & prik nam pla.
Pineapple Fried Rice
16
Tropical fried rice mixed with sweet pineapple, pea pods, eggs, cashews and onions served in a fresh pineapple.
Thai Fried Rice (Kao Pad)
12
Thai street food wok-fried rice of eggs, onions, & pea pods w/ lime wedge.
Curry Dishes
Best Curry in Indy! Medium to Spicy. Choice of Beef, Chicken, Shrimp (+3), Pork or Tofu. Served w/ jasmine rice.
Massaman Curry
15
Rich & creamy peanut infused curry stew of potatoes & cashew nuts.
Red Curry
15
Spicy red curry w/ coconut milk, red chili peppers, Thai eggplant, red bell peppers, bamboo shoots, kaffir lime leaves and Thai Basil.
Green Curry
15
Spicy green curry made w/ coconut milk, green chili peppers, Thai eggplant, red bell peppers, bamboo shoots and Thai Basil.
Panang Curry
15
Mellow and savory curry of coconut milk, fresh green beans and kaffir lime leaves.
Yellow Curry
15
Savory turmeric curry w/ coconut milk, cucumbers, banana peppers, carrots, potatoes and cilantro.
Sweet Eats
Sweet Mango w/ Sticky Rice

8

About the Business
Asian Grill is a great place to relax and enjoy a comfortable meal with family and friends while enjoying art pieces from local artists on the wall and light music in the background. 
Join us for a meal seven days a week. we are open 7 days a week Monday to Thursday and Sunday from 11 am to 9 pm and Friday to Saturday from 11 am to 10 pm. 

Asian Grill is located on the Downtown Square of Noblesville right across from the Hamilton County Courthouse and near several other restaurants and many great shops.  It is situated in a building that is over 100 years old and still retains many of the original features like the hardwood floors and tin ceiling.

Thanks all for visiting Bando’s homepage.

을 찾아주신 여러분께 진심으로 감사의 말씀을 올립니다. 여러분의 즐겁고 맛있는 식사를 위해 최선을 다하겠습니다. 반보식당은 여러분의 의견에 항상 귀를 기울이고 있습니다. 불편하신 점이나 문의 사항이 있으시면 언제든 말씀해 주십시오. 감사합니다.
We welcome all of you here in Bando. We hope you enjoy the centuries old Korean Cuisine. Our ears are always open to hear our customer’s feedback. Let our staff know anytime if you have any concerns or suggestions. Customer satisfaction is our #1 goal. We Thank you for dining with us and wish you true joy and happiness in our restaurant.
A place to gather,
a place
for Family
How it all came to be…
Our friendly environment invites you all. Bando has seat available for more than 200 people and our place is ready to welcome for company meeting, birthday party for large group, or for a special day for your loved one.
Call us and make a reservation for your dining need.
Call us and let us know about your occasion and party size. We will have everything ready for you. Having a party in different place? Call for our catering service for large quantity orders. Thank you for choosing Bando Korean Restaurant!

William S.
Manager
We mainly specialize in Burmese and Thai Cuisine but we will also have other cuisines like Vietnamese, Malaysian, Laotian and Indonesian from time to time.

Our dishes are always made fresh daily and our menu changes every day as we want the best and the freshest for our customers. 

We want our customers to experience authenticity and the taste of dishes from the South East Asia Region.

210 cal
48
The Churrasco Experience
For more than a century, the Culinary Art of Churrasco, or cooking over an open flame,
                              has been skillfully mastered by the Gaucho Chefs of Brazil. Our Gauchos carefully
                              butcher, simply season and fire-roast each cut to seal in the natural flavors, producing
                              a salty bark and creating a unique and unforgettable culinary experience.
Full Churrasco
*
49/person
The experience that made Fogo famous. Enjoy continuous tableside carving of premium
                                                Brazilian cuts like signature Picanha (prime part of top sirloin), Fraldinha (bottom
                                                sirloin), and Roasted Chicken, Bone-in Ribeye, Filet, Lamb Chops, and more.
Includes Market Table and Brazilian sides.
Indulgent Churrasco
69/person
In addition to the Full Churrasco, enjoy your choice of enhancement (Butter-Bathed™
                                                Lobster Tail, Black Truffle Butter, All Jumbo Lump Crab Cake, or Roasted Bone Marrow)

raw_text:
Oaken Barrel Brewing Co
Skip to the main content
Skip to the visit us section
Skip to the footer
Menu
Gift Cards
Indy's Hometown Brewpub & Gathering Place
Experience delicious food, award-winning craft beer, and a warm atmosphere at Oaken Barrel. Join us for lunch or dinner at our family-friendly brewpub located just one mile west of exit 99 in Greenwood.
**Pet Policy: Only service animals specifically trained to aid or do work for a person with their disability are welcome inside the restaurant and on our patio. Comfort or Emotional support animals and other non-service animals (pets) are not permitted.
See Menu
Gift or Buy Gift Cards
Sharing joy, one card at a time.
Get a Gift Card
About Us
For over 30 years, Oaken Barrel has been Greenwood's hometown hangout for hearty eats and handcrafted brews. Our brewmaster, John Treeter, crafts a rotating selection of award-winning ales and lagers, brew on-site with time-honored techniques. Pair your pint with pub favorites like fresh salads, stacked burgers, hearty entrees, beer-basted Ribs, and more from our scratch kitchen.

Tap Fries
Fries, signature Tap fry seasoning, parmesan garlic aioli, sun-dried tomato pesto crema*, chipotle ranch, Tap beer cheese
Wisconsin Cheddar Cheese Curds
Lightly breaded Wisconsin cheddar cheese curds, sriracha aioli
PRETZEL STICKS + BEER CHEESE
Salted warm pretzel sticks, Tap beer cheese
FRIED GREEN BEANS
Crispy fried green beans, chipotle ranch
FIRECRACKER SHRIMP
Lightly breaded shrimp, creamy red pepper sauce, sriracha drizzle, Thai ranch
Dill Pickle Fries
Lightly breaded fried dill pickles, ranch
Tapadilla
Grilled chicken, mixed cheese, pico de gallo, salsa, lettuce, sour cream
‘CBR’ Dip
Chicken bacon ranch dip (chicken, bacon, ranch mix, cream cheese, cream, mixed cheeses, garlic) served with warm naan bread and pretzel points
Beer Cheese Nachos
Tortilla chips, beer cheese, pico de gallo, pickled jalapeños, black bean corn salsa, side of salsa and sour cream
—
SALADS & SOUP
SESAME SALMON SALAD
Marinated Atlantic salmon, mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, edamame, wonton strips, toasted black sesame seeds, Asian sesame dressing
SOUTHWEST GRILLED CHICKEN SALAD
Marinated grilled chicken, mixed greens, black beans, mixed cheese, corn, red onions, cherry tomatoes, tortilla chips, guacamole, cilantro, chipotle ranch dressing
Crispy Chicken Salad
Crispy chicken, salad greens, mixed cheese,bacon, tomatoes, red onions, cucumber, croutons, choice of dressing
Big Salad
Iceberg salad mix, Roma tomatoes, redonions, cucumbers, mixed cheese, croutons, choice of dressing
BLACKENED CHICKEN CAESAR SALAD
Blackened grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, shaved parmesan cheese, creamy Caesar dressing
SOUP OF THE DAY
Ask your server for today’s soup special
ENTREES
Tap Mac Bowl
Our house-made beer cheese and cavatappi pasta tossed with a cheese blend of cheddar and monterey jack
Add a protein

Buffalo Chicken
—
Hot Honey Chicken
—

Korean BBQ Steak

Marinated Atlantic salmon, teriyaki sauce, choice of side

Three 2oz steak medallions, herb garlic butter, crispy onions, house-made steak sauce, Tap Fries, parmesan garlic aioli
Pub Fish & Tap Fries
Beer battered cod, Tap fries, side of remoulade
Korean Steak Bowl
Steak strips, Korean BBQ sauce, peppers, onions, mushrooms, pickled carrots & daikon, cilantro lime rice, cabbage, Korean BBQ sauce drizzle
Chicken Fajita Bowl
Grilled chicken, peppers, onions, cilantro lime rice, black bean corn salsa, cilantro, pico de gallo, cilantro lime crema drizzle
WINGS
Tap Wings
Premium chicken wings fried to perfection, tossed in your choice of sauces and served with carrots, celery and your choice of ranch or bleu cheese dressing
Wing Sauces: buffalo, hot buffalo, parmesan garlic, Bionic Dragon IPA sauce, tangy Carolina BBQ, Nashville hot, sweet Thai chili, Tap BBQ, kickin’ bourbon BBQ
—
Boneless
(6 Wings / 12 Wings )
—
Traditional Bone-In
(6 Wings / 12 Wings )
BURGERS
served with Tap Fries and parmesan garlic aioli dipping sauce
(sub an Impossible plant-based patty on any burger for $4.25)

Premium ground beef, Granny Smith apple slices, bacon, brie cheese, brioche bun
BEER CHEESE BURGER
Premium ground beef, house-made Tap beer cheese, bacon, lettuce, tomato, red onion. brioche bun
MAC ‘N BEER CHEESE BURGER
Our Beer Cheese Burger topped with a grilled serving of our Tap Mac ‘n Cheese
Pub Burger
Premium ground beef, American cheese, pub sauce
Haystack Burger
Premium ground beef, gouda cheese, bacon, fried onion string haystack, guacamole, chipotle sauce, lettuce, tomato, brioche bun
BLACK BEAN BURGER
Black bean burger, guacamole, sun-dried tomato aioli, cilantro-lime crema, lettuce, tomato, red onion, brioche bun, tortilla chips with house-made salsa
ANGUS SLIDERS (3)
Premium ground beef, brie cheese, bourbon bacon jam, slider buns
ARTISAN PIZZA
Create Your Own Pizza
—
Standard Toppings +$.75/e roma tomatoes, red onion, mushrooms, spinach, artichokes, green peppers, banana peppers, jalapeño peppers, chopped basil
—

Traditional red sauce, Roma tomatoes, basil, mozzarella cheese, balsamic glaze drizzle
Il Diavolo
Traditional red sauce, pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, jalapeños, red onions, crushed red pepper flakes, smoky ghost pepper jack & mozzarella cheeses
Chicken Bacon Ranch
Ranch base, grilled chicken, bacon, pizza cheeses, ranch drizzle
SANDWICHES
served with Tap Fries and parmesan garlic aioli dipping sauce
BEER CHEESE STEAK
Premium steak, house-made Tap beer cheese, grilled onions, green peppers, toasted roll

Crispy chicken breast, Nashville hot sauce, slaw, dill pickles, brioche bun
Classic Chicken
Grilled chicken breast, lettuce, red onion, tomato, mayonnaise, brioche bun
CHICK-A CHICK-A BOOM BOOM WRAP

CRANBERRY TURKEY CLUB
Sliced turkey, cranberry glaze, sharp white cheddar cheese, mayo, lettuce, tomato, toasted wheatberry
TEX MEX STEAK WRAP
Premium steak, sautéed peppers & onions, mixed cheese, lettuce, pico de gallo, chipotle ranch, spinach & herb tortilla wrap, tortilla chips with house-made salsa

served with tortilla chips and house-made salsa

Appetizers
SAUCES: BBQ • Bleu Cheese • Buffalo (Mild) • Buffayaki • Cheese Sauce • Chipotle Aioli • Columbus (Buffalo Mustard) • Garlic Parmesan • Honey Mustard • Horsey • House Tomato Sauce • Nashville (Hot) • Ranch • Sahm’s Mustard Sauce • Salsa Roja • Salsa Verde • Spicy Garlic • Teriyaki Sesame – Extra sauce $.99 per
SAHM’S NACHOS
$10.99
Whole corn tortillas topped with sour cream and cheddar jack, broiled, quartered and served with lettuce and your choice of salsa roja or verde.
Add Southwest Chicken or Taco Beef +$3
Spicy Garlic Cauliflower
$12.99
Cauliflower is beer battered, fried, and tossed in spicy garlic with choice of ranch or bleu cheese.
STUFFED MUSHROOM CAPS
$11.49
Mushroom caps sautéed in cognac butter, stuffed with spinach parmesan mix, topped with mozzarella and broiled.
CHICKEN Tenders
$11.99
Chicken tenders lightly battered, fried, and served with your choice of any two sauces.
Spinach Artichoke Dip
$11.99
Homemade spinach artichoke dip baked and served hot with your choice of tortilla chips or focaccia crostini.
Jumbo Shrimp Cigars (3)
$13.99
Gulf shrimp, diced sautéed vegetables, cream cheese, fresh herbs, rolled in egg roll wraps, fried crisp. Served with teriyaki sesame sauce.
Mini Veggie Cigars (10)
$11.99
Veggies sautéed, mixed with cream cheese and herbs, stuffed in wonton wraps and fried. Served with a side of teriyaki sesame.
Chicken Wings (12/6)
$16.99 / $11.99
12 large chicken wings fried and tossed in your choice of wing sauce. Served with celery, carrot sticks, and your choice of dressing.
Chipotle Aioli, Buffayaki, Buffalo (Mild), Teriyaki Sesame, Spicy Garlic, BBQ, Garlic Parmesan, Nashville (Hot)
Cheese Curds
$11.99
Wisconsin white cheddar cheese curds fried in Big Lug beer batter and served with your choice of any two sauces.
Chicken Avocado Quesadilla
$12.99
Large flour tortilla filled with southwest chicken, cheddar jack, black bean corn salsa and avocado and grilled. Served with chipotle slaw, sour cream and your choice of salsa roja or verde.
Artichoke Bruschetta
$12.99
Artichoke hearts are tossed in olive oil with tomato, garlic, basil, parsley, and parmesan cheese and served on six garlic butter focaccia toast points covered in pesto.
The Basket
Each basket is served with your choice of any sauce.
French Fries (topped with seasoning salt) $8.99
Loaded Fries (bacon, cheese, scallions) $12.99
Breaded Cauliflower $11.99
Breaded Mushrooms $10.99
Onion Rings $10.99
Tater Tots $9.99
Salads, Wraps, & Soups
DRESSINGS: Balsamic Vinaigrette • Bleu Cheese • Caesar • Coconut Green Goddess (Vegan) • Cranberry Poppyseed • French • Honey Mustard • Lemon & Red Pepper Vinaigrette • Parmesan Vinaigrette • Ranch • Thousand Island – Extra dressing $.99 per
PROTEIN: Shrimp +$6 • Salmon +$7 • Chicken +$4 • Steak +$6. Protein substitutions are welcome and will only charge the difference in protein price from the listed menu item.
Make it a Wrap: Price of full salad with your choice of side
Soup & Salad: Add a cup of soup to 1/2 salad for +$2.00
All full and half salads served with a slice of Sahm’s famous coffee cake.
Chicken Cranberry
$14.99 | 1/2 $11.99
Mixed greens tossed in our cranberry poppyseed dressing and topped with grilled chicken breast, dried cranberries, cucumbers, roasted walnuts, and feta.
Caesar
$9.99 | 1/2 $6.99
Romaine lettuce tossed in our Caesar dressing and topped with asiago, parmesan and homemade croutons.
Greek
$11.99 | 1/2 $8.99
Mixed greens tossed in balsamic vinaigrette, topped with grape tomatoes, black olives, red onions, cucumbers, feta and peppadew peppers.
Southwest Taco
$14.99 | 1/2 $11.99
Your choice of taco beef or southwest chicken, cheddar jack, pico de gallo, scallions and tortilla straws served over mixed greens with ranch and your choice of salsa roja or verde.
Avocado
$14.99 | 1/2 $11.99
Avocados, black bean corn salsa, and feta served over mixed greens with your choice of any dressing.
Roman Chop
$15.99 | 1/2 $12.99
Chopped romaine, grilled chicken breast, bacon, peppadew peppers, grape tomatoes, roasted beets, black olives, pistachios and bleu cheese crumbles tossed in our balsamic vinaigrette and ranch dressing. Veggie Chop Salad $12.99 | $9.99
Chef Chicken
$15.99 | 1/2 $12.49
Breaded or grilled chicken, hard boiled egg, cheddar jack, Roma tomatoes, red onions, cucumbers and your choice of dressing. Toss in Buffalo + $.99
Cobb
$15.99 | 1/2 $12.49
Grilled chicken breast, grape tomatoes, smoked Indiana bacon, hard-boiled egg, avocado, scallions, and bleu cheese crumbles served over mixed lettuce with your choice of any dressing.
Big Ed's Chop
$14.99 | 1/2 $11.99
Diced turkey breast, ham, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, Roma tomatoes, hard boiled egg, scallions, shredded cheddar jack, and your choice of dressing.
Soup of the Day
CUP $5.49 | BOWL $7.49
Chili
CUP $5.49 | BOWL $7.49
Alaskan Clam Chowder
CUP $6.49 | BOWL $8.49
French Onion
CUP $5.49 | BOWL $7.49
Handhelds
Served on our homemade Sahm’s bread with your choice of any side dish.
Breaded Pork Tenderloin
$14.99
Hand-cut Indiana pork tenderloin with lettuce, tomato and mayo on a toasted knot bun.
Grilled tenderloin available upon request.
Spinach Melt
$14.99
Homemade spinach mix grilled on our wheat bread with cheddar jack, smoked Indiana bacon, tomatoes, and alfalfa sprouts. Add Turkey +$1
Bertie Melt
$11.99
Smoked Indiana bacon grilled on our wheat or white bread with American, cheddar jack and muenster cheeses.
Meatloaf Melt
$14.99
Homemade meatloaf grilled on our white bread with American and muenster cheese, caramelized onions and a brown sugar glaze.
Malibu Melt
$14.99
Turkey breast grilled on our wheat bread with smoked Indiana bacon, muenster, avocado, alfalfa sprouts and Sahm’s mustard sauce.
Fish Sandwich
$15.99
Atlantic cod fillet, beer batter fried or blackened, served on our toasted knot bun with lettuce, tomato, and a side of tartar sauce.
Buffalo Chicken Sandwich
$14.49
Chicken breast grilled or breaded, tossed in our Buffalo sauce and served on a toasted knot bun with lettuce, tomato and your choice of ranch or bleu cheese dressing.
Chicken Sandwich
$13.99
Chicken breast grilled, breaded, or blackened with lettuce, tomato and mayo on a toasted knot bun.
Steak Sandwich
$16.99
Beef tenderloin brochettes seasoned and grilled with caramelized onions, mushrooms, bell peppers, and muenster on a toasted hoagie bun. Served with a side of au jus.
Indiana BLT
$13.99
Smoked Indiana bacon stacked with lettuce, tomato and mayo on our toasted wheat or white. Add Avocado +$1.50
Corn Beef Reuben
$13.99
Slow braised corn beef grilled with sauerkraut, served on toasted swirl rye bread, and topped with Swiss cheese and Thousand Island dressing.
Triple Decker Club
$14.49
Deli sliced ham, turkey, smoked Indiana bacon, American, muenster, lettuce, tomato and mayo served on toasted wheat or white bread.
Street Tacos (3)
Corn or flour tortillas, crema, diced onion, cilantro and salsa verde.
Steak $15.99 • Chicken $13.99 • Vegan Taco Beef $15.99
Baja Tacos (3)
$15.99
Grilled flour tortillas, choice of shrimp or cod, blackened or fried, with queso fresco, avocado, cilantro chipotle slaw and choice of salsa roja or verde.

Welcome to Oakleys Bistro
We are open for lunch and dinner Tuesday-Saturday, closed Sundays & Mondays.  Food is our passion and sharing it with our guests is our joy, we look forward to seeing you soon.
Weight Loss Efficacy: Measuring
Generic Xenical
‘s Success. When considering whether to buy generic Xenical, one cannot dismiss its track record in helping individuals shed pounds. The generic version, just like its brand-name counterpart, contains orlistat, which works by preventing the absorption of some of the fat from the food you eat, leading to a caloric deficit which is necessary for weight loss. Studies demonstrate its effectiveness, particularly when paired with a low-calorie diet and regular physical activity, bolstering the drug’s reputation as a facilitator rather than a sole solution.
HOURS

Friday – Saturday 5PM – 10PM

Reminders
Reminders
Our lunch and dinner menu items and wines by the bottle are available for carry-out.
Our full menu is available for delivery/online ordering by using the online order tab.
We can help with your entertaining needs at OAKLEYS bistro, your home or at a place of your choosing.
We offer Gift Certificates online or in person at the restaurant.
Many of our house-made spices, soups and dressings are packaged for your OAKLEYS At HOME use.
Be the first to get our news: sign up for our periodic emails at
chris@oakleysbistro.com
Menus
Note that our menus list ingredients, not items. Our menus also change, sometimes subtly with slightly different preparations and always seasonally with the freshest products available. These fresh products include meats, poultry, fish, vegetables, greens, herbs, dairy, fruits and condiments each with unique flavors, textures and appearances.
With a passion for food, our Kitchen Team has the joy of matching and pairing these diverse qualities and characteristics in creating signature dishes, pleasing to the palate as well as the eye. We love what we do.

or call our event line at 317-824-1231.
Offsite Catering
Please call our offsite catering coordinator at 317-824-1231.
About Us
Bio
Steven J. Oakley, Chef/Proprietor
It’s commonly thought that you know you’ve found your life’s calling if you’d do your job for free. Chef Steven J. Oakley personifies that idea. His career began at age 16 when he offered his services to a suburban Chicago restaurant for free: “I just wanted to work, I wanted to learn,” says Oakley. That emphasis on hard work and continual learning has culminated in Chef Oakley arriving at the top of his profession in Indianapolis.
That structured education didn’t temper his need to learn from other chefs in other kitchens and he spent many weekends traveling to New York City to work in some of the most prestigious restaurants in the country, including The Park Avenue Café and Lutece–for free of course. He spent summers back in Chicago where he worked at the famous Charlie Trotter’s. Following a brief stint at the Scottsdale Princess Resort in Arizona, Chef Oakley returned home to Chicago where he worked for another landmark restaurant, Printer’s Row, and again, Charlie Trotter’s.
Benvenuti, a venerable Indianapolis eatery, called him away from the windy city for good. He spent a year there before joining forces with Something Different Restaurant in 1993, where he spent nine years receiving many accolades including nominations for the prestigious James Beard Rising Star Chef’s award and the restaurant’s induction into the Restaurant Hall of Fame.
And now, as Chef/Proprietor of OAKLEYS bistro, which he established in December 2002, he is living his childhood dream and hoping to help others do the same. An unpretentious, neighborhood American bistro is very different from the haute cuisine establishments of Chef Oakley’s previous experiences. Put in his words, “We wanted to dispel the notion that special food should be reserved for special occasions: we created an affordable, everyday destination where every meal is a special occasion.”
Achieving such recognition as being named “one of the hottest restaurants from coast to coast” by Bon Appétit, receiving the American Culinary Federation’s National Achievement of Excellence Award, and “Restaurant of the Year” and “Superstar” from the Indianapolis Monthly Magazine, OAKLEYS bistro reflects its owner’s passion for food and sharing it with others. But Chef Oakley’s sharing goes beyond the traditional, evidenced by the Restaurant & Hospitality Association’s Neighborhood Award to “honor restaurant operators who go above and beyond supporting their communities.” The Association specifically recognized that not only does Oakleys bistro contribute a portion of its sales of products to Second Helpings, Indianapolis’ only food rescue, job training and hunger relief program, but also Chef Oakley opens his kitchen for training and hiring those who demonstrate a true passion for food and who understand the demands placed on a first class kitchen team.
From capturing first place at the Food Network—Simon Mall’s “Super Chefs Live” competition and being invited as a guest chef for Cakebread Cellars’ American Harvest Dinners and Epcot’s International Food & Wine Festival to being named one of Indy’s Best and Brightest by the business community and honored for the past several years as a semifinalist in the James Beard Foundation’s Best Chefs in America Awards, Chef Oakley most cherishes the accolades from those who join him and his Team for lunch and dinner at OAKLEYS bistro. When asked to what he attributes his success, Chef Oakley responds, “You have to love what you do.” He does—and it shows.

Slapfish...well...SLAPS!!!
I have yet to eat something here that didn't leave me satisfied, wondering if I need a box, or thinking "is it okay to eat a clobster grill cheese for breakfast"?!?
The burrito is massive and you'll enjoy it more if you'll just be honest with yourself that half is for now and half is for later.
The fried pickles are just that...fried PICKLES...not little bitty chips...big old "I thought you said you liked pickles" spears! These are actually my favorite appetizer even though they're listed as a side.
-- jon
My favorite thing on the menu is the clobster grilled cheese! It's like someone heard that seafood and cheese didn't mixed and took it personal...went into the kitchen...and came up with the most decadent, buttery, cheesy, and luscious sandwich possible!

name: Workingman's Friend
raw_text:
Working Man’s Friend Menu (Updated September 2025)
Skip to content
Workingman's Friend
Home
About
Menu
Photos
Contact
Working Man’s Friend Menu
Good Food Never Goes Out of Style
Taste the Friendship in Time
The menu at Workingman’s Friend is a testament to the timeless flavors of classic American cuisine. Experience the comforting warmth of Workingman’s Friend’s homemade chili, packed with rich flavors and served with a side of nostalgia. For those seeking a lighter option, the restaurant’s menu also features an assortment of mouthwatering sandwiches and fresh salads, all prepared with the utmost care and attention to quality.
Savor the Flavor, Bite into Perfection!
Entrees
Immerse yourself in a world of satisfying flavors with Workingman’s Friend’s enticing selection of entrees. From tender, juicy steaks cooked to perfection to succulent grilled chicken served with a side of seasonal vegetables, each dish is a testament to the restaurant’s commitment to quality and taste. Indulge in the seafood offerings, featuring delicately pan-seared salmon or crispy fried shrimp, for a delightful journey of palate-pleasing sensations.
Your Thirst
Quench your thirst with Workingman’s Friend’s irresistible appetizer selection. Dive into a plate of golden-brown, crispy breaded mushrooms, bursting with earthy flavors that will leave you craving more. Savor the gooey, melted cheese oozing from the perfectly fried cheese sticks, providing a satisfying cheesy indulgence. And for those seeking a crunchy delight, the restaurant’s onion rings are a crispy and savory treat that pairs perfectly with any meal or makes for a delightful snack.
Big John Special
Prepare yourself for a hearty feast with the legendary Big John Special at Workingman’s Friend. This mouthwatering creation boasts a generous portion of the succulent smashed beef patty, cooked to perfection and topped with sizzling bacon, melted cheese, and a medley of fresh, crisp vegetables. Served on a soft, toasted bun, each bite is a symphony of flavors that will leave you satiated and craving another taste of this iconic Workingman’s Friend masterpiece.
The Working Person’s Choices of Excellence

Ruth's Classics
PRESENTING
HAPPY HOUR
MONDAY THRU FRIDAY | 4 - 6:30 PM
Happy Hour Just Got Better!
Swizzle and Swirl on weeknights with
$3 off
appetizers, entrées, glasses of wine, and specialty cocktails from our RBAR menu.
VIEW BAR MENU
Host an Event at Ruth's
All of our private spaces have dedicated service and catering for your special event.
Bring Ruth's to Your Event
We’ll make sure your catered meal is just one more perfect aspect of your event.
YOUR INDY FAMILY
We are a locally and family owned franchise since 1996. There’s a familial energy as soon as you step inside the door at Ruth’s Chris Indianapolis Downtown. Outside is a major city, but inside are people who remember you, your drink order, and how you like your steak. Inside are people who you’ve met and would love to talk to again. Inside is your Indy family. And we can’t wait to make another Indy night perfect for you.
Dress for the meal you deserve.
At Ruth’s Chris, we promote a family-friendly, fine dining atmosphere. We require our guests to not wear clothing with exposed undergarments, revealing tops that show excessive midriff or cleavage, offensive graphics, gym wear, bucket hats or baseball hats. Hats and team support jerseys are welcome in our bar areas. Please ensure your entire dining party is aware of our policy.
Management reserves the right to interpret these policies at their own discretion.
We thank you for your understanding and for your support.
Sign-Up and Be In The Know.
Be the first to receive news and updates on all things Ruth's Chris Indianapolis - Downtown.
Join us for an exclusive evening of legendary food and wine pairings.
Learn More
Private Dining

PLACE ORDER
Menu
Appetizers
Salads
Soups
Wraps
Seafood Specialties
Veggie Lovers
Entrees
Beverages
Hummus
Pureed chickpeas with tahini (crushed sesame seeds) and a hint of olive oil, garlic, cumin and lemon juice.
Appetizer Combo
Features Hummus, Tabouli, Babaganush, Eggplant Salsa, Dolma and Ezme.
Babaganush
Broiled eggplant blended with tahini, yogurt, garlic and parsley.
Eggplant Salsa
Finely chopped fried eggplant blended with tomato sauce, red bell peppers, garlic, onions, and aromatic spices.
Stuffed Grape Leaves (Dolma)
Grape leaves stuffed with rice, onion and mint.
Tzatziki (Cacik)
Creamy yogurt and cucumber dip blended with garlic, mint, and dill.
Falafel
Seasoned deep-fried garbanzo balls.
Tabouli (Kisir)
Cracked wheat salad blended with green onions, tomatoes, parsley, olive oil and a hint of crushed red pepper.
Borek
Flaky pastry filled with a savory blend of imported feta cheese and parsley.
Feta Cheese Plate
Imported feta cheese served with tomatoes, cucumbers, and black olives.
Zucchini Pancakes
Crispy pan-fried zucchini pancakes served with a flavorful garlicky yogurt sauce.
Pepper Delight (Ezme)
Spicy blend of roasted red and green bell peppers, tomatoes, garlic, parsley, and roasted walnuts.
Shepard's Salad (Coban Salata)
Tomatoes, parsley, cucumbers, green bell pepper, onions tossed with olive oil, vinegar and lemon juice.
Green Salad (Yesil Salata)
Lettuce, red cabbage, carrots tossed with olive oil, lemon juice and vinegar.
The Bosphorus Salad
Grated imported feta, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and grape leaves, tossed with iceberg lettuce in a delicate mix of vinegar, lemon juice, and olive oil.
Navy Bean Salad (Piyaz)
Navy beans, tomatoes, onions and parsley tossed with olive oil, balsamic vinegar and lemon juice.
Lentil Soup
Tomato Soup
Doner (Gyro)
Adana
Chicken
Lamb
Falafel
Beef
Spinach Tilapia
Fillet of tilapia cooked with mushrooms, red and green bell peppers, tomatoes, and onions, then baked with tomato sauce. Served with spinach cooked with artichokes, mushrooms, and heavy cream.
Shrimp Casserole
Sautéed shrimp, tomatoes, onions, mushrooms, red and green bell peppers baked with mozzarella cheese.
Tilapia
Fillet of tilapia cooked with mushrooms, red and green bell peppers, tomatoes and onions, then baked with tomato sauce. Served with green salad and white rice.
Shrimp Mediterranean
Shrimp sautéed with tomato sauce, green peppers, tomatoes, onions and potatoes. Served with a green salad and white rice.
Stuffed Eggplant (Imam Bayildi)
Baby eggplants stuffed with onions, tomatoes, garlic, green bell pepper, mushrooms, and raisins topped with tomato sauce and yogurt. Served with green salad and white rice.
Veggie Casserole (Guvec)
Eggplants, mushroom, zucchini, red and green bell peppers, carrots, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, green beans baked with tomato sauce. Served with white rice.
Turkish Delight
Sauté of carrots, red and green bell peppers, eggplant, tomatoes, zucchini and mushrooms. Served on top of hummus with walnuts, raisins.
Doner (Gyro)
Homemade marinated lamb and beef, grilled on a vertical spit. Served with tzatziki, vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Iskender
Slices of homemade Doner on top of grilled bread cubes, covered with tomato sauce and topped with yogurt.
Grilled Meat Patties (Kofte)
Grilled seasoned ground beef patties mixed with parsley and onions. Served with vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Adana Kebab
Seasoned ground lamb and beef patties mixed with red bell pepper, crushed red pepper and grilled on flat skewers. Served with vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Beyti Kebab
Seasoned ground lamb and beef patties mixed with parsley, onions, garlic and grilled on flat skewers, rolled with lavish bread covered with tomato sauce. Served with vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Beef Kebab
Tender cubes of beef marinated in our special sauce and grilled on skewers. Served with vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Chicken Kebab
Tender cubes of chicken marinated in our special sauce and grilled on skewers. Served with vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Spinach Chicken (Ispanakli Tavuk)
Chicken breast grilled with asparagus served with sautéed blend of spinach, mushrooms, onions, artichokes and heavy cream, topped with yogurt.
Chicken Mushroom
Chicken sautéed with tomato sauce, mushrooms and garlic. Served with green salad and white rice.
Sultan's Delight
Lamb sautéed with tomato sauce, green and red bell peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic and onions, served over eggplant puree.
Lamb Mediterranean
Lamb sautéed with tomato sauce, green and red bell peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic and onions. Served with green salad and white rice.
Shish Kebab
Tender cubes of lamb marinated in our special sauce and grilled on skewers. Served with vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Lamb Chops
Grilled lamb chops with grilled red and green bell peppers. Served with green salad and white rice.
Chicken Mediterranean
Chicken sautéed with tomato sauce, green and red bell peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic and onions. Served with green salad and white rice.
Beef Mediterranean
Beef sautéed with tomato sauce, green and red bell peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic and onions. Served with green salad and white rice.
Chicken Couscous
Chicken, tomato, carrots, zucchini, green beans, mushrooms, and garlic sautéed in tomato sauce and served with steamed couscous and green salad.
Chicken Adana Kebab
Seasoned ground chicken patties mixed with red bell peppers, crushed red peppers and grilled on flat skewers. Served with vegetables, green salad, and white rice.
Beef Humus
Beef tenderloins pan-seared with carrots, zucchini, green beans, mushrooms, and garlic. Served with hummus, walnuts and raisins.
Stuffed Eggplant (Karniyarik)
Oven-roasted eggplant stuffed with ground beef, chopped tomatoes, green peppers, topped with tomato sauce and yogurt. Served with green salad and white rice.
Stuffed Cabbage
Cabbage leaves stuffed with ground beef, rice and fresh dill served with tomato sauce and yogurt. Served with vegetables and green salad.
The Bosphorus Special
Mixed grill platter featuring Doner, Kofte, Chicken Kebab, Beef Kebab, Adana Kebab, and Chicken Adana Kebab. Served with vegetables and white rice.
Chicken Bosphorus
Chicken sautéed with tomato sauce, green and red bell peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic and onions in a white creamy sauce. Served with green salad and white rice.
Coca Cola Products
Coke, Diet Coke, Coke Zero, Sprite, Regular Iced Tea, Iced Green Tea, Lemonade, Sparkling Water.

Turkish yogurt drink made with water, salt, mint and yogurt mixture.

Beets oxygenate and strengthen the blood, carrots ward off infections with their
abundance of vitamin A, lemon and celery detoxify the liver, turmeric reduces
inflammation, and ginger calms the nervous system. The hint of black pepper does
more than complete the flavor profile, it supports absorption of the fresh
turmeric root.

Flush your system with powerful detoxifying agents to reduce bloating and cleanse

Detox Dream on an empty stomach, as activated charcoal is like a sponge, and will
disrupt the absorbency of nutrients from your food as it pushes the toxins out.

fatty acids that help to repair tissue, regulate blood sugar levels, and promote satiety.

intoxicating flavors of this creamy beverage.

PRESENTING
HAPPY HOUR
MONDAY THRU FRIDAY | 4 - 6:30 PM
Happy Hour Just Got Better!
Swizzle and Swirl on weeknights with
$3 off
appetizers, entrées, glasses of wine, and specialty cocktails from our RBAR menu.
VIEW BAR MENU
Host an Event at Ruth's
All of our private spaces have dedicated service and catering for your special event.
Bring Ruth's Chris to Your Event
We’ll make sure your catered meal is just one more perfect aspect of your event.
CELEBRATE EVERY DAY PERFECTLY
We are a locally and family owned franchise since 1994 who believes that every day can be an occasion. That’s why we get a celebratory energy going every day at Ruth’s Chris Indianapolis Northside. It’s the perfect blend of meeting new people and hanging with people who know your name – and how you like your drink. So come have a perfect steak, a perfect drink, and a perfect conversation.
Dress for the meal you deserve.
At Ruth’s Chris, we promote a family-friendly, fine dining atmosphere. We require our guests to not wear clothing with exposed undergarments, revealing tops that show excessive midriff or cleavage, offensive graphics, gym wear, bucket hats or baseball hats. Hats and team support jerseys are welcome in our bar areas. Please ensure your entire dining party is aware of our policy.
Management reserves the right to interpret these policies at their own discretion.
We thank you for your understanding and for your support.
Sign-Up and Be In The Know.
Be the first to receive news and updates on all things Ruth's Chris Indianapolis - Northside.
Join us for an exclusive evening of legendary food and wine pairings.
Learn More
HOST AN EVENT AT RUTH'S
Host a business meeting, rehearsal dinner, or a special event in one of our private rooms, with no rental fee or tech fees. Each of our private spaces has all the connectivity you need, plus dedicated service and catering.
Book Now
Learn More
BRING RUTH’S CHRIS TO YOUR EVENT
From a wedding to a business event to a holiday, we’ll make sure your catered meal is just one more perfect aspect of your event.
Book Now
WINE LOCKER PROGRAM
For all of our wine lovers, our exclusive wine lockers are a great way to always have your favorite bottles on hand. All Wine Locker Members enjoy exclusive benefits. Call us to find out more and reserve your wine locker.
Call 317-844-1155
Hours & Location
Located in the same complex as the Ironworks Hotel, just west of Keystone Ave. on 86th St.
Complimentary valet at the curb or self-parking in any Ironworks lot. Minutes away from the Keystone Fashion Mall.
Looking for our Downtown location?

Oracle and our third party partners may use cookies for the following purposes:
required cookies
are necessary for the site to function
functional cookies
help us to prefill your details on your next order and to optimize the site for easy reordering
advertising cookies
allow for interest-based advertising and tailored content across your browsers and devices

Functional
These cookies allow the Controller’s web application to remember choices you make while browsing and/or using the application (such as your user name, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, language and other parts of web pages that you can customize.
The information these cookies collect will not personally identify you, and they cannot track your browsing activity on non Controller’s websites.
For reliable review of your order status, on-screen on the application, in real-time, and also for easy reordering, your data may be saved on your device, serving a cookie locally.
