name: Ale Emporium
address: 11501 Geist Pavilion Dr, Ste 100, Fishers, IN 46037
raw_text:
Our Menu | Ale Emporium
Make your Picks for Ale Emporium Indianapolis
Indianapolis
Details
Change Location
Menu
Bar
Locations
Specials
Entertainment
Gift Cards
Online Ordering
Rewards
Ale Emporium Indianapolis Menu
Before the endless number of TVs, projections screens, patio, bands and tripling in size the Ale was know for its pizza, great beer selection, wings and great bar food. Today that tradition carries on. If you have never visited us you are invited to stop in and try our award winning menu.
Download Menu
Specials
Change Location
World-Famous Wings
Boneless Wings
Lightly floured chicken breast strips deep-fried and then tossed in your choice of one of our famous sauces. Served with our homemade bleu cheese or ranch. Celery and carrots are available upon request.
Traditional Wings
JUMBO wings served with our homemade bleu cheese or ranch. Celery and carrots are available upon request.
Try Our Award-Winning "Herman" Sauces:
HERMAN-STYLE
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, mixed with the Ale’s secret sauce.
HERMANAKI®
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, the Ale’s secret sauce, and teriyaki sauce.
HERMAZIAN
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, the Ale's secret sauce, and Asian sweet and sour sauce.
HERMAICAN
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, the Ale’s secret sauce, and Caribbean jerk seasoning.
TRADITIONAL SAUCES
- Teriyaki, Teriyaki Garlic, Sweet BBQ, Spicy BBQ, Mild, Wild, Three-Mile Island, No-Way Sauce
Appetizers
Muchos Nachos
Tortilla chips with melted cheddar jack cheese mix, white queso, chopped onions, black olives, diced tomatoes, lettuce, sour cream and jalapeños.
Buffalo Chicken Dip
Shredded chicken blended with cream cheese, homemade buttermilk dressing, signature buffalo sauce topped with melted gouda and bleu cheese — all baked to perfection. Served with fresh corn tortilla chips.
Chips-N-Dips
White corn tortilla chips, cooked fresh daily. Salsa, Queso, Chorizo Queso options.
Cheesy Bacon Skins
Six potato skins topped with cheddar jack cheese, chives and bacon.
Bavarian pretzel
A large 10 oz. pretzel for sharing served with your choice of nacho cheese, white queso or our homemade raspberry wasabi mustard.
Mac-n-cheese
Made from scratch with a creamy blend of smoked cheddar and American cheese topped with bread crumbs. Baked to perfection.
Ale Fries or Tots
Idaho potatoes or tater tots lightly sprinkled with Ale’s own special blend of seasoning. Your choice of regular fries, sweet potato fries or tater tots.
Cheese Fries or Tots
Fries or tots topped with cheddar jack cheese melted to perfection. Your choice of regular fries or sweet potato fries.
Homemade Chili
neighborhood favorite! Hearty chili with plenty of beef. Cheddar jack cheese and onions available upon request.
Hand-Crafted Soup of the Day
Monday: Cream of Broccoli w/ cheese
Tuesday: Chicken w/ Rice
Wednesday: Gumbo w/ rice
Thursday: Chicken Tortilla
Friday: Clam Chowder
Saturday: Loaded Potato
Sunday: Chicken & Noodle
Ale Stuffed Breadsticks
Three handmade breadsticks stuffed with pepperoni and melted mozzarella served with your choice of warm pizza sauce, nacho cheese or white queso.
Breadsticks
Five housemade breadsticks with your choice of warm pizza sauce, nacho cheese or white queso.
Ale's Homemade Pretzel-Crusted Pickles
Sliced dill pickles breaded, deep-fried and served with your choice of our special mustard sauce or buttermilk ranch dressing for dipping.
Chicken Quesadilla
Cajun-seasoned chicken breast with sautéed onions and tomatoes. Topped with cheddar jack cheese and folded inside a toasted flour tortilla. Served with lettuce, sour cream, and salsa.
Ale's Homemade Chicken Fingers
Freshly sliced chicken breast marinated in buttermilk and fried to a golden brown, sprinkled with Ale's special seasoning.
Ale Sampler
A variety of our classics — potato skins, pretzel-crusted pickles and chicken fingers.
Sandwiches & More
Lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles are available upon request. Served with your choice of one of the following sides: potato chips, coleslaw, potato salad, low-fat cottage cheese or mandarin wedges.
Tenderloin
A filet of pork, breaded, grilled or beer-battered, cooked to perfection.
Ale Club
Ham, turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayo, Swiss and American cheese on toasted white bread.
Grilled Ham & Cheese on a Pretzel
An American Classic — outside the box. Ham piled high on a pretzel bun and topped with American cheese.
Fish Sandwich
Fried to a golden brown and served with tartar sauce.
White Stromboli
Smoked chicken, our classic white sauce, pepperoni, onions, bacon, mild banana peppers and smoked gouda cheese baked on a French baguette.
Ale Stromboli
Pepperoni, sausage, green peppers, pizza sauce, onions, and cheese baked on a French baguette.
Hot Sicilian
Genoa salami, pepperoni, ham, capicola, mild banana peppers, Italian dressing and provolone on a grilled hoagie. Additional Italian dressing served on the side.
Ale Panini
Smoked chicken, basil pesto, red onions, smoked gouda cheese and portobello.
Chicken Parm Hoagie
Deep-fried chicken breast, homemade marinara, provolone cheese on a toasted hoagie roll.
Protein Bowl
Brown rice, choice of grilled chicken or steak, mixed veggies, Ale's thai sauce or substitute any of our wing sauces.
Steak / Chicken Philly
A grilled chopped chicken breast or grilled ribeye on a toasted hoagie bun with sautéed mushrooms, onions, and green peppers. Topped with melted provolone.
Burgers & Chicken
Lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles are available upon request. Served with your choice of one of the following sides: potato chips, coleslaw, potato salad, low-fat cottage cheese or mandarin wedges.
Ale & Hearty Burger
Topped with bacon strips and cheddar cheese.
Black Jack Burger
Seasoned with cajun spices, then topped with bacon and pepper jack cheese.
Grilled Turkey Burger
Fresh ground turkey lightly seasoned and grilled to perfection. Topped with sautéed roasted red peppers and our homemade aioli on a wheat bun.
Ale Yeah Hot Chicken Sandwich
Hand-breaded spicy chicken sandwich made with house made chipotle aioli. Served with pickles and lettuce.
Buffalo-Chicken Sandwich
Grilled or lightly breaded chicken tossed in our Buffalo sauce and served with a side of our blue cheese dressing.
Buffalo Chicken Wrap
Grilled or lightly breaded chicken tossed in our Buffalo sauce wrapped in a flour tortilla and stuffed with lettuce, diced tomatoes and blue cheese crumbles. Blue cheese dressing served on the side.
Naki Burger
Grilled with Hermanaki sauce and topped with pepper jack cheese and pineapple.
Shrimp Burger
A grilled homemade shrimp patty served with lettuce, chipotle aioli, homemade mango sauce, tomato and red onion.
All-American Burger
American cheese, shredded lettuce, tomato, red onion, homemade sauce.
Pizza
Cauliflower gluten-free pizza crust available on 10" pizzas only.
Pan-Style Pizzas
Our fresh, homemade dough placed in a lightly oiled pan, layered with your choice of our homemade sauces, plus a blend of cheese. Add your choice of toppings. Baked to perfection! Available in 10" and 14".
Regular and Thin-Style Pizzas
Our light and tender dough layered with your choice of our homemade sauces, plus a blend of cheese. Add your choice of toppings. Baked to perfection! Available in 10" and 16" sizes.
Veggie Toppings
Mushrooms, Portobello Mushrooms, Onions, Green Peppers, Black Olives, Green Olives, Anchovies, Spinach, Red Onions, Tomato Slices, Sun-Dried Tomatoes, Roma Tomatoes, Mild Banana Peppers, Jalapenos, Pineapple, Garlic, Smoked Gouda, Asiago Cheese, Artichoke Hearts, Roasted Bell Peppers, Basil
Protein Toppings
Sausage, Chorizo Sausage, Pepperoni, Bacon, Canadian Bacon, Ham, Capicola Ham, Hamburger, Smoked Chicken, Shrimp
Pizza Sauces
Traditional Red, BBQ, Classic White and Pesto
Ale Supremo Pizza
Sausage, pepperoni, onions, green peppers and mushrooms.
BBQ Pizza
Smoked chicken, red onions, BBQ sauce, smoked gouda.
Margharita Pizza
Olive oil, garlic, roma tomatoes, mozzarella, provolone and fresh basil.
The Porky Pig Pizza
Sausage, pepperoni, ham, Canadian bacon and bacon.
Salads
SIGNATURE HOMEMADE DRESSINGS: Caesar, French, Bleu Cheese, 1000 Island, Parmesan Peppercorn, Buttermilk Ranch, Honey Mustard LOW-FAT DRESSINGS: Italian, Ranch, Balsamic, Fat-Free Honey Mustard, Raspberry Vinaigrette, Southwest Ranch, Salsa, Vinegar and Oil
California Grilled Chicken Salad
Fresh mixed greens topped with grilled chicken strips, green peppers, onions, sliced avocado, tomatoes, tortilla strips and cheddar jack cheese.
Hermanaki Chicken Salad
Choice of grilled chicken breast or boneless Hermanaki atop a mix of fresh greens with mandarin oranges, tomatoes, tortilla strips and blue cheese dressing.
House Salad
Fresh, crisp garden greens mixed with fresh-baked croutons, tomatoes and a mozzarella-provolone cheese mix.
Traditional Wedge Salad
Crisp head of baby iceberg, bacon, crumbled blue cheese, red onions and tomatoes topped with our famous homemade blue cheese dressing.
Cobb Salad
Fresh mixed greens, bacon, bleu cheese crumbles, mushrooms, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocados topped with grilled chicken strips.
Caesar Salad
A large bed of romaine with tomatoes, parmesan cheese, fresh-baked croutons, and red onions.
Greek Salad
Bed of crisp romaine lettuce, cucumbers, red onions, tomatoes, kalamata olives, fresh parsley, feta cheese, with homemade Greek vinaigrette.
Fiesta Salad
Delicious blend of diced grilled chicken, corn, cilantro, feta cheese, jalapenos, diced tomatoes, cucumbers and avocado.
Buffalo Salad
Garden greens topped with bleu cheese crumbles, buffalo chicken strips, carrots, celery, tomatoes and gouda cheese.
Kid's
For kids 12 years and younger. Choice of one side: fries, tater tots, mandarin wedges, cottage cheese, chips, cole slaw, or potato salad. Drink included.
Cheeseburger
Chicken Tenders
Mac-N-Cheese
Grilled Cheese
7" Thin Cheese Pizza

RESTAURANTS
American Crafted Experiences
Explore our three gastropub locations in the greater Indianapolis area and indulge in our farm-to-table cuisine and Belgian-inspired craft beer selection.
Book your table below
and enjoy:
Fresh
Taxman beer
plus craft cocktails & extensive wine lists
Farm-to-table
menu
with a Belgian twist
Family-friendly dining and bar seating options
Amazing aesthetics in restored historic buildings
Seasonal, dog-friendly outdoor seating
To-go food and beverage options
Venues:
Bargersville
|
CityWay
|
Fortville
Interested in hosting a private event at one of our locations?
Click here
to learn more about our amenities and spaces.
Mon - Thu
4:00 pm – 10:00 pm
Fri - Sat
12:00 pm – 10:00 pm
​Sun
*
10:00 am – 10:00 pm
*
Brunch served 10:00 am – 3:00 pm
Hours of Operation:
TAXMAN
BARGERSVILLE
Taxman Bargersville is the original gastropub that started it all. Established in 2014, it sits in the heart of
downtown Bargersville, Indiana
, alongside our production brewery. Our two-story family-friendly restaurant offers table and bar seating, to-go carryout options, and a dog-friendly seasonal patio. Don't forget to follow us on social media to catch a brewery tour and see where it all began!
Address:
13 S. Baldwin St., Bargersville, IN 46106
Phone:
(317) 458-0210
Email:
bargersville@taxmanbrewing.com
Book Your Private Event
CITYWAY
TAXMAN
Taxman CityWay, located in
Indianapolis next to Gainbridge Fieldhouse
, is your perfect downtown destination or stop on your way to a concert or game. Enjoy delicious farm-to-table fare, enjoy our seasonal patio and stage, and a wide selection of libations in a historic 1850's livery renovated in 2019. Plan your next corporate event or meeting as well, with multiple options for parties of all sizes.
Address:
310 S. Delaware St., Indianapolis, IN 46204
Phone:
(317) 734-3107
Email:
cityway@taxmanbrewing.com
Book Your Private Event
FORTVILLE
TAXMAN
Taxman Fortville is the perfect spot for craft beer lovers in
northern Indianapolis
. Opened in 2017 and located near Geist Reservoir, this unique establishment combines two historic buildings, including what was once the old town jail, to create a one-of-a-kind atmosphere. Enjoy Taxman's signature brews, craft cocktails, and delicious food. Take advantage of multiple private event spaces, perfect for any size party.
Address:
29 S. Main St., Fortville, IN 46040
Phone:
(317) 482-1272
Email:
fortville@taxmanbrewing.com

Jobs
More
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
Welcome
​We're pleased to have you with us today!
We're excited to take you on a journey of the senses but first...Let's get some disclaimers out of the way:​​
WARNING: Some of these products contain
nicotine
. Nicotine is an addictive chemical
By ordering a hookah you accept the danger of
falling coal or ash
and we are not liable for damage or injury caused by hookah use.
Please
DO NOT TOUCH
or move the charcoals or hookahs on your own or you will be responsible for any damages. Always ask a server for assistance, we are happy to help.
We cannot provide customers with tongs.
Single coal rotation for 90 minutes is included in the hookah price additional coals or coconut coals are
add-ons
(Please allow 10-15 minutes for lighting of coconut coals)
If we say you're done drinking it isn't a negotiation. We reserve the right to refuse service.
If you need a cab our staff is happy to call one. Please
don't drink and drive
.
As of 10/01/22 all menu prices listed
include tax and 18% gratuity
There is a
15$ minimum
per customer
We will ask for a
credit card upfront
or request you pay per round
If you don't like something, let us know
right away
so we can fix it. There are no refunds on items that have been consumed.
Finally, just
be a nice human
!
Sounds good? Continue to the menu category of your choice!
1107 N College Ave, Indianapolis 317-672-7000
bottom of page

Build your perfect Mediterranean feast! Start with a base of aromatic, spiced couscous or hearty, organic chickpeas. Choose your favorite greens, a scoop of savory organic hummus or a zesty spread, and top it with a delicious portion of sustainable protein. Go wild with unlimited toppings and personalize your bowl with a selection of our 100% vegan sauces.

UPDATED: APRIL 2017.
GENERAL
Thehummusrepublic.com
strives to ensure that its services are accessible to people with disabilities.
Thehummusrepublic.com
has invested a significant amount of resources to help ensure that its website is made easier to use and more accessible for people with disabilities, with the strong belief that every person has the right to live with dignity, equality, comfort and independence.
ACCESSIBILITY ON THEHUMMUSREPUBLIC.COM
Thehummusrepublic.com
makes available the
UserWay Website Accessibility Widget
that is powered by a dedicated accessibility server. The software allows
Thehummusrepublic.com
to improve its compliance with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG 2.1).
ENABLING THE ACCESSIBILITY MENU
The
Thehummusrepublic.com
accessibility menu can be enabled by clicking the accessibility menu icon that appears on the corner of the page. After triggering the accessibility menu, please wait a moment for the accessibility menu to load in its entirety.
DISCLAIMER
Thehummusrepublic.com
continues its efforts to constantly improve the accessibility of its site and services in the belief that it is our collective moral obligation to allow seamless, accessible and unhindered use also for those of us with disabilities.
Despite our efforts to make all pages and content on
Thehummusrepublic.com
fully accessible, some content may not have yet been fully adapted to the strictest accessibility standards. This may be a result of not having found or identified the most appropriate technological solution.
HERE FOR YOU
If you are experiencing difficulty with any content on
Thehummusrepublic.com
or require assistance with any part of our site, please contact us during normal business hours as detailed below and we will be happy to assist.
CONTACT US
If you wish to report an accessibility issue, have any questions or need assistance, please contact
Thehummusrepublic.com
Customer Support as follows:
Email:
tdulce@thehummusrepublic.com
Healthy food for happy people.
Privacy Notice
Last updated March 05, 2019
Thank you for choosing to be part of our community at Hummus Republic Franchising USA inc., doing business as Hummus Republic (“
Hummus Republic
“, “
we
“, “
us
“, “
our
“). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us at Tdulce@thehummusrepublic.com.
When you visit our website www.thehummusrepublic.com (the “
Website
“), and more generally, use any of our services (the “
Services
“, which include the
Website
), we appreciate that you are trusting us with your personal information. We take your privacy very seriously. In this privacy notice, we seek to explain to you in the clearest way possible what information we collect, how we use it and what rights you have in relation to it. We hope you take some time to read through it carefully, as it is important. If there are any terms in this privacy notice that you do not agree with, please discontinue use of our Services immediately.
This privacy notice applies to all information collected through our Services (which, as described above, includes our
Website
), as well as, any related services, sales, marketing or events.
Please read this privacy notice carefully as it will help you understand what we do with the information that we collect.
TABLE OF CONTENTS
1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
2. WILL YOUR INFORMATION BE SHARED WITH ANYONE?
3. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
4. IS YOUR INFORMATION TRANSFERRED INTERNATIONALLY?
5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
6. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
7. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
8. DO CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS HAVE SPECIFIC PRIVACY RIGHTS?
9. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
10. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
11. HOW CAN YOU REVIEW, UPDATE OR DELETE THE DATA WE COLLECT FROM YOU?
1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
Personal information you disclose to us
In Short:
We collect personal information that you provide to us.
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you
express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Website
or otherwise when you contact us.
The personal information that we collect depends on the context of your interactions with us and the Website, the choices you make and the products and features you use. The personal information we collect may include the following:
All personal information that you provide to us must be true, complete and accurate, and you must notify us of any changes to such personal information.
Information automatically collected
In Short:
Some information — such as your Internet Protocol (IP) address and/or browser and device characteristics — is collected automatically when you visit our Website.
We automatically collect certain information when you visit, use or navigate the Website. This information does not reveal your specific identity (like your name or contact information) but may include device and usage information, such as your IP address, browser and device characteristics, operating system, language preferences, referring URLs, device name, country, location, information about how and when you use our Website and other technical information. This information is primarily needed to maintain the security and operation of our Website, and for our internal analytics and reporting purposes.
Like many businesses, we also collect information through cookies and similar technologies.
2. WILL YOUR INFORMATION BE SHARED WITH ANYONE?
In Short:
We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations.
We may process or share your data that we hold based on the following legal basis:
Consent:
We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information for a specific purpose.
Legitimate Interests:
We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests.
Performance of a Contract:
Where we have entered into a contract with you, we may process your personal information to fulfill the terms of our contract.
Legal Obligations:
We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so in order to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process, such as in response to a court order or a subpoena (including in response to public authorities to meet national security or law enforcement requirements).
Vital Interests:
We may disclose your information where we believe it is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding potential violations of our policies, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person and illegal activities, or as evidence in litigation in which we are involved.
More specifically, we may need to process your data or share your personal information in the following situations:
Business Transfers.
We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.
Google Maps Platform APIs.
We may share your information with certain Google Maps Platform APIs (e.g., Google Maps API, Place API).
To find out more about Google’s Privacy Policy, please refer to this
link
.
We obtain and store on your device (‘cache’) your location for __________ months. You may revoke your consent anytime by contacting us at the contact details provided at the end of this document.
Business Partners.
We may share your information with our business partners to offer you certain products, services or promotions.
3. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
In Short:
We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect and store your information.
We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies (like web beacons and pixels) to access or store information. Specific information about how we use such technologies and how you can refuse certain cookies is set out in our Cookie Notice.
4. IS YOUR INFORMATION TRANSFERRED INTERNATIONALLY?
In Short:
We may transfer, store, and process your information in countries other than your own.
Our servers are located in. If you are accessing our Website from outside, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed by us in our facilities and by those third parties with whom we may share your personal information (see “
WILL YOUR INFORMATION BE SHARED WITH ANYONE?
” above), in and other countries.
If you are a resident in the European Economic Area (EEA) or United Kingdom (UK), then these countries may not necessarily have data protection laws or other similar laws as comprehensive as those in your country. We will however take all necessary measures to protect your personal information in accordance with this privacy notice and applicable law.
5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
In Short:
We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy notice unless otherwise required by law.
We will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy notice, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law (such as tax, accounting or other legal requirements). No purpose in this notice will require us keeping your personal information for longer than 2 years.
When we have no ongoing legitimate business need to process your personal information, we will either delete or anonymize such information, or, if this is not possible (for example, because your personal information has been stored in backup archives), then we will securely store your personal information and isolate it from any further processing until deletion is possible.
6. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
In Short:
You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time.
If you are a resident in the EEA or UK and you believe we are unlawfully processing your personal information, you also have the right to complain to your local data protection supervisory authority. You can find their contact details here:
http://ec.europa.eu/justice/data-protection/bodies/authorities/index_en.htm
.
If you are a resident in Switzerland, the contact details for the data protection authorities are available here:
https://www.edoeb.admin.ch/edoeb/en/home.html
.
Cookies and similar technologies:
Most Web browsers are set to accept cookies by default. If you prefer, you can usually choose to set your browser to remove cookies and to reject cookies. If you choose to remove cookies or reject cookies, this could affect certain features or services of our Website. To opt-out of interest-based advertising by advertisers on our Website visit
http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
.
7. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems and mobile applications include a Do-Not-Track (“DNT”) feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. At this stage no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online. If a standard for online tracking is adopted that we must follow in the future, we will inform you about that practice in a revised version of this privacy notice.
8. DO CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS HAVE SPECIFIC PRIVACY RIGHTS?
In Short:
Yes, if you are a resident of California, you are granted specific rights regarding access to your personal information.
California Civil Code Section 1798.83, also known as the “Shine The Light” law, permits our users who are California residents to request and obtain from us, once a year and free of charge, information about categories of personal information (if any) we disclosed to third parties for direct marketing purposes and the names and addresses of all third parties with which we shared personal information in the immediately preceding calendar year. If you are a California resident and would like to make such a request, please submit your request in writing to us using the contact information provided below.
If you are under 18 years of age, reside in California, and have a registered account with the Website, you have the right to request removal of unwanted data that you publicly post on the Website. To request removal of such data, please contact us using the contact information provided below, and include the email address associated with your account and a statement that you reside in California. We will make sure the data is not publicly displayed on the Website, but please be aware that the data may not be completely or comprehensively removed from all our systems (e.g. backups, etc.).
9. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
In Short:
Yes, we will update this notice as necessary to stay compliant with relevant laws.
We may update this privacy notice from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated “Revised” date and the updated version will be effective as soon as it is accessible. If we make material changes to this privacy notice, we may notify you either by prominently posting a notice of such changes or by directly sending you a notification. We encourage you to review this privacy notice frequently to be informed of how we are protecting your information.
10. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may email us at info@thehummusrepublic.com or by post to:
Hummus Republic Franchising USA inc.
6700 FALLBROOK AVE
#195
WEST HILLS, CA 91307
United States
11. HOW CAN YOU REVIEW, UPDATE, OR DELETE THE DATA WE COLLECT FROM YOU?
Based on the applicable laws of your country, you may have the right to request access to the personal information we collect from you, change that information, or delete it in some circumstances. To request to review, update, or delete your personal information, please submit a request form by clicking
here
.
We use cookies to enhance your website experience, improve functionality and support our marketing efforts. You can manage your web-initiated cookie preferences by clicking “Settings” If you wish to opt out of Hummus Republic's sharing your personal information directly with third parties for the purpose of targeted advertising, please complete the US Data Request Form found in our
Privacy Center
. To learn more, please visit our recently updated Privacy Policy, including
California Privacy Rights
.
You can find out more about which cookies we are using or switch them off in
settings
.

About the Business
We only offer top-quality imported tobacco, mixed exclusively for Lava. Our hookah's are also of the highest quality to ensure our guests the ultimate hookah lounge experience.

we offer a unique mediterranean cuisine in its finest versions, try our gyros then decide for yourself. 

Enjoy the comfort of our seating areas while you smoke a hookah, appreciate the conversation of your friends, and delight in the superb menu.

Not only is Lava unlike anything else in Broad Ripple, we aim to be the lounge destination of central Indianapolis. Do not take our word for it, only your experience at Lava will exemplify our goals.

Accessibility Statement
Accessibility Statement
UPDATED: APRIL 2017.
GENERAL
Thehummusrepublic.com
strives to ensure that its services are accessible to people with disabilities.
Thehummusrepublic.com
has invested a significant amount of resources to help ensure that its website is made easier to use and more accessible for people with disabilities, with the strong belief that every person has the right to live with dignity, equality, comfort and independence.
ACCESSIBILITY ON THEHUMMUSREPUBLIC.COM
Thehummusrepublic.com
makes available the
UserWay Website Accessibility Widget
that is powered by a dedicated accessibility server. The software allows
Thehummusrepublic.com
to improve its compliance with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG 2.1).
ENABLING THE ACCESSIBILITY MENU
The
Thehummusrepublic.com
accessibility menu can be enabled by clicking the accessibility menu icon that appears on the corner of the page. After triggering the accessibility menu, please wait a moment for the accessibility menu to load in its entirety.
DISCLAIMER
Thehummusrepublic.com
continues its efforts to constantly improve the accessibility of its site and services in the belief that it is our collective moral obligation to allow seamless, accessible and unhindered use also for those of us with disabilities.
Despite our efforts to make all pages and content on
Thehummusrepublic.com
fully accessible, some content may not have yet been fully adapted to the strictest accessibility standards. This may be a result of not having found or identified the most appropriate technological solution.
HERE FOR YOU
If you are experiencing difficulty with any content on
Thehummusrepublic.com
or require assistance with any part of our site, please contact us during normal business hours as detailed below and we will be happy to assist.
CONTACT US
If you wish to report an accessibility issue, have any questions or need assistance, please contact
Thehummusrepublic.com
Customer Support as follows:
Email:
tdulce@thehummusrepublic.com
Healthy food for happy people.
Privacy Notice
Last updated March 05, 2019
Thank you for choosing to be part of our community at Hummus Republic Franchising USA inc., doing business as Hummus Republic (“
Hummus Republic
“, “
we
“, “
us
“, “
our
“). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us at Tdulce@thehummusrepublic.com.
When you visit our website www.thehummusrepublic.com (the “
Website
“), and more generally, use any of our services (the “
Services
“, which include the
Website
), we appreciate that you are trusting us with your personal information. We take your privacy very seriously. In this privacy notice, we seek to explain to you in the clearest way possible what information we collect, how we use it and what rights you have in relation to it. We hope you take some time to read through it carefully, as it is important. If there are any terms in this privacy notice that you do not agree with, please discontinue use of our Services immediately.
This privacy notice applies to all information collected through our Services (which, as described above, includes our
Website
), as well as, any related services, sales, marketing or events.
Please read this privacy notice carefully as it will help you understand what we do with the information that we collect.
TABLE OF CONTENTS
1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
2. WILL YOUR INFORMATION BE SHARED WITH ANYONE?
3. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
4. IS YOUR INFORMATION TRANSFERRED INTERNATIONALLY?
5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
6. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
7. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
8. DO CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS HAVE SPECIFIC PRIVACY RIGHTS?
9. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
10. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
11. HOW CAN YOU REVIEW, UPDATE OR DELETE THE DATA WE COLLECT FROM YOU?
1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
Personal information you disclose to us
In Short:
We collect personal information that you provide to us.
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you
express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Website
or otherwise when you contact us.
The personal information that we collect depends on the context of your interactions with us and the Website, the choices you make and the products and features you use. The personal information we collect may include the following:
All personal information that you provide to us must be true, complete and accurate, and you must notify us of any changes to such personal information.
Information automatically collected
In Short:
Some information — such as your Internet Protocol (IP) address and/or browser and device characteristics — is collected automatically when you visit our Website.
We automatically collect certain information when you visit, use or navigate the Website. This information does not reveal your specific identity (like your name or contact information) but may include device and usage information, such as your IP address, browser and device characteristics, operating system, language preferences, referring URLs, device name, country, location, information about how and when you use our Website and other technical information. This information is primarily needed to maintain the security and operation of our Website, and for our internal analytics and reporting purposes.
Like many businesses, we also collect information through cookies and similar technologies.
2. WILL YOUR INFORMATION BE SHARED WITH ANYONE?
In Short:
We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations.
We may process or share your data that we hold based on the following legal basis:
Consent:
We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information for a specific purpose.
Legitimate Interests:
We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests.
Performance of a Contract:
Where we have entered into a contract with you, we may process your personal information to fulfill the terms of our contract.
Legal Obligations:
We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so in order to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process, such as in response to a court order or a subpoena (including in response to public authorities to meet national security or law enforcement requirements).
Vital Interests:
We may disclose your information where we believe it is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding potential violations of our policies, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person and illegal activities, or as evidence in litigation in which we are involved.
More specifically, we may need to process your data or share your personal information in the following situations:
Business Transfers.
We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.
Google Maps Platform APIs.
We may share your information with certain Google Maps Platform APIs (e.g., Google Maps API, Place API).
To find out more about Google’s Privacy Policy, please refer to this
link
.
We obtain and store on your device (‘cache’) your location for __________ months. You may revoke your consent anytime by contacting us at the contact details provided at the end of this document.
Business Partners.
We may share your information with our business partners to offer you certain products, services or promotions.
3. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
In Short:
We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect and store your information.
We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies (like web beacons and pixels) to access or store information. Specific information about how we use such technologies and how you can refuse certain cookies is set out in our Cookie Notice.
4. IS YOUR INFORMATION TRANSFERRED INTERNATIONALLY?
In Short:
We may transfer, store, and process your information in countries other than your own.
Our servers are located in. If you are accessing our Website from outside, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed by us in our facilities and by those third parties with whom we may share your personal information (see “
WILL YOUR INFORMATION BE SHARED WITH ANYONE?
” above), in and other countries.
If you are a resident in the European Economic Area (EEA) or United Kingdom (UK), then these countries may not necessarily have data protection laws or other similar laws as comprehensive as those in your country. We will however take all necessary measures to protect your personal information in accordance with this privacy notice and applicable law.
5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
In Short:
We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy notice unless otherwise required by law.
We will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy notice, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law (such as tax, accounting or other legal requirements). No purpose in this notice will require us keeping your personal information for longer than 2 years.
When we have no ongoing legitimate business need to process your personal information, we will either delete or anonymize such information, or, if this is not possible (for example, because your personal information has been stored in backup archives), then we will securely store your personal information and isolate it from any further processing until deletion is possible.
6. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
In Short:
You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time.
If you are a resident in the EEA or UK and you believe we are unlawfully processing your personal information, you also have the right to complain to your local data protection supervisory authority. You can find their contact details here:
http://ec.europa.eu/justice/data-protection/bodies/authorities/index_en.htm
.
If you are a resident in Switzerland, the contact details for the data protection authorities are available here:
https://www.edoeb.admin.ch/edoeb/en/home.html
.
Cookies and similar technologies:
Most Web browsers are set to accept cookies by default. If you prefer, you can usually choose to set your browser to remove cookies and to reject cookies. If you choose to remove cookies or reject cookies, this could affect certain features or services of our Website. To opt-out of interest-based advertising by advertisers on our Website visit
http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
.
7. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems and mobile applications include a Do-Not-Track (“DNT”) feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. At this stage no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online. If a standard for online tracking is adopted that we must follow in the future, we will inform you about that practice in a revised version of this privacy notice.
8. DO CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS HAVE SPECIFIC PRIVACY RIGHTS?
In Short:
Yes, if you are a resident of California, you are granted specific rights regarding access to your personal information.
California Civil Code Section 1798.83, also known as the “Shine The Light” law, permits our users who are California residents to request and obtain from us, once a year and free of charge, information about categories of personal information (if any) we disclosed to third parties for direct marketing purposes and the names and addresses of all third parties with which we shared personal information in the immediately preceding calendar year. If you are a California resident and would like to make such a request, please submit your request in writing to us using the contact information provided below.
If you are under 18 years of age, reside in California, and have a registered account with the Website, you have the right to request removal of unwanted data that you publicly post on the Website. To request removal of such data, please contact us using the contact information provided below, and include the email address associated with your account and a statement that you reside in California. We will make sure the data is not publicly displayed on the Website, but please be aware that the data may not be completely or comprehensively removed from all our systems (e.g. backups, etc.).
9. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
In Short:
Yes, we will update this notice as necessary to stay compliant with relevant laws.
We may update this privacy notice from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated “Revised” date and the updated version will be effective as soon as it is accessible. If we make material changes to this privacy notice, we may notify you either by prominently posting a notice of such changes or by directly sending you a notification. We encourage you to review this privacy notice frequently to be informed of how we are protecting your information.
10. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may email us at info@thehummusrepublic.com or by post to:
Hummus Republic Franchising USA inc.
6700 FALLBROOK AVE
#195
WEST HILLS, CA 91307
United States
11. HOW CAN YOU REVIEW, UPDATE, OR DELETE THE DATA WE COLLECT FROM YOU?
Based on the applicable laws of your country, you may have the right to request access to the personal information we collect from you, change that information, or delete it in some circumstances. To request to review, update, or delete your personal information, please submit a request form by clicking
here
.
We use cookies to enhance your website experience, improve functionality and support our marketing efforts. You can manage your web-initiated cookie preferences by clicking “Settings” If you wish to opt out of Hummus Republic's sharing your personal information directly with third parties for the purpose of targeted advertising, please complete the US Data Request Form found in our
Privacy Center
. To learn more, please visit our recently updated Privacy Policy, including
California Privacy Rights
.
You can find out more about which cookies we are using or switch them off in
settings
.

About the Business
For the best Greek food and Mediterranean food, discover the legendary, bold flavors of The Great Greek Mediterranean Grill, where your new favorite dish awaits!

Our menu is inspired by the fresh ingredients of the Mediterranean diet and offers modern interpretations of traditional Greek, Mediterranean, and Middle Eastern classics like succulent grilled skewers, lamb, steak and chicken souvlaki, vibrant salads, and over-stuffed wraps. Try our tempting appetizers, generous gyros, feta fries, and indulgent desserts like baklava ice cream and Mom's rice pudding.

Join our Greek culinary adventure for dine in, take-out, delivery, and catering.

Live your life deliciously at The Great Greek Mediterranean Grill.

Crafting exceptional brews, one pint at a time
Brew Link Brewing is a small town brewpub located on the oak tree golf course. We have  24 unique beers on tap to pair with a variety of freshly made food from our kitchen. As a veteran owned and operated business, we strive to offer the highest quality beers , fresh hand made food, and top notch customer service. Stop by our friendly and cozy brew pub for a hand crafted ale today!

Review by - Google
five star review by
Diego C:
This was an amazing place! The burgers were super juicy (I ordered rare cook), and the bun had a perfect texture. The bacon was on point, and cheddar cheese was fabulous. Service was excellent, and atmosphere too. Prices are very fair for the size of the plates. I will definitely come back again.
Review by - Google
five star review by
CISCO:
First time come in here on my birthday week this is a really nice place to come and bring your friends or your day. The people are nice the place is very clean the beer is very tasteful. Definitely a nice place to hang out and enjoy the day.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Marty M:
Finally got a chance to check out the new location and was very happy I did. The staff was super friendly and the beer was really really good. They even walked around and gave free samples of a batch they just tapped which I thought was pretty awesome.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Aaron B:
This is a great little brew pub! I stoped by on my way through town and found good food and beer and great service. I particularly enjoyed the black and blue salad and the Lucid IPA. Great work Brew Link!

Desserts
Ask your server for more seasonal dessert options!
Hummingbird Cake
Juniper's "Signature Southern Dessert Cake" is a decadent tropical version of carrot cake with Cream Cheese Frosting, Crushed Pineapple, Pecans, Coconut, and Banana. Served with Grilled Pineapple Relish (whole cakes available with 24 hr notice)
Key Lime Pie
Authentic, decadent and an absolute southern coastal delight! Our Key Lime Pie is made fresh for us by our local baking partners at the "Stacco House by Mamamia". (whole pies available with 24 hr notice)
Seasonal Cake and Pie slice by the Stacco House
We feature fresh-made, seasonal, cake and pie slices from our local partners at the "Stacco House".  Ask your server for our current seasonal selections! (Full cakes and pies 
 also available with notice)

Need fixings for a group now? We got ya covered. These offers are available for pickup within hours of ordering.
Chip & Dip Party
Your choice of three 32oz dips. Served with chips.
Order Now
Taco Bar
Includes your choice of taco shells, two proteins, two sauces, and toppings: lettuce, tomato, cilantro & onions, jicama slaw, red cabbage, corn salsa, and smoked cheddar in 2 containers.
Order Now
Nacho Bar
Everything you need to build your own nachos! This nacho bar comes with housemade tortilla chips, your choice of protein, queso blanco, two sauces, and lots of toppings.
Order Now
Triple Chocolate Brownies
Housemade with cocoa, semi-sweet & milk chocolate chips, a hint of cinnamon, and topped with sea salt
Order Now

10 Person Nacho Bar
Housemade tortilla chips, your choice of protein, queso blanco, two sauces, and lots of toppings.
Order Now
Loaded Tots
Diced poblanos and queso included, and choose from three signature options: Loaded, Smoked Cheddar Bacon, or Simple.
Order Now
Side Box
Craving the ideal add-on for your meal? Look no further than our Side Box! Your choice of three signature sides: Loaded Cater Tots, Mexican Street Corn, Rice, Black Beans, or Refried Beans.
Order Now
Crave Bowls
Craving a packed bowl? Try any of our five new Crave bowls. From High Protein to Vegan, we have the perfect bowl to fit any lifestyle.

Happy Hour M-F: 4pm-6pm
Brunch: Sat & Sun until 3pm
Located less than a mile from the Fishers Event Center and just around the corner from IKEA and TopGolf, 101 Craft Kitchen in Fishers is your go-to restaurant for chef-driven, scratch-made food and craft cocktails.
Join us for lunch, brunch, dinner, or happy hour and enjoy a menu full of seasonal flavors—from fresh salads and sandwiches to hearty entrées and shareable small plates.
Whether you're fueling up before a day of shopping or winding down after an event, 101 is where craft and community come together.

America’s Greatest Gourmet Burgers
Introducing our new Thicker, Juicier Burgers
Since 1969, we’re the place that does burgers better than anyone. Where Bottomless Steak Fries reign. And where sharable bites become sharable moments. Welcome to Red Robin. We’re glad you’re here. Since our Guests vary, so does our menu — availability of items may be limited at some locations.

Allergen & Nutrition Information
2000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice, but calorie needs vary. 1,200 to 1,400 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice for children ages 4-8 years and 1,400 to 2,000 calories a day for children ages 9-13 years, but calorie needs vary. Additional nutrition information available upon request.
*Eggs served sunny-side up may be under-cooked.  NOTICE: CONSUMING RAW OR UNDER-COOKED MEATS, POULTRY, SEAFOOD, SHELLFISH OR EGGS MAY INCREASE YOUR RISK OF FOOD BORNE ILLNESS, ESPECIALLY IF YOU HAVE CERTAIN MEDICAL CONDITIONS.
‡Prepared in a common kitchen alongside items containing gluten.
Fried items may be prepared in the same frying oil as menu items containing animal ingredients. We cannot guarantee that cross-contact with animal ingredients will not occur.

name: Ale Emporium
raw_text:
Our Menu | Ale Emporium
Make your Picks for Ale Emporium Indianapolis
Indianapolis
Details
Change Location
Menu
Bar
Locations
Specials
Entertainment
Gift Cards
Online Ordering
Rewards
Ale Emporium Indianapolis Menu
Before the endless number of TVs, projections screens, patio, bands and tripling in size the Ale was know for its pizza, great beer selection, wings and great bar food. Today that tradition carries on. If you have never visited us you are invited to stop in and try our award winning menu.
Download Menu
Specials
Change Location
World-Famous Wings
Boneless Wings
Lightly floured chicken breast strips deep-fried and then tossed in your choice of one of our famous sauces. Served with our homemade bleu cheese or ranch. Celery and carrots are available upon request.
Traditional Wings
JUMBO wings served with our homemade bleu cheese or ranch. Celery and carrots are available upon request.
Try Our Award-Winning "Herman" Sauces:
HERMAN-STYLE
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, mixed with the Ale’s secret sauce.
HERMANAKI®
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, the Ale’s secret sauce, and teriyaki sauce.
HERMAZIAN
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, the Ale's secret sauce, and Asian sweet and sour sauce.
HERMAICAN
- Secret blend of peppers and spices, the Ale’s secret sauce, and Caribbean jerk seasoning.
TRADITIONAL SAUCES
- Teriyaki, Teriyaki Garlic, Sweet BBQ, Spicy BBQ, Mild, Wild, Three-Mile Island, No-Way Sauce
Appetizers
Muchos Nachos
Tortilla chips with melted cheddar jack cheese mix, white queso, chopped onions, black olives, diced tomatoes, lettuce, sour cream and jalapeños.
Buffalo Chicken Dip
Shredded chicken blended with cream cheese, homemade buttermilk dressing, signature buffalo sauce topped with melted gouda and bleu cheese — all baked to perfection. Served with fresh corn tortilla chips.
Chips-n-dips
White corn tortilla chips, cooked fresh daily. Salsa, Queso, Chorizo Queso options.
Chicken Quesadilla
Cajun-seasoned chicken breast with sautéed onions and tomatoes. Topped with cheddar jack cheese and folded inside a toasted flour tortilla. Served with lettuce, sour cream, and salsa.
Ale's Homemade Chicken Fingers
Freshly sliced chicken breast marinated in buttermilk and fried to a golden brown, sprinkled with Ale's special seasoning.
Ale Sampler
A variety of our classics — potato skins, pretzel-crusted pickles and chicken fingers.
Ale's Homemade Pretzel-Crusted Pickles
Sliced dill pickles breaded, deep-fried and served with your choice of our special mustard sauce or buttermilk ranch dressing for dipping.
Mac-n-cheese
Made from scratch with a creamy blend of smoked cheddar and American cheese topped with bread crumbs. Baked to perfection.
Homemade Chili
neighborhood favorite! Hearty chili with plenty of beef. Cheddar jack cheese and onions available upon request.
Bavarian pretzel
A large 10 oz. pretzel for sharing served with your choice of nacho cheese, white queso or our homemade raspberry wasabi mustard.
Cheesy Bacon Skins
Six potato skins topped with cheddar jack cheese, chives and bacon.
Ale Stuffed Breadsticks
Three handmade breadsticks stuffed with pepperoni and melted mozzarella served with your choice of warm pizza sauce, nacho cheese or white queso.
Breadsticks
Five housemade breadsticks with your choice of warm pizza sauce, nacho cheese or white queso.
Ale Fries or Tots
Idaho potatoes or tater tots lightly sprinkled with Ale’s own special blend of seasoning. Your choice of regular fries, sweet potato fries or tater tots.
Cheese Fries or Tots
Fries or tots topped with cheddar jack cheese melted to perfection. Your choice of regular fries or sweet potato fries.
Hand-Crafted Soup of the Day
Monday: Cream of Broccoli w/ cheese
Tuesday: Chicken w/ Rice
Wednesday: Gumbo w/ rice
Thursday: Chicken Tortilla and Cheeseburger soup
Friday: Clam Chowder
Saturday: Loaded Potato
Sunday: Chicken and noodle
Bacon-Wrapped Stuffed Jalapenos
Whole jalapenos stuffed with buffalo chicken dip and wrapped in bacon.
Fried Mozzarella
Mozzarella cheese coated in seasoned bread crumbs, fried to a golden brown and served with marinara.
Breaded Cauliflower Bites
Lightly breaded fresh cauliflower with choice of wing sauces, served with ranch or bleu cheese.
Sandwiches & More
Lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles are available upon request. Served with your choice of one of the following sides: potato chips, coleslaw, potato salad, low-fat cottage cheese or mandarin wedges.
Tenderloin
A filet of pork, breaded, grilled or beer-battered, cooked to perfection.
Ale Club
Ham, turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayo, Swiss and American cheese on toasted white bread.
Grilled Ham & Cheese on a Pretzel
An American Classic — outside the box. Ham piled high on a pretzel bun and topped with American cheese.
Fish Sandwich
Fried to a golden brown and served with tartar sauce.
White Stromboli
Smoked chicken, our classic white sauce, pepperoni, onions, bacon, mild banana peppers and smoked gouda cheese baked on a French baguette.
Ale Stromboli
Pepperoni, sausage, green peppers, pizza sauce, onions, and cheese baked on a French baguette.
Steak/Chicken Philly
A grilled chopped chicken breast or grilled ribeye on a toasted hoagie bun with sautéed mushrooms, onions, and green peppers. Topped with melted provolone.
Ale Panini
Smoked chicken, basil pesto, red onions, smoked gouda cheese and portobello.
Hot Sicilian
Genoa salami, pepperoni, ham, capicola, mild banana peppers, Italian dressing and provolone on a grilled hoagie. Additional Italian dressing served on the side.
Chicken Parm Hoagie
Deep-fried chicken breast, homemade marinara, provolone cheese on a toasted hoagie roll.
Protein Bowl
Brown rice, choice of grilled chicken or steak, mixed veggies, Ale's thai sauce or substitute any of our wing sauces.
Burgers & Chicken
Lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles are available upon request. Served with your choice of one of the following sides: potato chips, coleslaw, potato salad, low-fat cottage cheese or mandarin wedges.
Ale & Hearty Burger
Topped with bacon strips and cheddar cheese.
Black Jack Burger
Seasoned with cajun spices, then topped with bacon and pepper jack cheese.
Bleu Cheese Burger
Stuffed and topped with bleu cheese crumbles and served with bleu cheese dressing on the side.
Grilled Turkey Burger
Fresh ground turkey lightly seasoned and grilled to perfection. Topped with sautéed roasted red peppers and our homemade aioli on a wheat bun.
Bacon-Wrapped Filet
A petite 6 oz. hand-cut filet wrapped in bacon and charbroiled to your satisfaction. Served with a house salad, cup of soup and your choice of baked potato or fries.
Buffalo-Chicken Sandwich
Grilled or lightly breaded chicken tossed in our Buffalo sauce and served with a side of our blue cheese dressing.
Buffalo Chicken Wrap
Grilled or lightly breaded chicken tossed in our Buffalo sauce wrapped in a flour tortilla and stuffed with lettuce, diced tomatoes and blue cheese crumbles. Blue cheese dressing served on the side.
Ale Yeah Hot Chicken Sandwich
Hand-breaded spicy chicken sandwich made with house made chipotle aioli. Served with pickles and lettuce.
Naki Burger
Grilled with Hermanaki sauce and topped with pepper jack cheese and pineapple.
Shrimp Burger
A grilled homemade shrimp patty served with lettuce, chipotle aioli, homemade mango sauce, tomato and red onion.
Pizza
Cauliflower gluten-free pizza crust available on 10" pizzas only.
Pan-Style Pizzas
Our fresh, homemade dough placed in a lightly oiled pan, layered with your choice of our homemade sauces, plus a blend of cheese. Add your choice of toppings. Baked to perfection! Available in 10" and 14".
Regular and Thin-Style Pizzas
Our light and tender dough layered with your choice of our homemade sauces, plus a blend of cheese. Add your choice of toppings. Baked to perfection! Available in 10" and 16" sizes.
Veggie Toppings
Mushrooms, Portobello Mushrooms, Onions, Green Peppers, Black Olives, Green Olives, Anchovies, Spinach, Red Onions, Tomato Slices, Sun- Dried Tomatoes, Roma Tomatoes, Mild Banana Peppers, Jalapenos, Pineapple, Garlic, Smoked Gouda, Asiago Cheese, Artichoke Hearts, Roasted Bell Peppers, Basil
Protein Toppings
Sausage, Chorizo Sausage, Pepperoni, Bacon, Canadian Bacon, Ham, Capicola Ham, Hamburger, Smoked Chicken, Shrimp
Pizza Sauces
Traditional Red, BBQ, Classic White and Pesto
Ale Supremo Pizza
Sausage, pepperoni, onions, green peppers and mushrooms.
BBQ Pizza
Smoked chicken, red onions, BBQ sauce, smoked gouda.
Margharita Pizza
Olive oil, garlic, roma tomatoes, mozzarella, provolone and fresh basil.
The Porky Pig Pizza
Sausage, pepperoni, ham, Canadian bacon and bacon.
Salads
SIGNATURE HOMEMADE DRESSINGS: Hot Bacon, Caesar, French, Bleu Cheese, 1000 Island, Parmesan Peppercorn, Buttermilk Ranch, Honey Mustard LOW-FAT DRESSINGS: Italian, Ranch, Balsamic, Fat-Free Honey Mustard, Raspberry Vinaigrette, Southwest Ranch, Salsa, Vinegar and Oil
California Grilled Chicken Salad
Fresh mixed greens topped with grilled chicken strips, green peppers, onions, sliced avocado, tomatoes, tortilla strips and cheddar jack cheese.
Cobb Salad
Fresh mixed greens, bacon, bleu cheese crumbles, mushrooms, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocados topped with grilled chicken strips.
Caesar Salad
A large bed of romaine with tomatoes, parmesan cheese, fresh-baked croutons, and red onions.
Hermanaki Chicken Salad
Choice of grilled chicken breast or boneless Hermanaki atop a mix of fresh greens with mandarin oranges, tomatoes, tortilla strips and blue cheese dressing.
Traditional Wedge Salad
Crisp head of baby iceberg, bacon, crumbled blue cheese, red onions and tomatoes topped with our famous homemade blue cheese dressing.
Buffalo Salad
Garden greens topped with bleu cheese crumbles, buffalo chicken strips, carrots, celery, tomatoes and gouda cheese.
House Salad
Fresh, crisp garden greens mixed with fresh-baked croutons, tomatoes and a mozzarella-provolone cheese mix.
Greek Salad
Bed of crisp romaine lettuce, cucumbers, red onions, tomatoes, kalamata olives, fresh parsley, feta cheese, with homemade Greek vinaigrette.
Fiesta Salad
Delicious blend of diced grilled chicken, corn, cilantro, feta cheese, jalapenos, diced tomatoes, cucumbers and avacado.

About the Business
We are a Cantina & Tiki Bar that specializes in street style tacos. Although we are known for our Tequila, Tacos and Tiki Bar, we make pretty delicious burgers as well. We make almost everything we serve in house, daily. Our Tiki Bar is an oasis in Fountain Square. Step through the double doors and you will forget you're in Indianapolis.
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Should I/do I need to make a reservation for a group of 10?
A:
They do not take reservations, but you might want to give them a heads up and perhaps they will make an exception for such a large party.
Gigi C.

Shin, Hae, and Sun Hee S.
Business Owner
Traditional Korean food in the heart of America.  Each meal comes with numerous dishes that will tantalize the taste buds.  The ambiance of our restaurant will transport you to the Orient without ever leaving your table.  Feel like singing?  Our karaoke system has over 10,000 songs from countries all over the world. Our Menus
Step into a world where farm-fresh flavors meet artisanal craftsmanship at
Traders Point Creamery.  Our lunch, brunch, dinner and dessert menus are a symphony of seasonal ingredients, lovingly sourced from our own pastures and local purveyors, ensuring every bite is a celebration of nature’s bounty.
Each dish is a masterpiece created by our executive Chef, Christian Cline, and his expert culinary team.  Our menus are a testament to our passion for organics, sustainability and flavor.  Traders Point Creamery promises an unforgettable dining experience, where every meal is memorable as well as nourishing.
Lunch
Brunch
Dinner
Dessert
Our Mission
Farm in harmony with the land and the animals.
Produce the most nutritious and healthful product possible.
Encourage education of farming and nutrition.
Promote a community of local food and sustainable farming, reconnecting farmers and consumers.

MENUS FOR
INDIANAPOLIS
From our famous fried chicken to seasonal delights, our chef-inspired southern food is available for brunch, lunch, dinner and happy hour. Browse our menus below and join us for a revival of southern classics.
ALL-DAY
All Day
Kids
Bar
Beer & Specialty Sips
Catering
All Day
beginnings
biscuits for a cause
two buttermilk drop biscuits baked fresh with white lily flour, served warm with whipped butter and choice of blueberry or peach jam (870 cal). proceeds go to employee relief & development funds; over $850,000 awarded to date!
famous fried green tomatoes
panko-crusted fried green tomatoes over creamy stone-ground goat cheese grits and red pepper coulis, topped with fresh basil (600 cal)
benton's blue ridge salad
romaine, benton's country ham crisps, biscuit crumbles, pickled red onions, parmesan, honey dijonnaise (315 cal)
southern fried okra
with spicy 'bama firecracker dipping sauce (740 cal)
crispy brussels
fried brussels sprouts, red pepper coulis, goat cheese (735 cal)
fried pickles
with buttermilk ranch dipping sauce (495 cal)
soups & salads
add fried or grilled chicken, grilled shrimp, honey pecan chicken salad, or pan-seared salmon (60-355 cal)
for the love of cobb (gf)
romaine, mixed greens, grape tomatoes, chopped bacon, hard-boiled egg, cheddar, avocado, red onion, buttermilk ranch (830 cal)
caesar salad
romaine, croutons, parmesan, caesar dressing (620 cal)
house salad
mixed greens, grape tomatoes, cucumbers, pickled red onions, shredded cheddar, croutons (415 cal)
chicken poblano soup
chicken, peppers, corn, black beans, lime, chives; available as a cup or a bowl (190-300 cal)
tomato soup
topped with basil; available as a cup or a bowl (140-210 cal)
sandwiches
add a fried egg*, apple cider bacon, or avocado; gluten-free bread or bun available
smother lovin' biscuit sandwich
benton's country ham crisp, cheddar, fried egg*, milk gravy, scallions, buttermilk biscuit, choice of rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes or stone-ground goat cheese grits (1,235 cal)
southern chicken blt
fried* or grilled chicken, apple cider bacon, dijonnaise, lettuce, tomato, potato bun
sweet & spicy fried chicken sandwich
fried chicken*, sriracha honey, lettuce, pickles, tomato, mayonnaise, potato bun
asheville hot chicken & ranch melt
spicy dusted fried chicken, cheddar, house-made pickles, buttermilk ranch, griddled texas toast
avocado melt
sliced avocado, cucumber, red onion, swiss, green tomato aioli on multi-grain bread
whiskey & onion smash burger
two quarter pound beef patties**, creamy whiskey & onion gravy, cheddar, house-made pickles, potato bun (1,390 cal)
grilled cheese dip 'n dunk
dunkable & dippable! classic grilled cheese sandwich with bowl of tomato soup
lunch combos
choose a main and a side to build your perfect lunch! available monday through friday until 3pm.
1/2 chicken salad sandwich
1/2 grilled cheese
buttermilk chicken tenders
1/2 asheville hot chicken & ranch melt
1/2 avocado melt
main affairs
buttermilk fried chicken tenders
hand-breaded fried* tenders sprinkled with 'bee dust', with honey dijonnaise, smoky chipotle bbq, and spicy 'bama firecracker dipping sauces. served with choice of one side.
smoky mountain flat iron
tender slices of grilled marinated steak, smoky black pepper sauce (540 cal) choice of two sides
farmhouse breakfast platter
two eggs** any style, choice of rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes* or stone-ground goat cheese grits & choice of apple cider bacon or chorizo pork sausage, country sausage, or soy-sage, and a slice of texas toast
sweet & spicy fried chicken & waffles
sriracha honey fried chicken*, cilantro, buttermilk waffles
'life's a peach' chicken & waffles
honey-dusted fried chicken*, buttermilk waffles, peach compote, spiced pecans, whipped cream (1,725 cal)
steak & eggs
tender slices of grilled marinated flat iron steak, green tomato aioli, two fried eggs*, with choice of rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes or stone-ground goat cheese grits (1,060 cal)
smothered chicken
boneless & skinless honey-dusted fried chicken thighs*, milk gravy, basil, your choice of two farm-fresh sides
mountain morning bowl
two sunny-side up eggs**, rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes*, cheddar cheese, chopped apple cider bacon, green tomato salsa, red pepper sauce, stone-ground goat cheese grits
garden harvest omelet
three-egg or egg white omelet with avocado, spinach, tomato, swiss cheese, basil, red pepper crema (690 cal), served with choice of stone-ground goat cheese grits, rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes, or sliced tomatoes
southwest omelet (gf)
three-egg or egg white omelet with chorizo, cheddar, pickled jalapeños, roasted red peppers (765 cal), served with choice of stone-ground goat cheese grits, rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes, or sliced tomatoes
farmhouse omelet (gf)
three-egg or egg white omelet with bacon, sausage, american cheese, sautéed onions (950 cal), served with choice of stone-ground goat cheese grits, rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes, or sliced tomatoes
pan-seared salmon (gf)
with peperonata and tomato-chipotle compound butter (680 cal) choice of two sides
blackened mahi (gf)
with a silky basil citrus butter sauce (340 cal) choice of two sides
sweet potato pancake
oversized pancake, spiced pecans, powdered sugar, whipped butter, with choice of: apple cider bacon, breakfast sausage, chorizo pork sausage, or soy-sage (970-1,365 cal)
bourbon peppercorn glazed meatloaf
scratch-made blend of beef & chorizo, served with your choice of 2 farm-fresh sides
sweet & spicy fried chicken
bone-in &  fried chicken* smothered in sriracha honey sauce, cilantro, choice of one farm fresh side (choose dark meat, white meat or half bird)
honey-dusted fried chicken
honey-dusted, bone-in & fried chicken*, choice of one farm fresh side (choose dark meat, white meat or half bird)
tupelo shrimp & grits (gf)
sustainably, wild-caught white gulf shrimp, chorizo pork sausage, peperonata, creole sauce, scallions, heirloom grits with goat cheese
classic chicken & waffles
honey-dusted fried chicken*, buttermilk waffles, powdered sugar, whipped butter

rosemary & parmesan crispy potatoes*

cappuccino mousse on a crumbly chocolate cookie crust

with dark chocolate sauce drizzle
